text.655: [21] accuggataatilapataa {atibalataa (sii0 syaa0 pii0),  atilapakaa (katthaci)}, ativela.m pabhaasitaa.
text.666: [22] naaya.m kaala.m akaala.m vaa, abhijaanaati kukku.toti..
text.670: [21] abaddhaa ^a^T1.0039^ea^ ^a^V1.0027^ea^ tattha bajjhanti, yattha baalaa  pabhaasare.
text.671: [22] baddhaapi tattha muccanti, yattha dhiiraa pabhaasareti..
text.675: [21] atha gadrabha sattuva ka.msasata.m, bahucinti saasikaayaatikara.
text.680: [21] kare sarikkho atha vaapi se.t.tho, nihiinako vaapi  kareyya eko.
text.681: [22] kareyyumete {kareyyu.m te (sii0 pii0)} byasane uttamattha.m, yathaa aha.m kusanaa.li  rucaayanti..
text.685: [21] yasa.m ^a^T1.0040^ea^ ^a^M1.0029^ea^ laddhaana dummedho, anattha.m carati  attano.
text.691: [22] naaya.m dadhi.m vedi na {na vedi (ka0)} na"ngaliisa.m, dadhippaya.m {dadhimpaya.m  (sii0 pii0)} ma~n~nati na"ngaliisanti..
text.696: [22] vaayaamassa phala.m passa, bhuttaa ambaa aniitihanti..
text.700: [21] bahumpi so vikattheyya, a~n~na.m janapada.m gato.
text.705: [21] tadevekassa ^a^T1.0041^ea^ {tathevekassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0 a.t.tha0  muulapaa.tho)} kalyaa.na.m, tadevekassa paapaka.m.
text.706: [22] tasmaa sabba.m na kalyaa.na.m, sabba.m vaapi na paapakanti..
text.710: [21] te desaa taani vatthuuni, aha~nca vanagocaro.
text.711: [22] anuvicca kho ta.m ga.nheyyu.m, piva {pipa (sii0 pii0)} khiira.m kala.n.dukaati..
text.715: [21] yo ^a^M1.0030^ea^ ve dhamma.m dhaja.m {dhammadhaja.m (syaa0 pii0  ka0)} katvaa, niguu.lho  paapamaacare.
text.716: [22] vissaasayitvaa bhuutaani, bi.laara.m naama ta.m vatanti..
text.720: [21] naaya.m sikhaa pu~n~nahetu, ghaasahetu aya.m sikhaa.
text.721: [22] naa"ngu.t.thaga.nana.m yaati, ala.m te hotu aggikaati..
text.725: [21] yathaa ^a^T1.0042^ea^ ^a^V1.0029^ea^ vaacaa ca bhu~njassu, yathaa bhutta~nca  byaahara.
text.726: [22] ubhaya.m te na sameti, vaacaa bhutta~nca kosiyeti..
text.730: [21] kusanaa.lisirivhayano ca yasa.m, dadhi mamba  ka.taahakapa~ncamako.
text.731: [22] atha paapaka khiira bi.laaravata.m, sikhi kosiyasavhayanena  dasaati..
text.736: [22] tasmaa haraami bhusa.m a.d.dhamaana.m, maa me mitti jiiyittha  sassataayanti..
text.740: [21] kusaluupadese ^a^T1.0043^ea^ ^a^M1.0031^ea^ dhitiyaa da.lhaaya ca,  anivattitattaabhayabhiirutaaya {avatthitattaabhayabhiirutaaya (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ca.
text.741: [22] na rakkhasiina.m vasamaagamimhase, sa sotthibhaavo mahataa  bhayena meti..
text.746: [21] khema.m yahi.m tattha arii udiirito {ari uddharito  (ka0)}, dakassa majjhe jalate  ghataasano.
text.747: [22] na ajja vaaso mahiyaa mahiiruhe, disaa bhajavho  sara.naajja no bhayanti..
text.751: [21] ye ^a^V1.0030^ea^ sa~n~nino tepi duggataa, yepi  asa~n~nino tepi duggataa.
text.752: [22] eta.m ubhaya.m vivajjaya, ta.m ^a^T1.0044^ea^ samaapattisukha.m ana"nga.nanti..
text.761: [21] ya.m ^a^M1.0032^ea^ laddha.m tena tu.t.thabba.m, atilobho hi  paapako.
text.766: [21] yattheko labhate babbu, dutiyo tattha jaayati.
text.767: [22] tatiyo ca catuttho ca, ida.m te babbukaa bilanti..
text.771: [21] ki.m te ja.taahi dummedha, ki.m te ajinasaa.tiyaa.
text.776: [21] akkhii bhinnaa pa.to na.t.tho, sakhigehe ca bha.n.dana.m.
text.777: [22] ubhato padu.t.thaa kammantaa {padu.t.thakammanto (sii0), padu.t.tho kammanto (pii0)}, udakamhi thalamhi caati..
text.782: [22] tasmaa nesa.m vasaa natthi, kaakaanamhaaka {kaakaanasmaaka (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} ~naatinanti..
text.786: [21] itariitara ^a^M1.0033^ea^ rakkhasi khemiyo ca,  parosatapa~nhena aabhassaro puna.
text.796: [21] eta~nhi te duraajaana.m, ya.m sesi matasaayika.m.
text.797: [22] yassa te ka.d.dhamaanassa, hatthaa da.n.do na muccatiiti..
text.801: [21] lasii ca te nipphalitaa, matthako ca padaalito  {vidaalito (sii0 pii0)}.
text.802: [22] sabbaa te phaasukaa bhaggaa, ajja kho tva.m virocasiiti..
text.806: [21] bahumpeta.m ^a^V1.0032^ea^ asabbhi {bahupetamasabbhi  (ka0)} jaataveda, ya.m ta.m  vaaladhinaabhipuujayaama.
text.807: [22] ma.msaarahassa ^a^T1.0047^ea^ natthajja ma.msa.m, na"ngu.t.thampi bhava.m pa.tiggahaatuuti..
text.811: [21] na ^a^M1.0034^ea^ tva.m raadha vijaanaasi, a.d.dharatte  anaagate.
text.812: [22] abyayata.m {abyaayata.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0), abyattata.m (?)} vilapasi, virattaa kosiyaayaneti..
text.816: [21] api nu hanukaa santaa, mukha~nca parisussati.
text.821: [21] nayida.m dukkha.m adu.m dukkha.m, ya.m ma.m tudati vaayaso.
text.826: [21] naaha.m ^a^T1.0048^ea^ puna.m na ca puna.m, na caapi apunappuna.m.
text.831: [21] ekapa.n.no aya.m rukkho, na bhuumyaa catura"ngulo.
text.837: [22] tameva ghaasa.m kurute, byaggho sa~njiivako yathaati..
text.841: [21] sukhamedhati da.n.davaro ca puna, lasi vaaladhi  pa~ncamaraadhavaro.
text.842: [22] samahodadhi ^a^T1.0049^ea^ kattika bondi puna, catura"ngulabyagghavarena  dasaati..
text.846: [27] aasiiso itthivaru.na.m apaayi, littavaggena te dasa.
text.847: [22] parosata.m ha.mci kusanaa.li {ha.msi sarikkha.m (sabbattha)}, asampada.m kaka.n.takavaggo..
text.854: [21] da.lha.m ^a^T1.0050^ea^ ^a^V1.0034^ea^ ^a^M1.0036^ea^ da.lhassa khipati,  balliko {malliko (sii0 pii0)} mudunaa mudu.m.
text.856: [22] etaadiso aya.m raajaa, maggaa uyyaahi saarathi..
text.858: [21] akkodhena jine kodha.m, asaadhu.m saadhunaa jine.
text.860: [22] etaadiso aya.m raajaa, maggaa uyyaahi saarathiiti..
text.867: [27] sutvaa siihassa nigghosa.m, si"ngaalo {sigaalo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} daddare vasa.m.
text.872: [21] catuppado ^a^T1.0051^ea^ aha.m samma, tvampi samma catuppado.
text.873: [22] ehi samma {siiha (sii0 pii0)} nivattassu, ki.m nu bhiito palaayasi..
text.876: [22] sace yujjhitukaamosi, jaya.m samma dadaami teti..
text.880: [21] idhuuragaana.m ^a^M1.0037^ea^ pavaro pavi.t.tho, selassa  va.n.nena pamokkhamiccha.m.
text.881: [22] brahma~nca va.n.na.m {vakka.m (ka0)} apacaayamaano, bubhukkhito no vitaraami  {visahaami (ka0 si0 syaa0 pii0)} bhottu.m..
text.883: [21] so brahmagutto cirameva jiiva, dibyaa ca te paatubhavantu  bhakkhaa.
text.884: [22] yo brahmava.n.na.m apacaayamaano, bubhukkhito no vitaraasi  {sabbatthapi samaana.m} bhottunti..
text.888: [21] jiiva ^a^T1.0052^ea^ vassasata.m bhagga {gagga (sii0 pii0)}, aparaani  ca viisati.m {viisati (syaa0 ka0)}.
text.889: [22] maa ma.m pisaacaa khaadantu, jiiva tva.m sarado sata.m..
text.891: [21] tvampi vassasata.m jiiva, aparaani ca viisati.m.
text.892: [22] visa.m pisaacaa khaadantu, jiiva tva.m sarado satanti..
text.905: [21] yena ^a^M1.0038^ea^ kaama.m pa.naameti, dhammo balavata.m  migii.
text.908: [21] api ^a^V1.0036^ea^ cepi dubbalo mitto, mittadhammesu  ti.t.thati.
text.909: [27] so ~naatako ca bandhu ca, so mitto so ca me sakhaa.
text.910: [22] daa.thini ^a^T1.0053^ea^ maatima~n~nittho {ma~n~nivo (syaa0), ma~n~navho (ka0)}, si"ngaalo mama paa.nadoti..
text.918: [22] sameti paapa.m paapena, sameti asataa asanti..
text.922: [21] udetaya.m cakkhumaa ekaraajaa, harissava.n.no  pathavippabhaaso {pa.thavippabhaaso (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.923: [22] ta.m ta.m namassaami harissava.n.na.m pathavippabhaasa.m, tayaajja  guttaa viharemu divasa.m..
text.924: [21] ye braahma.naa vedaguu sabbadhamme, te me namo te ca ma.m  paalayantu.
text.925: [27] namatthu buddhaana.m {buddhaana (?)} namatthu bodhiyaa, namo vimuttaana.m  {vimuttaana (?)} namo vimuttiyaa.
text.926: [22] ima.m so paritta.m katvaa, moro carati esanaa..
text.929: [22] ta.m ta.m nammassaami harissava.n.na.m pathavippabhaasa.m, tayaajja  guttaa viharemu ratti.m..
text.930: [21] ye braahma.naa vedaguu sabbadhamme, te me namo te ca ma.m  paalayantu.
text.931: [27] namatthu buddhaana.m namatthu bodhiyaa, namo vimuttaana.m namo  vimuttiyaa.
text.932: [22] ima.m so paritta.m katvaa, moro vaasamakappayiiti..
text.937: [22] assaa vahanti aaja~n~naa, yathaa ha.msaa viniilaka.m..
text.939: [21] viniila ^a^V1.0037^ea^ dugga.m bhajasi, abhuumi.m taata  sevasi.
text.940: [22] gaamantakaani {gaamantikaani (sii0), gaamantaraani (ka0)} sevassu, eta.m maataalaya.m tavaati..
text.945: [22] mahatiicamu yaava si"ngaalavaro, suhanuttama mora viniila.m  dasaati..
text.949: [21] na ^a^M1.0040^ea^ santhava.m {sandhava.m (ka0)} kaapurisena kayiraa,  ariyo anariyena pajaanamattha.m.
text.950: [22] ciraanuvutthopi karoti paapa.m, gajo yathaa  indasamaanagotta.m..
text.952: [21] ya.m tveva ja~n~naa sadiso mamanti, siilena pa~n~naaya  sutena caapi.
text.953: [22] teneva metti.m kayiraatha saddhi.m, sukho have sappurisena  sa"ngamoti..
text.957: [21] na ^a^T1.0056^ea^ santhavasmaa paramatthi paapiyo, yo santhavo {sandhavo  (ka0)}  kaapurisena hoti.
text.958: [22] santappito sappinaa paayasena {paayaasena (ka0)}, kicchaakata.m pa.n.naku.ti.m  adayhi {ada.d.dhahi (sii0 syaa0), ada.t.thahi (pii0), adaddahi (?)}..
text.960: [21] na santhavasmaa paramatthi seyyo, yo santhavo sappurisena  hoti.
text.961: [22] siihassa byagghassa ca diipino ca, saamaa mukha.m lehati  santhavenaati..
text.965: [21] kaa.laa migaa setadantaa taviime {tava ime (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}, parosata.m  hemajaalaabhichannaa {hemajaalaabhisa~nchannaa (sii0)}.
text.966: [22] te te dadaamiiti susiima bruusi, anussara.m ^a^T1.0057^ea^  pettipitaamahaana.m..
text.968: [21] kaa.laa ^a^V1.0038^ea^ ^a^M1.0041^ea^ migaa setadantaa  mamiime {mama ime (sii0 pii0)}, parosata.m hemajaalaabhicchannaa.
text.969: [22] te te dadaamiiti vadaami maa.nava, anussara.m  pettipitaamahaananti..
text.973: [21] ya.m nu gijjho yojanasata.m, ku.napaani avekkhati.
text.974: [22] kasmaa jaala~nca paasa~nca, aasajjaapi na bujjhasi..
text.977: [22] atha jaala~nca paasa~nca, aasajjaapi na bujjhatiiti..
text.982: [22] vivariya daa.tha.m sesi {sayasi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, kuto te bhayamaagata.m..
text.985: [22] abhayaa bhayamuppanna.m, api muulaani kantatiiti {muula.m nikantatiiti (sii0)}..
text.990: [22] asmi.m padese da.d.dhaani, natthi loke anaamata.m..
text.992: [21] yamhi ^a^T1.0058^ea^ sacca~nca dhammo ca, ahi.msaa sa.myamo damo.
text.993: [22] eta.m ariyaa sevanti, eta.m loke anaamatanti..
text.997: [21] abhutvaa ^a^M1.0042^ea^ bhikkhasi bhikkhu, na hi  bhutvaana bhikkhasi.
text.998: [22] bhutvaana bhikkhu bhikkhassu, maa ta.m kaalo upaccagaa..
text.1000: [21] kaala.m ^a^V1.0039^ea^ voha.m na jaanaami, channo kaalo na  dissati.
text.1001: [22] tasmaa abhutvaa bhikkhaami, maa ma.m kaalo upaccagaati..
text.1008: [21] soha.m nayena sampanno, pettike gocare rato.
text.1014: [22] uddha.m ^a^T1.0059^ea^ adho ca tiriya.m, appamaa.nena sabbaso..
text.1017: [22] ya.m pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m, na ta.m tatraavasissatiiti..
text.1029: [21] atha ^a^M1.0043^ea^ indasamaana sapa.n.naku.ti,  susimuttama gijjha jalaabujako.
text.1030: [22] upasaa.laka bhikkhu salaapavaro, atha mettavaro  dasapu.n.namatiiti..
text.1034: [21] kalyaa.nadhammoti ^a^T1.0060^ea^ ^a^V1.0040^ea^ yadaa janinda, loke  sama~n~na.m anupaapu.naati.
text.1035: [22] tasmaa na hiyyetha {hiiyetha (sii0)} naro sapa~n~no, hiriyaapi santo  dhuramaadiyanti..
text.1037: [21] saaya.m sama~n~naa idha majja pattaa, kalyaa.nadhammoti  janinda loke.
text.1038: [22] taaha.m samekkha.m idha pabbajissa.m, na hi matthi chando  idha kaamabhogeti..
text.1042: [21] ko nu saddena mahataa, abhinaadeti daddara.m.
text.1043: [22] ta.m siihaa nappa.tinadanti {ki.m siihaa nappa.tinadanti (sii0 pii0), na siihaa  pa.tinadanti (ka0)}, ko naameso migaadhibhuu..
text.1053: [21] maa kho tva.m taata pakkosi, duuseyya no agaaraka.m.
text.1058: [21] adamha te vaari pahuutaruupa.m, ghammaabhitattassa pipaasitassa.
text.1059: [22] so daani pitvaana {piitvaana (sii0 pii0)} kiri"nkarosi {kiki.mkarosi  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, asa"ngamo paapajanena  seyyo..
text.1061: [21] ko te suto vaa di.t.tho vaa, siilavaa naama makka.to.
text.1062: [22] idaani kho ta.m ohaccha.m {uuhacca (sii0 pii0), ohacca.m (syaa0), uhajja.m  (ka0)}, esaa asmaaka dhammataati..
text.1070: [22] aggihutta~nca ^a^T1.0062^ea^ uhanna.m {uuhanta.m (sii0), uuhana.m (syaa0), uuhanti (pii0),  uhada.m (ka0)}, dve ca bhinnaa kama.n.daluuti..
text.1074: [21] baalo ^a^M1.0045^ea^ vataaya.m dumasaakhagocaro, pa~n~naa  janinda nayimassa vijjati.
text.1075: [22] ka.laayamu.t.thi.m {kalaayamu.t.thi.m (sii0 pii0)} avakiriya kevala.m, eka.m ka.laaya.m patita.m  gavesati..
text.1077: [21] evameva maya.m raaja, ye ca~n~ne atilobhino.
text.1085: [21] appeva bahukiccaana.m, attho jaayetha koci na.m.
text.1090: [21] janitta.m ^a^T1.0063^ea^ me bhavitta.m me, iti pa"nke avassayi.m.
text.1091: [22] ta.m ma.m pa"nko ajjhabhavi, yathaa dubbalaka.m tathaa.
text.1092: [22] ta.m ta.m vadaami bhaggava, su.nohi vacana.m mama..
text.1094: [21] gaame vaa yadi vaa ra~n~ne, sukha.m yatraadhigacchati.
text.1096: [22] yamhi jiive tamhi gacche, na niketahato siyaati..
text.1100: [21] ta~nca ^a^V1.0042^ea^ appa~nca ucchi.t.tha.m, ta~nca kicchena no  adaa.
text.1101: [22] soha.m braahma.najaatiko, ya.m bhutta.m tampi uggata.m..
text.1103: [21] eva.m ^a^M1.0046^ea^ dhamma.m nira.mkatvaa {niraakatvaa (?)  ni + aa + kara + tvaa}, yo adhammena  jiivati.
text.1111: [21] tasmaa sata~nca asata.m, naanaa hoti ito gati.
text.1112: [22] asanto ^a^T1.0064^ea^ niraya.m yanti, santo saggaparaaya.naati {paraayanaa (syaa0 ka0)}..
text.1124: [21] sabbaamitte ra.na.m katvaa, na ca ka~nci vihe.thayi.
text.1132: [21] omadda khippa.m paligha.m, esikaani ca abbaha {ubbaha  (syaa0), abbhuha (ka0)}.
text.1133: [22] tora.naani ca madditvaa, khippa.m pavisa ku~njaraati..
text.1137: [21] vaalodaka.m apparasa.m nihiina.m, pitvaa {piitvaa (sii0  pii0)} mado jaayati  gadrabhaana.m.
text.1138: [22] ima~nca pitvaana rasa.m pa.niita.m, mado na sa~njaayati  sindhavaana.m..
text.1140: [21] appa.m pivitvaana nihiinajacco, so majjatii tena janinda  pu.t.tho {phu.t.tho (sii0 syaa0), mu.t.tho (ka0)}.
text.1141: [22] dhorayhasiilii ca kulamhi jaato, na majjatii aggarasa.m  pivitvaati..
text.1148: [21] sace ^a^T1.0066^ea^ ca tanujo poso, sikharaakaara {si"ngaaraakaara  (syaa0)} kappito.
text.1149: [22] aanane na.m {ta.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} gahetvaana, ma.n.dale parivattaye.
text.1154: [21] yathodake ^a^M1.0048^ea^ aavile appasanne, na  passati sippikasambuka~nca.
text.1155: [22] sakkhara.m vaaluka.m macchagumba.m, eva.m aavilamhi {aavile hi (sii0)} citte.
text.1158: [21] yathodake ^a^V1.0044^ea^ acche vippasanne, so passati  sippikasambuka~nca.
text.1159: [22] sakkhara.m vaaluka.m macchagumba.m, eva.m anaavilamhi citte.
text.1168: [22] muula.m muulena sa.msa.t.tha.m, saakhaa saakhaa {saakha.m (syaa0 ka0)} nisevare  {niviisare (ka0)}.
text.1176: [21] ya.m suva.n.no suva.n.nena {ya.m supa.n.no supa.n.nena (sii0  syaa0 pii0)}, devo devena mantaye.
text.1177: [22] ki.m tettha catuma.t.thassa, bila.m pavisa jambukaati..
text.1182: [22] so siiho siihasa"nghamhi, eko nadati a~n~nathaa..
text.1184: [21] maa ^a^T1.0068^ea^ tva.m nadi raajaputta, appasaddo vane vasa.
text.1185: [22] sarena kho {maa (ka0)} ta.m jaaneyyu.m, na hi te pettiko saroti..
text.1189: [21] neta.m siihassa nadita.m, na byagghassa na {byagghassa na  ca (ka0)} diipino.
text.1192: [21] cirampi ^a^V1.0045^ea^ kho ta.m khaadeyya, gadrabho harita.m  yava.m.
text.1197: [21] passa saddhaaya siilassa, caagassa ca aya.m phala.m.
text.1206: [22] dadhivaahana jambuuka siihanakho, haritayava naagavarena  dasaati..
text.1210: [21] api ^a^M1.0050^ea^ {ambho (syaa0 ka0 sii0)} ruhaka chinnaapi, jiyaa sandhiiyate  puna.
text.1211: [22] sandhiiyassu puraa.niyaa, maa kodhassa vasa.m gami..
text.1213: [21] vijjamaanesu vaakesu {vijjamaanaasu maruvaasu (sii0),  vijjamaanaasu maruudvaasu (pii0)}, vijjamaanesu kaarisu.
text.1218: [21] itthii siyaa ruupavatii, saa ca siilavatii siyaa.
text.1219: [22] puriso ta.m na iccheyya, saddahaasi mahosadha..
text.1222: [22] sirii ^a^T1.0070^ea^ ca kaa.laka.n.nii ca, na samenti kudaacananti..
text.1226: [21] ayameva saa ahamapi {ahampi (sii0 syaa0 pii0),  ahamsi (ka0)} so ana~n~no, ayameva so  hatthacchinno ana~n~no.
text.1227: [22] yamaaha ``komaarapatii mama''nti, vajjhitthiyo natthi  itthiisu sacca.m..
text.1229: [21] ima~nca jamma.m musalena hantvaa, ludda.m chava.m paradaaruupasevi.m.
text.1230: [22] imissaa ca na.m paapapatibbataaya, jiivantiyaa chindatha  ka.n.nanaasanti..
text.1234: [21] na ^a^M1.0051^ea^ santi devaa pavasanti nuuna, na hi  nuuna santi idha lokapaalaa.
text.1235: [22] sahasaa karontaanamasa~n~nataana.m, na hi nuuna santii  pa.tisedhitaaro..
text.1237: [21] akaale vassatii tassa, kaale tassa na vassati.
text.1238: [22] saggaa ^a^T1.0071^ea^ ca cavati .thaanaa, nanu so taavataa hatoti..
text.1242: [21] pabbatuupatthare {pabbatapatthare (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ramme,  jaataa pokkhara.nii sivaa.
text.1243: [22] ta.m si"ngaalo apaapaayi {apaapaasi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, jaana.m siihena rakkhita.m..
text.1245: [21] pivanti ce {pivanti ve (sii0), pivantiva (pii0),  pivanteva (?)} mahaaraaja, saapadaani mahaanadi.m.
text.1246: [22] na tena anadii hoti, khamassu yadi te piyaati..
text.1250: [21] ye na kaahanti ovaada.m, naraa buddhena desita.m.
text.1253: [21] ye ^a^V1.0047^ea^ ca kaahanti ovaada.m, naraa buddhena  desita.m.
text.1254: [22] sotthi.m paara.m gamissanti, valaaheneva {vaalaaheneva (sii0 pii0)} vaa.nijaati..
text.1258: [21] na na.m umhayate disvaa, na ca na.m pa.tinandati.
text.1259: [22] cakkhuuni cassa na dadaati, pa.tiloma~nca vattati..
text.1262: [22] yehi amitta.m jaaneyya, disvaa sutvaa ca pa.n.ditoti..
text.1267: [22] kaccinnu taata te maataa, na a~n~namupasevati..
text.1269: [21] na kho paneta.m subha.na.m, gira.m saccupasa.mhita.m.
text.1270: [22] sayetha po.t.thapaadova, mummure {mummure (syaa0), ma.m pure (ka0) mummurasaddo  thusaggimhi kukku.le ca vattatiiti sakkataabhidhaanesu} upakuuthitoti  {upakuusitoti (sii0 syaa0 pii0), upakuulito (ka0)}..
text.1274: [21] ubhaya.m me na khamati, ubhaya.m me na ruccati.
text.1277: [21] ta.m ta.m gaamapati bruumi, kadare appasmi jiivite.
text.1278: [22] dve maase sa"ngara.m katvaa {kaara.m katvaana (sii0 pii0), sa.mkara.m katvaa (ka0)}, ma.msa.m  jaraggava.m kisa.m.
text.1279: [22] appattakaale codesi, tampi mayha.m na ruccatiiti..
text.1284: [22] braahma.na.m teva pucchaama, kannu tesa.m vanimhase {va.nimhase (sii0 pii0)}..
text.1286: [21] attho ^a^V1.0048^ea^ atthi sariirasmi.m, vu.d.dhabyassa namo  kare.
text.1287: [22] attho atthi sujaatasmi.m, siila.m asmaaka ruccatiiti..
text.1292: [22] atha muttimavaa.nija umhayate, ciraaagata ko.t.tha sariira  dasaati..
text.1296: [21] na ta.m da.lha.m bandhanamaahu dhiiraa, yadaayasa.m daarujapabbaja~nca  {babbaja~nca (sii0)}.
text.1297: [22] saarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu, puttesu ^a^T1.0074^ea^ daaresu ca yaa  apekkhaa..
text.1299: [21] eta.m da.lha.m bandhanamaahu dhiiraa, ohaarina.m sithila.m  duppamu~nca.m.
text.1300: [22] etampi chetvaana vajanti dhiiraa, anapekkhino kaamasukha.m  pahaayaati..
text.1304: [21] ha.msaa ko~ncaa mayuuraa ca, hatthayo {hatthino (sii0),  hatthiyo (syaa0 pii0)} pasadaa migaa.
text.1305: [22] sabbe siihassa bhaayanti, natthi kaayasmi tulyataa..
text.1308: [22] so hi tattha mahaa hoti, neva baalo sariiravaati..
text.1312: [21] viruupakkhehi me metta.m, metta.m eraapathehi me.
text.1313: [22] chabyaaputtehi me metta.m, metta.m ka.nhaagotamakehi ca..
text.1314: [21] apaadakehi ^a^V1.0049^ea^ ^a^M1.0054^ea^ me metta.m, metta.m  dvipaadakehi me.
text.1315: [22] catuppadehi me metta.m, metta.m bahuppadehi me..
text.1316: [21] maa ^a^T1.0075^ea^ ma.m apaadako hi.msi, maa ma.m hi.msi dvipaadako.
text.1317: [22] maa ma.m catuppado hi.msi, maa ma.m hi.msi bahuppado..
text.1318: [21] sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa, sabbe bhuutaa ca kevalaa.
text.1319: [22] sabbe bhadraani passantu, maa ka~nci {ki~nci (syaa0 ka0)} paapamaagamaa..
text.1322: [27] appamaa.no sa"ngho, pamaa.navantaani sariisapaani {sirisapaani (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}.
text.1324: [21] kataa me rakkhaa kataa me parittaa, pa.tikkamantu bhuutaani.
text.1325: [22] soha.m namo bhagavato, namo sattanna.m sammaasambuddhaananti..
text.1337: [21] sobhati maccho ga"ngeyyo, atho sobhati  yaamuno {sobhanti macchaa ga"ngeyyaa, atho sobhanti yaamunaa (syaa0 pii0)}.
text.1341: [21] ya.m ^a^M1.0055^ea^ pucchito na ta.m akkhaasi {akkhaa  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, a~n~na.m akkhaasi {akkhaati (syaa0 pii0)} pucchito.
text.1346: [21] i"ngha ^a^V1.0050^ea^ vaddhamaya.m {vaddhamaya.m (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} paasa.m, chinda dantehi  kacchapa.
text.1347: [22] aha.m tathaa karissaami, yathaa nehiti luddako..
text.1349: [21] kacchapo paavisii vaari.m, kuru"ngo paavisii vana.m.
text.1355: [22] anukaamaya kaamena {anukaamayavanukaamena (sii0 pii0)}, piyena patinaa saha..
text.1357: [21] navena sukhadukkhena, poraa.na.m apidhiiyati {apithiiyati  (sii0 pii0), apithiyyati (syaa0)}.
text.1362: [21] ala.m ^a^T1.0077^ea^ metehi ambehi, jambuuhi panasehi ca.
text.1363: [22] yaani paara.m samuddassa, vara.m mayha.m udumbaro..
text.1365: [21] mahatii vata te bondi, na ca pa~n~naa taduupikaa.
text.1366: [22] susumaara {su.msumaara (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} va~ncito mesi, gaccha daani yathaasukhanti..
text.1370: [21] di.t.thaa ^a^M1.0056^ea^ mayaa vane rukkhaa, assaka.n.naa  vibhii.takaa {vibhedakaa (syaa0 ka0)}.
text.1371: [22] na taani eva.m sakkanti, yathaa tva.m rukkha sakkasi..
text.1373: [21] puraa.nakukku.to {kakkaro (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aya.m, bhetvaa pa~njaramaagato.
text.1378: [21] ambho ^a^V1.0051^ea^ ko naama ya.m rukkho, sinnapatto  {siinapatto (sii0 pii0)} saka.n.tako.
text.1379: [22] yattha ekappahaarena, uttama"nga.m vibhijjita.m {visaa.tika.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0),  vighaa.tita.m (sii0 niyya)}..
text.1381: [21] acaari vataaya.m vituda.m vanaani, ka.t.tha"ngarukkhesu asaarakesu.
text.1382: [22] athaasadaa ^a^T1.0078^ea^ khadira.m jaatasaara.m {jaatisaara.m (ka0)}, yatthabbhidaa garu.lo  uttama"nganti..
text.1386: [21] da.lhabandhana ha.msavaro ca puna, viruupakkha savi.t.thaka  macchavaro.
text.1387: [22] sakuru"nga saassaka ambavaro, puna kukku.tako garu.lena  dasaati..
text.1392: [22] byaakaasi sa~n~na.m parisa.m vigayha, na niyyamo taayati  appapa~n~na.m..
text.1395: [22] alaabha.m ^a^T1.0079^ea^ dhanalaabha.m vaa, eva.m dhammaa hi yaacanaati..
text.1399: [21] a~n~no uparimo va.n.no, a~n~no va.n.no ca he.t.thimo.
text.1400: [22] braahma.nii tveva pucchaami, ki.m he.t.thaa ki~nca uppari..
text.1403: [22] aya~nhi ko.t.thamoti.n.no, aya.m so ya.m {tva.m (ka0)} gavesasiiti..
text.1408: [22] ucchinno saha ra.t.thehi {ra.t.thena (sii0 pii0)}, saraajaa vibhava"ngato..
text.1415: [21] pu.n.na.m nadi.m yena ca peyyamaahu, jaata.m ^a^T1.0080^ea^ yava.m yena ca  guyhamaahu.
text.1416: [22] duura.m gata.m yena ca avhayanti, so tyaagato {tyaabhato (syaa0 ka0)  pahe.ligaathaabhaavo manasi kaatabbo} handa ca  bhu~nja braahma.na..
text.1418: [21] yato ma.m saratii raajaa, vaayasampi pahetave.
text.1419: [22] ha.msaa ko~ncaa mayuuraa ca {ha.msako~ncamayuuraana.m (ka0 a.t.tha0 paa.thantara.m)}, asatiiyeva paapiyaati..
text.1423: [21] avadhii ^a^M1.0058^ea^ vata attaana.m, kacchapo byaahara.m  gira.m {kacchapova pabyaahara.m (syaa0), kacchapo so pabyaahara.m (ka0)}.
text.1426: [21] etampi disvaa naraviiriyase.t.tha, vaaca.m pamu~nce kusala.m  naativela.m.
text.1431: [21] na maayamaggi tapati, na suulo saadhutacchito.
text.1432: [22] ya~nca ma.m ma~n~nate macchii, a~n~na.m so ratiyaa gato..
text.1434: [21] so ^a^T1.0081^ea^ ma.m dahati raagaggi, citta.m cuupatapeti ma.m.
text.1435: [22] jaalino mu~ncathaayiraa ma.m, na kaame ha~n~nate kvaciiti..
text.1439: [21] sabbo ^a^V1.0053^ea^ loko attamano ahosi, akovidaa  gaamadhammassa seggu.
text.1440: [22] komaari ko naama {komaarikaa naama (ka0), komaariko naama (syaa0  pii0)} tavajja dhammo, ya.m tva.m gahitaa pavane  parodasi..
text.1442: [21] yo dukkhaphu.t.thaaya bhaveyya taa.na.m, so me pitaa dubbhi vane  karoti.
text.1443: [22] saa kassa kandaami vanassa majjhe, yo taayitaa so  sahasa.m karotiiti..
text.1447: [21] sa.thassa ^a^M1.0059^ea^ saa.theyyamida.m sucintita.m,  pacco.d.dita.m pa.tikuu.tassa kuu.ta.m.
text.1448: [22] phaala~nce khaadeyyu.m {adeyyu.m (sii0 pii0)} muusikaa, kasmaa kumaara.m kulalaa  na {no (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} hareyyu.m..
text.1450: [21] kuu.tassa ^a^T1.0082^ea^ hi santi {santiidha (ka0)} kuu.takuu.taa, bhavati  {bhavanti (ka0)} caapi nikatino nikatyaa.
text.1451: [22] dehi puttana.t.tha phaalana.t.thassa phaala.m, maa te puttamahaasi  phaalana.t.thoti..
text.1455: [21] hira~n~na.m me suva.n.na.m me, esaa ratti.m divaa kathaa.
text.1458: [21] dve dve gahapatayo gehe, eko tattha amassuko.
text.1460: [22] kiito dhanena bahunaa, so ta.m vitudate jananti..
text.1465: [22] so ekako rukkhamuule {ara~n~nasmi.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, kapa.no viya jhaayasi..
text.1468: [22] so ekako rukkhamuule, kapa.no viya jhaayaami.
text.1474: [22] bahubhaa.ni aggipavane muusikaa, sahalambatthano kapa.nena  dasaati..
text.1478: [21] anikkasaavo kaasaava.m, yo vattha.m paridahissati  {paridahessati (sii0 pii0)}.
text.1487: [22] maasu tva.m akari {akaraa (sii0 pii0)} paapa.m, ya.m tva.m pacchaa kata.m tape..
text.1489: [21] yaani karoti puriso, taani attani passati.
text.1491: [22] yaadisa.m vapate biija.m, taadisa.m harate phalanti..
text.1495: [21] name ^a^V1.0055^ea^ namantassa bhaje bhajanta.m,  kiccaanukubbassa kareyya kicca.m.
text.1496: [22] naanatthakaamassa kareyya attha.m, asambhajantampi na  sambhajeyya..
text.1498: [21] caje ^a^M1.0061^ea^ cajanta.m vanatha.m na kayiraa,  apetacittena na sambhajeyya.
text.1499: [22] dijo duma.m khii.naphalanti ~natvaa, a~n~na.m samekkheyya mahaa  hi lokoti..
text.1503: [21] yassete ^a^T1.0085^ea^ caturo dhammaa, vaanarinda yathaa tava.
text.1504: [22] sacca.m dhammo dhiti caago, di.t.tha.m so ativattati..
text.1506: [21] yassa cete na vijjanti, gu.naa paramabhaddakaa.
text.1507: [22] sacca.m dhammo dhiti caago, di.t.tha.m so naativattatiiti..
text.1511: [21] atthi me puriso deva, sabbakiccesu byaava.to {vaava.to  (ka0)}.
text.1512: [22] tassa cekoparaadhatthi, tattha tva.m kinti ma~n~nasi..
text.1519: [21] kaale nikkhamanaa saadhu, naakaale saadhu nikkhamo.
text.1521: [22] na ki~nci attha.m joteti, dha"nkasenaava kosiya.m..
text.1529: [22] ehi naaga nivattassu, ki.m nu bhiito palaayasi.
text.1532: [21] na ta.m paadaa vadhissaami, na dantehi na so.n.diyaa.
text.1533: [22] mii.lhena ta.m vadhissaami, puuti ha~n~natu puutinaati..
text.1537: [21] tayo giri.m antara.m kaamayaami, pa~ncaalaa kuruyo kekake  ca {kurayo kekaye ca (sii0)}.
text.1538: [22] tatuttari.m {taduttari.m (ka0)} braahma.na kaamayaami, tikiccha ma.m braahma.na  kaamaniita.m..
text.1540: [21] ka.nhaahida.t.thassa karonti heke, amanussapavi.t.thassa  {amanussavaddhassa (sii0 pii0), amanussavi.t.thassa (syaa0)} karonti pa.n.ditaa.
text.1541: [22] na kaamaniitassa karoti koci, okkantasukkassa ^a^T1.0087^ea^ hi kaa  tikicchaati..
text.1545: [21] gajaggameghehi hayaggamaalibhi, rathuumijaatehi  saraabhivassebhi {saraabhivassabhi (syaa0 sii0 a.t.tha0), saraabhivassibhi (?)}.
text.1548: [21] {abhidhaavathaa ca patathaa ca, vividhavinaditaa ca  dantibhi. vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathaa vijjutaa jaladharassa  gajjatoti. (sii0 pii0 ka0)} abhidhaavatha ^a^M1.0063^ea^ cuupadhaavatha ca  {abhidhaavathaa cuppatathaa ca (syaa0)}, vividhaa  vinaaditaa {vinaaditattha (ka0)} vadantibhi.
text.1549: [22] vattatajja tumulo ghoso yathaa, vijjulataa jaladharassa  gajjatoti {abhidhaavathaa ca patathaa ca, vividhavinaditaa ca dantibhi. vattatajja  tumulo ghoso, yathaa vijjutaa jaladharassa gajjatoti. (sii0 pii0  ka0)}..
text.1553: [21] dhajamaparimita.m anantapaara.m, duppasaha.mdha"nkehi saagara.mva  {saagaramiva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.1554: [22] girimivaanilena duppasayho {duppasaho (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, duppasaho ahamajjataadisena..
text.1556: [21] maa ^a^T1.0088^ea^ baaliya.m vilapi {vippalapi (bahuusu)} na hissa taadisa.m,  vi.dayhase {vi.layhase (sii0 pii0)} na hi labhase nisedhaka.m.
text.1557: [22] aasajjasi gajamiva ekacaarina.m, yo ta.m padaa na.lamiva  pothayissatiiti..
text.1562: [22] dha"nkamagadhaa ca tayogirinaama, gajaggavaro dhajavarena  dasaati..
text.1566: [21] yathaapi ^a^M1.0064^ea^ kiitaa purisassupaahanaa,  sukhassa atthaaya dukha.m udabbahe.
text.1567: [22] ghammaabhitattaa thalasaa papii.litaa, tasseva paade purisassa  khaadare..
text.1569: [21] evameva ^a^T1.0089^ea^ yo dukkuliino anariyo, tammaaka {tamhaaka  (sii0), tumhaaka (syaa0 pii0)} vijja~nca  suta~nca aadiya.
text.1570: [22] tameva so tattha sutena khaadati, anariyo vuccati  dupaahanuupamoti {paanaduupamoti (sii0 pii0)}..
text.1575: [22] na hi khujjena vaamena, bhoti sa"ngantumarahasi..
text.1578: [22] soya.m sa.mku.tito seti, chinnatanti yathaa vi.naati {thu.naati (sii0)}..
text.1582: [21] kaama.m yahi.m icchasi tena gaccha, viddhosi mammamhi  {mamasmi (ka0)}  vika.n.nakena.
text.1583: [22] hatosi bhattena suvaaditena {savaaditena (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, lolo ca macche  anubandhamaano..
text.1586: [22] so ha~n~nati ~naatisakhaana majjhe, macchaanugo soriva  su.msumaaroti {susumaaro (ka0)}..
text.1590: [21] tvameva ^a^V1.0058^ea^ daanimakara {makari (syaa0),  makaraa (ka0 sii0)}, ya.m kaamo byagamaa tayi.
text.1593: [21] atriccha.m {atricchaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} atilobhena, atilobhamadena ca.
text.1599: [22] yattha bhutvaa pivitvaa ca, sayeyyaatha anussuko..
text.1603: [22] eva.m chidda.m durabhisambhava.m {durabhibhava.m (sii0 pii0)}, ko ghara.m pa.tipajjatiiti..
text.1611: [22] amhe dijo na paaleti, tena pakkhii na phandatiiti..
text.1615: [21] ko ^a^M1.0066^ea^ nu kho bhagavaa hetu, ekacce idha  puggale.
text.1619: [22] eva.m ta.m jaayate pema.m, uppala.mva yathodaketi..
text.1628: [22] ala.m ^a^T1.0092^ea^ mitte sukhaapetu.m, amittaana.m dukhaaya caati..
text.1632: [21] aasiivisampi ma.m {aasiivisa.m mama.m (sii0 pii0)} santa.m, pavi.t.tha.m kuminaamukha.m.
text.1633: [22] ruccate haritaamaataa, ya.m ma.m khaadanti macchakaa..
text.1636: [22] yadaa ca~n~ne vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatiiti {viluppatiiti (?)}..
text.1640: [21] sabbo jano hi.msito pi"ngalena, tasmi.m mate paccayaa  {paccaya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vedayanti.
text.1641: [22] piyo nu te aasi aka.nhanetto, kasmaa nu tva.m rodasi  dvaarapaala..
text.1643: [21] na ^a^M1.0067^ea^ me piyo aasi aka.nhanetto,  bhaayaami paccaagamanaaya tassa.
text.1644: [22] ito gato hi.mseyya maccuraaja.m, so hi.msito aaneyya puna  idha..
text.1647: [22] parikkhataa ^a^T1.0093^ea^ ca saa bhuumi, maa bhaayi naagamissatiiti..
text.1660: [22] so hi tattha mahaa hoti, si"ngaalo viya daa.thinanti..
text.1664: [21] baalo ^a^T1.0094^ea^ vataaya.m sunakho, yo varatta.m {yo ca yotta.m  (ka0)} na khaadati.
text.1665: [22] bandhanaa ca pamu~nceyya, asito ca ghara.m vaje..
text.1667: [21] a.t.thita.m ^a^M1.0068^ea^ me manasmi.m me, atho me hadaye  kata.m.
text.1668: [22] kaala~nca pa.tika"nkhaami, yaava passupatuu jano {pasupatujjano (syaa0 ka0)}..
text.1673: [22] so ma.m ra"ngamhi avheti, sara.na.m me hohi kosiya..
text.1675: [21] aha.m ta.m sara.na.m samma {aha.m te sara.na.m homi  (vi0 va0 328)}, ahamaacariyapuujako.
text.1676: [22] na ta.m jayissati sisso, sissamaacariya jessasiiti..
text.1680: [21] ya.m passati na ta.m icchati, ya~nca na passati ta.m  kiricchati.
text.1681: [22] ma~n~naami cira.m carissati, na hi ta.m lacchati ya.m sa  icchati..
text.1683: [21] ya.m labhati na tena tussati, ya~nca pattheti laddha.m hii.leti.
text.1684: [22] icchaa hi anantagocaraa, vigaticchaana {viiticchaana.m (sii0 pii0)} namo karomaseti..
text.1689: [22] yo ca kaalaghaso bhuuto, sa bhuutapacani.m paci..
text.1696: [21] hantvaa chetvaa {jhatvaa (sii0 pii0), ghatvaa (syaa0)} vadhitvaa  ca, deti daana.m asa~n~nato.
text.1697: [22] edisa.m bhatta.m bhu~njamaano, sa paapamupalimpati {sa paapena upalippati (sii0  pii0)}..
text.1699: [21] puttadaarampi ^a^M1.0069^ea^ ce hantvaa, deti daana.m  asa~n~nato.
text.1705: [22] tathaa hi o.t.tha.m bha~njati, uttari.m nuuna passati..
text.1707: [21] naaya.m dhamma.m adhamma.m vaa, atthaanattha~nca bujjhati.
text.1716: [22] te ve dhammesu ka"nkhanti, ki.msukasmi.mva bhaataroti..
text.1720: [21] ekaputtako ^a^V1.0062^ea^ bhavissasi, tva~nca no hessasi  issaro kule.

text.2178: [22] yo bhaatara.m pettika.m saapateyya.m, ava~ncayii  dukka.takammakaariiti..
text.2183: [22] aha.m gaamavara.m icche, braahma.nii ca gava.m sata.m..
text.2185: [21] putto ca aaja~n~naratha.m, ka~n~naa ca ma.niku.n.dala.m.
text.2194: [21] siila.m kireva kalyaa.na.m, siila.m loke anuttara.m.
text.2195: [22] passa ghoraviso naago, siilavaati na ha~n~nati..
text.2197: [21] soha.m siila.m samaadissa.m, loke anumata.m siva.m.
text.2206: [22] anusaasaniyopi ca macchavaro, ma.niku.n.dalakena kirena  dasaati..
text.2211: [22] yaava na.m anupaaleti, taava so sukhamedhati..
text.2213: [21] yadaa matto ca ditto ca, pamaadaa kumbhamabbhidaa.
text.2214: [22] tadaa naggo ca pottho ca, pacchaa baalo viha~n~nati..
text.2216: [21] evameva yo dhana.m laddhaa, pamatto {amattaa (sii0),  amatto (pii0)} paribhu~njati.
text.2217: [22] pacchaa ^a^T1.0122^ea^ tappati dummedho, ku.ta.m bhitvaava {ku.ta.m bhinnova (sii0 pii0),  ku.tabhinnova (?)} dhuttakoti..
text.2221: [21] baaraa.nasya.m {baaraa.nassa.m (sii0 pii0)} mahaaraaja,  kaakaraajaa nivaasako {nivaasiko (sii0 pii0)}.
text.2224: [21] tassa doha.linii bhariyaa, suphassaa bhakkhitumicchati  {macchamicchati (sii0 pii0)}.
text.2227: [21] tesaaha.m pahito duuto, ra~n~no camhi idhaagato.
text.2228: [22] bhattu apaciti.m kummi, naasaayamakara.m {makari.m (sii0 nissaya)} va.nanti..
text.2232: [21] phu.t.thassa ^a^M1.0089^ea^ me a~n~natarena byaadhinaa,  rogena baa.lha.m dukhitassa ruppato.
text.2233: [22] parisussati khippamida.m ka.levara.m, puppha.m yathaa pa.msuni  aatape kata.m..
text.2238: [21] dhiratthuma.m ^a^T1.0123^ea^ aatura.m puutikaaya.m, jegucchiya.m assuci.m  byaadhidhamma.m.
text.2239: [22] yatthappamattaa adhimucchitaa pajaa, haapenti magga.m  sugatuupapattiyaati..
text.2243: [21] koya.m bindussaro vaggu, saravantaana {pavadantaana  (sii0 pii0)} muttamo.
text.2246: [21] kulaputtova jaanaati {kulaputto pajaanaati (syaa0  ka0)}, kulaputta.m {kulaputte (sii0 pii0)} pasa.msitu.m.
text.2255: [22] migaraaja namo tyatthu, api ki~nci labhaamase..
text.2260: [21] migaana.m ^a^T1.0124^ea^ ^a^M1.0090^ea^ si"ngaalo {kotthuko (sii0  pii0), ko.t.thuko (syaa0)} anto, pakkhiina.m pana  vaayaso.
text.2261: [22] era.n.do anto rukkhaana.m, tayo antaa samaagataati..
text.2265: [21] ko naaya.m {ko nvaaya.m (syaa0)} lo.natoyasmi.m, samantaa paridhaavati.
text.2266: [22] macche makare ca vaareti, uumiisu ca viha~n~nati..
text.2271: [21] so ^a^V1.0079^ea^ aya.m haayati ceva, puurate ca mahodadhi.
text.2272: [22] naassa naayati piitanto, apeyyo kira saagaroti..
text.2277: [22] vajjaasi kho tva.m vaamuuru.m, cira.m kho saa karissati {sarissati (ka0)}..
text.2279: [21] ida.m kho saa na jaanaati, asi.m satti~nca o.d.dita.m.
text.2280: [22] saa ca.n.dii kaahati kodha.m, ta.m me tapati no ida.m {no idha (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}..
text.2282: [21] esa ^a^T1.0125^ea^ uppalasannaaho, nikkha~ncussiisakohita.m  {nikkhamussiisake kata.m (sii0 pii0), nikkha~ncussiisake kata.m  (syaa0)}.
text.2283: [22] kaasika~nca mudu.m vattha.m, tappetu dhanikaa piyaati {dhanakaamiyaati (syaa0  pii0), dhanakaamikaati (sii0)}..
text.2287: [21] udumbaraa cime pakkaa, nigrodhaa ca kapitthanaa.
text.2288: [22] ehi nikkhama bhu~njassu, ki.m jighacchaaya miyyasi..
text.2290: [21] eva.m ^a^M1.0091^ea^ so suhito hoti, yo  vu.d.dhamapacaayati.
text.2293: [21] ya.m vanejo vanejassa, va~nceyya kapino kapi.
text.2294: [22] daharo kapi {daharopi ta.m na (sii0 pii0), daharopi na (syaa0)} saddheyya,  na hi ji.n.no jaraakapiiti..
text.2298: [21] pure tuva.m siilavata.m sakaase, okkantika.m {okkandika.m  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kii.lasi assamamhi.
text.2299: [22] karohare {karohi re (ka0)} makka.tiyaani makka.ta, na ta.m maya.m siilavata.m ramaama..
text.2301: [21] sutaa ^a^T1.0126^ea^ hi mayha.m paramaa visuddhi, komaaraputtassa  bahussutassa.
text.2302: [22] maa daani ma.m ma~n~ni tuva.m yathaa pure, jhaanaanuyutto  viharaami {jhaanaanuyuttaa viharaama (sii0 pii0)} aavuso..
text.2304: [21] sacepi selasmi vapeyya biija.m, devo ca vasse na hi ta.m  viruu.lhe {neva hi ta.m ruheyya (sii0 pii0), na hi ta.m viruuhe (?)}.
text.2305: [22] sutaa hi te saa paramaa visuddhi, aaraa tuva.m makka.ta  jhaanabhuumiyaati..
text.2321: [22] sarita.mpati ca.n.di jaraakapinaa, atha makka.tiyaa vakakena  dasaati..
text.2330: [21] vivarathimaasa.m ^a^T1.0128^ea^ ^a^V1.0081^ea^ ^a^M1.0093^ea^ {vivaratha imaasa.m  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} dvaara.m, nagara.m  pavisantu {pavisitu.m mayaa. (ka0)} aru.naraajassa.
text.2331: [22] siihena susi.t.thena, surakkhita.m {susatthena, surakkhita.m (sii0 pii0),  susi.t.thena (ka0)} nandisenena..
text.2333: [21] jayo kali"ngaanamasayhasaahina.m, paraajayo anayo  {ajayo (syaa0), anvito (ka0)} assakaana.m.
text.2334: [22] icceva te bhaasita.m brahmacaari, na ujjubhuutaa vitatha.m  bha.nanti..
text.2336: [21] devaa musaavaadamupaativattaa, sacca.m dhana.m parama.m tesu {tatha.m  pemakara.m nu (ka0), tatha.m parama.m kara.m nu (syaa0)} sakka.
text.2337: [22] ta.m te musaa bhaasita.m devaraaja, ki.m vaa pa.ticca maghavaa  mahinda..
text.2339: [21] nanu te suta.m braahma.na bha~n~namaane, devaa na issanti  purisaparakkamassa.
text.2340: [27] damo samaadhi manaso abhejjo {adejjo (sii0 pii0), abhijjo (ka0)}, abyaggataa  ^a^T1.0129^ea^ nikkamana~nca {nikkhamana~nca (sii0)} kaale.
text.2341: [22] da.lha~nca viriya.m purisaparakkamo ca, teneva aasi  vijayo assakaananti..
text.2348: [21] naadeyyesu ^a^M1.0094^ea^ dada.m daana.m, deyyesu yo  pavecchati.
text.2352: [22] kata~nca ariyesu ca ajjavesu, mahapphala.m hoti a.numpi  taadisu..
text.2354: [21] yo pubbe katakalyaa.no, akaa loke sudukkara.m.
text.2355: [22] pacchaa kayiraa na vaa kayiraa, accanta.m puujanaarahoti..
text.2359: [21] anuttare ^a^T1.0130^ea^ ^a^V1.0082^ea^ kaamagu.ne samiddhe, bhutvaana pubbe  vasii ekaraaja.
text.2360: [22] so daani dugge narakamhi khitto, nappajjahe va.n.nabala.m  puraa.na.m..
text.2362: [21] pubbeva khantii ca tapo ca mayha.m, sampatthitaa dubbhisena  {dabbasenaa (sii0 pii0)} ahosi.
text.2363: [22] ta.m daani laddhaana katha.m nu raaja, jahe aha.m va.n.nabala.m  puraa.na.m..
text.2365: [21] sabbaa kireva.m parini.t.thitaani, yasassina.m pa~n~navanta.m  visayha.
text.2366: [22] yaso ca laddhaa purima.m u.laara.m, nappajjahe va.n.nabala.m puraa.na.m..
text.2368: [21] panujja dukkhena sukha.m janinda, sukhena vaa  dukkhamasayhasaahi.
text.2369: [22] ubhayattha santo abhinibbutattaa, sukhe ca dukkhe ca  bhavanti tulyaati..
text.2373: [21] imaani ^a^T1.0131^ea^ ^a^M1.0095^ea^ ma.m daddara taapayanti,  vaacaaduruttaani manussaloke.
text.2374: [22] ma.n.duukabhakkhaa udakantasevii, aasiivisa.m ma.m avisaa  sapanti..
text.2376: [21] sakaa ra.t.thaa pabbaajito, a~n~na.m janapada.m gato.
text.2379: [21] yattha posa.m na jaananti, jaatiyaa vinayena vaa.
text.2380: [22] na tattha maana.m kayiraatha, vasama~n~naatake jane..
text.2387: [21] natthi loke raho naama, paapakamma.m pakubbato.
text.2388: [22] passanti vanabhuutaani, ta.m baalo ma~n~natii raho..
text.2390: [21] aha.m raho na passaami, su~n~na.m vaapi na vijjati.
text.2391: [22] yattha a~n~na.m {su~n~na.m (syaa0 ka0)} na passaami, asu~n~na.m hoti ta.m mayaa..
text.2393: [21] dujjacco ca sujacco {ajacco (pii0)} ca,  nando ca sukhava.d.dhito {sukhavacchako (sii0), sukhavacchano (syaa0 pii0)}.
text.2394: [22] vejjo ^a^T1.0132^ea^ ca addhuvasiilo {atha siilo (ka0)} ca, te dhamma.m jahu matthikaa..
text.2396: [21] braahma.no ^a^V1.0083^ea^ ca katha.m jahe, sabbadhammaana paaraguu.
text.2402: [22] upalohitakaa vagguu, ta.m {te (pii0)} me akkhaahi pucchito..
text.2404: [21] yaani pure tuva.m devi, bha.n.du nantakavaasinii.
text.2405: [22] uccha"ngahatthaa pacinaasi, tassaa te koliya.m phala.m..
text.2407: [21] u.d.dayhate na ramati, bhogaa vippajahanti ta.m  {vippajahanti'ma.m (?)}.
text.2411: [22] khama deva sujaataaya, maassaa {maasu (ka0)} kujjha rathesabhaati..
text.2415: [21] acetana.m braahma.na assu.nanta.m, jaano ajaanantamima.m palaasa.m.
text.2416: [22] aaraddhaviriyo dhuva.m appamatto, sukhaseyya.m ^a^T1.0133^ea^ pucchasi  kissa hetu..
text.2418: [21] duure suto ceva brahaa ca rukkho, dese .thito  bhuutanivaasaruupo.
text.2419: [22] tasmaa namassaami ima.m palaasa.m, ye cettha bhuutaa te  {te ca (sii0 pii0)} dhanassa hetu..
text.2421: [21] so te karissaami yathaanubhaava.m, kata~n~nuta.m braahma.na  pekkhamaano.
text.2422: [22] katha~nhi aagamma sata.m sakaase, moghaani te assu  pariphanditaani..
text.2424: [21] yo ^a^M1.0097^ea^ tindukarukkhassa paro {puro (ka0)} pilakkho  {pilakkhu (sii0 pii0), milakkhu (ka0)},  parivaarito pubbaya~n~no u.laaro.
text.2425: [22] tassesa muulasmi.m nidhi nikhaato, adaayaado gaccha ta.m  uddharaahiiti..
text.2429: [21] akaramhasa te kicca.m, ya.m bala.m ahuvamhase.
text.2430: [22] migaraaja namo tyatthu, api ki~nci labhaamase..
text.2433: [22] dantantaragato santo, ta.m bahu.m yampi jiivasi..
text.2436: [22] yasmi.m kata~n~nutaa natthi, niratthaa tassa sevanaa..
text.2439: [22] anusuuya {anusuyya (sii0 pii0)} manakkosa.m, sa.nika.m tamhaa apakkameti..
text.2443: [21] sabbamida.m carima.m kata.m {carimavata.m (sii0 pii0)}, ubho dhamma.m na passare.
text.2444: [27] ubho pakatiyaa cutaa, yo caaya.m mantejjhaapeti {mantajjhaayati (sii0),  sajjhaapayati (pii0)}.
text.2448: [22] tasmaa eta.m na sevaami, dhamma.m isiihi sevita.m..
text.2451: [22] maa ta.m adhammo aacarito, asmaa kumbhamivaabhidaa..
text.2459: [22] na icche saha nindaaya, eva.m seyya {sayha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vijaanahi..
text.2465: [22] saayeva jiivikaa seyyo, yaa caadhammena esanaa..
text.2468: [22] a~n~na.m ahi.msaya.m loke, api rajjena ta.m varanti..
text.2472: [21] vivara~nca adeyya samiddhavara.m, atha daddara paapamahaatiraho.
text.2473: [22] atha koli palaasavara~nca kara, carima.m sasamuddavarena  dasaati..
text.2477: [21] u.t.thehi cora ki.m sesi, ko attho supanena {supitena  (sii0), supinena (pii0 ka0)} te.
text.2478: [22] maa ^a^T1.0136^ea^ ta.m gahesu.m {ga.nheyyu.m (ka0)} raajaano, gaame kibbisakaaraka.m..
text.2480: [21] ya.m ^a^M1.0099^ea^ nu {nuuna (syaa0)} cora.m gahessanti, gaame  kibbisakaaraka.m.
text.2481: [22] ki.m tattha pucimandassa, vane jaatassa ti.t.thato..
text.2483: [21] na tva.m assattha jaanaasi, mama corassa cantara.m.
text.2485: [22] appenti {accenti (syaa0)} nimbasuulasmi.m, tasmi.m me sa"nkate mano..
text.2492: [21] api kassapa mandiyaa, yuvaa sapati hanti  {sampa.tihanti (ka0)} vaa.
text.2493: [22] sabba.m ta.m khamate dhiiro, pa.n.dito ta.m titikkhati..
text.2495: [21] sacepi santo vivadanti, khippa.m sandhiiyare puna.
text.2496: [22] baalaa pattaava bhijjanti, na te samathamajjhaguu..
text.2498: [21] ete ^a^V1.0086^ea^ bhiyyo samaayanti, sandhi tesa.m na  jiirati.
text.2499: [22] yo caadhipanna.m jaanaati, yo ca jaanaati desana.m..
text.2506: [21] yo te hatthe ca paade ca, ka.n.nanaasa~nca chedayi.
text.2507: [22] tassa kujjha mahaaviira, maa ra.t.tha.m vinasaa {vinassa (ka0 sii0 syaa0  ka0)} ida.m..
text.2509: [21] yo me hatthe ca paade ca, ka.n.nanaasa~nca chedayi.
text.2510: [22] cira.m jiivatu so raajaa, na hi kujjhanti maadisaa..
text.2512: [21] ahuu atiitamaddhaana.m {ahu atiitamaddhaane (syaa0 pii0  ka0)}, sama.no khantidiipano.
text.2515: [21] tassa ^a^M1.0100^ea^ kamma {kammassa (sii0 pii0)} pharusassa, vipaako ka.tuko  ahu.
text.2520: [21] dujjiivitamajiivimha, ye sante {yesa.m no (syaa0 ka0)} na dadamhase.
text.2526: [21] natthi anto kuto anto, na anto pa.tidissati.
text.2527: [22] tadaa ^a^T1.0138^ea^ hi pakata.m paapa.m, mama tuyha~nca maarisaa {maarisa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.2529: [21] soha.m nuuna ito gantvaa, yoni.m laddhaana maanusi.m.
text.2534: [21] pharusaa ^a^V1.0087^ea^ vata te vaacaa, ma.msa.m {samma (pii0  ka0)} yaacanako asi {casi (pii0)}.
text.2535: [22] kilomasadisii {kilomassa sadisaa (pii0)} vaacaa, kiloma.m samma dammi te..
text.2538: [22] a"ngassa sadisii vaacaa {a"ngassadisii te vaacaa (ka0)}, a"nga.m samma dadaami te..
text.2540: [21] taataati putto vadamaano, kampeti {sammeti (ka0)} hadaya.m pitu.
text.2541: [22] hadayassa sadisii {hadayassadisii (ka0)} vaacaa, hadaya.m samma dammi te..
text.2543: [21] yassa gaame sakhaa natthi, yathaara~n~na.m tatheva ta.m.
text.2544: [22] sabbassa sadisii vaacaa, sabba.m samma dadaami teti..
text.2548: [21] satta ^a^M1.0101^ea^ me rohitaa macchaa, udakaa  thalamubbhataa.
text.2549: [22] ida.m braahma.na me atthi, eta.m bhutvaa vane vasa..
text.2552: [27] ma.msasuulaa ^a^T1.0139^ea^ ca dve godhaa, eka~nca dadhivaaraka.m.
text.2553: [22] ida.m braahma.na me atthi, eta.m bhutvaa vane vasa..
text.2555: [21] ambapakka.m daka.m {ambapakkodaka.m (sii0 pii0)} siita.m,  siitacchaayaa manoramaa {siitacchaaya.m manorama.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.2556: [22] ida.m braahma.na me atthi, eta.m bhutvaa vane vasa..
text.2558: [21] na sasassa tilaa atthi, na muggaa napi ta.n.dulaa.
text.2559: [22] iminaa agginaa pakka.m, mama.m {ma.msa.m (ka0)} bhutvaa vane vasaati..
text.2563: [21] mata.m mata.m eva {matamatameva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}   rodatha, na hi ta.m rodatha yo marissati.
text.2564: [22] sabbepi {sabbeva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sariiradhaarino, anupubbena jahanti jiivita.m..
text.2566: [21] devamanussaa catuppadaa, pakkhiga.naa uragaa ca bhogino.
text.2567: [22] samhi {yamhi (syaa0), asmi.m (pii0 ka0)} sariire anissaraa, ramamaanaava jahanti jiivita.m..
text.2572: [21] dhuttaa ca so.n.daa {dhuttaa so.n.daa (sii0), dhuttaa so.n.daa  ca (syaa0)} akataa, baalaa suuraa ayogino {baalaa suuraa viiraa  ayogino (pii0)}.
text.2573: [22] dhiira.m ma~n~nanti baaloti, ye dhammassa akovidaati..
text.2578: [22] saama.m baahaaya pii.lesi, saa ta.m aarogyamabravi..
text.2580: [21] ambho na kira saddheyya.m, ya.m vaato pabbata.m vahe.
text.2581: [27] pabbata~nce vahe vaato, sabbampi pathavi.m vahe.
text.2582: [22] yattha saamaa kaalakataa {kaala"nkataa (ka0)}, saa ma.m aarogyamabravi..
text.2584: [21] na ceva saa kaalakataa, na ca saa a~n~namicchati.
text.2585: [22] ekabhattikinii {ekabhattaa kira (sii0 syaa0), ekabhattakinii (pii0)} saamaa,   tameva abhika"nkhati..
text.2587: [21] asanthuta.m ma.m cirasanthutena {asandhata.m ma.m cirasandhatena  (ka0)}, nimiini saamaa adhuva.m dhuvena.
text.2588: [22] mayaapi saamaa nimineyya a~n~na.m, ito aha.m duuratara.m  gamissanti..
text.2592: [21] susukha.m vata jiivaami, labhaami ceva bhu~njitu.m.
text.2593: [22] paripantheva ti.t.thaami, kaa nu bhante gatii mama..
text.2595: [21] mano ce te nappa.namati, pakkhi paapassa kammuno.
text.2599: [22] pa.ticca ^a^T1.0141^ea^ kamma.m phusati, tasmi.m me sa"nkate mano..
text.2601: [21] na pa.ticca kamma.m phusati, mano ce nappadussati.
text.2606: [21] succaja.m ^a^V1.0089^ea^ ^a^M1.0103^ea^ vata naccaji,  vaacaaya adada.m giri.m.
text.2607: [22] ki.m hitassa cajantassa, vaacaaya adada pabbata.m..
text.2609: [21] ya~nhi kayiraa ta~nhi vade, ya.m na kayiraa na ta.m vade.
text.2612: [21] raajaputta namo tyatthu, sacce dhamme .thito casi.
text.2613: [22] yassa te byasana.m patto, saccasmi.m ramate mano..
text.2615: [21] yaa daliddii daliddassa, a.d.dhaa a.d.dhassa kittima  {kittimaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.2616: [22] saa hissa paramaa bhariyaa, sahira~n~nassa itthiyoti..
text.2620: [21] atha cora sakassapa khantiivaro, dujjiivitataa ca varaa  pharusaa.
text.2621: [22] atha ^a^T1.0142^ea^ sasa mata~nca vasanta sukha.m, succaja.mvatanaccajinaa ca  dasaati..
text.2625: [21] manussasseva te siisa.m, hatthapaadaa ca vaanara.
text.2626: [22] atha kena nu va.n.nena, agaara.m te na vijjati..
text.2628: [21] manussasseva me siisa.m, hatthapaadaa ca si"ngila {si"ngaala  (ka0), pi"ngala (.tiikaa)}.
text.2629: [22] yaahu se.t.thaa manussesu, saa me pa~n~naa na vijjati..
text.2632: [22] nicca.m addhuvasiilassa, sukhabhaavo {sucibhaavo (sii0), sukhabhaago (?)} na vijjati..
text.2639: [21] duddubhaayati {daddabhaayati (sii0 pii0)} bhaddante, yasmi.m dese vasaamaha.m.

text.3551: [21] atha va.n.na sasiila hiri labhate, sumukhaa visa  saa.liyamittavaro.
text.3552: [22] atha cakka palaasa saraaja sato, yava baala kapotaka  pannarasaati..

text.3561: [21] maasu ^a^T1.0187^ea^ ^a^V1.0116^ea^ ^a^M1.0137^ea^ kujjha bhuumipati,  maasu kujjha rathesabha.
text.3564: [21] gaame vaa yadi vaara~n~ne, ninne vaa yadi vaa thale.

text.3574: [21] gaame vaa yadi vaara~n~ne, ninne vaa yadi vaa thale.

text.3581: [22] migova jaataruupena, na tenattha.m abandhi suuti {ava.d.dhitunti (sii0 syaa0), ava.d.dhi suuti  (?)}..
text.3585: [21] maa ^a^T1.0188^ea^ taata kujjhi na hi saadhu kodho, bahumpi te  adi.t.thamassuta~nca.

text.3589: [22] esaa disaa paramaa setaketu, ya.m patvaa dukkhii sukhino  bhavanti..
text.3591: [21] kharaajinaa ja.tilaa pa"nkadantaa, dummakkharuupaa {dumukkharuupaa (sii0 syaa0),  dummukkharuupaa (pii0 ka0)} yeme  jappanti mante.
text.3592: [22] kacci nu te maanusake payoge, ida.m viduu parimuttaa  apaayaa..
text.3594: [21] paapaani kammaani katvaana raaja, bahussuto ce na {bahussuto neva (sii0  syaa0)} careyya dhamma.m.

text.3597: [21] sahassavedopi na ta.m pa.ticca, dukkhaa pamu~nce cara.na.m  apatvaa.
text.3598: [22] ma~n~naami ^a^T1.0189^ea^ vedaa aphalaa bhavanti, sasa.myama.m cara.nameva {cara.na~n~neva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sacca.m..
text.3600: [21] na heva vedaa aphalaa bhavanti, sasa.myama.m cara.nameva sacca.m.
text.3601: [22] kitti~nhi pappoti adhicca vede, santi.m pu.neti {santa.m pune'ti (sii0 pii0)} cara.nena  dantoti..
text.3605: [21] pa"nko ca kaamaa palipo ca kaamaa, bhaya~nca meta.m timuula.m  pavutta.m.

text.3608: [21] gadhito ^a^M1.0139^ea^ {gathito (sii0)} ca ratto ca adhimucchito  ca, kaamesvaha.m braahma.na bhi.msaruupa.m.
text.3609: [22] ta.m nussahe jiivikattho pahaatu.m, kaahaami pu~n~naani  anappakaani..
text.3611: [21] yo atthakaamassa hitaanukampino, ovajjamaano na  karoti saasana.m.
text.3612: [22] idameva seyyo iti ma~n~namaano, punappuna.m ^a^T1.0190^ea^ gabbhamupeti  mando..
text.3614: [21] so ghoraruupa.m niraya.m upeti, subhaasubha.m muttakariisapuura.m.
text.3615: [22] sattaa sakaaye na jahanti giddhaa, ye honti kaamesu  aviitaraagaa..
text.3617: [21] mii.lhena littaa ruhirena makkhitaa, semhena littaa  upanikkhamanti.
text.3618: [22] ya.m ya~nhi kaayena phusanti taavade, sabba.m asaata.m  dukhameva kevala.m..
text.3620: [21] disvaa vadaami na hi a~n~nato sava.m, pubbenivaasa.m bahuka.m  saraami.
text.3621: [22] citraahi gaathaahi subhaasitaahi, dariimukho nijjhaapayi  sumedhanti..
text.3625: [21] kaakolaa kaakasa"nghaa ca, maya~nca patata.m varaa {vara (ka0) mayantipadassa hi  visesana.m}.
text.3626: [22] sabbeva sadisaa homa, ima.m aagamma pabbata.m..
text.3628: [21] idha ^a^V1.0118^ea^ siihaa ca byagghaa ca, si"ngaalaa ca  migaadhamaa.
text.3629: [22] sabbeva ^a^T1.0191^ea^ sadisaa honti, aya.m ko naama pabbato..
text.3631: [21] ima.m ^a^M1.0140^ea^ neruuti {nerunti (sii0 syaa0)} jaananti, manussaa  pabbatuttama.m.
text.3634: [21] amaananaa yattha siyaa, santaana.m vaa vimaananaa.
text.3635: [22] hiinasammaananaa vaapi, na tattha vasati.m vase {vasatii vase (syaa0), vasa divase (pii0)}..
text.3637: [21] yatthaalaso ca dakkho ca, suuro bhiiru ca puujiyaa.
text.3638: [22] na tattha santo vasanti, avisesakare nare {nage (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.3648: [21] ta.m devaa payirupaasanti, taava duuraphala.m sati.m.
text.3649: [22] aasiiseva {aasi.mseva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} tuva.m raaja, aasaa phalavatii sukhaa..
text.3651: [21] aasiisateva {aasi.msetheva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} so  pakkhii, aasiisateva {aasi.msetheva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} so dijo.
text.3652: [27] tassa caasaa {tassevaasaa (syaa0)} samijjhati, taava duuragataa satii.
text.3653: [22] aasiiseva tuva.m raaja, aasaa phalavatii sukhaa..
text.3655: [21] sampesi kho ma.m vaacaaya, na ca sampesi {sa.msesi (ka0)} kammunaa.
text.3658: [21] aphala.m madhura.m vaaca.m, yo mittesu pakubbati.
text.3659: [22] adada.m avissaja.m bhoga.m, sandhi tenassa jiirati..
text.3661: [21] ya~nhi kayiraa ta~nhi vade, ya.m na kayiraa na ta.m vade.
text.3664: [21] bala~nca vata me khii.na.m, paatheyya~nca na vijjati.
text.3667: [21] etadeva ^a^V1.0119^ea^ ^a^M1.0141^ea^ hi me naama.m, ya.m  naamasmi rathesabha.
text.3672: [21] na me rucci migaalopa, yassa te taadisii gatii.
text.3673: [22] atucca.m taata patasi, abhuumi.m taata sevasi..
text.3675: [21] catukka.n.na.mva kedaara.m, yadaa te pathavii siyaa.
text.3676: [22] tato taata nivattassu, maassu etto para.m gami..
text.3681: [21] akatvaa apanandassa {apara.n.nassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, pitu vuddhassa saasana.m.
text.3684: [21] tassa puttaa ca daaraa ca, ye ca~n~ne anujiivino.
text.3687: [21] evampi idha vuddhaana.m, yo vaakya.m naavabujjhati.
text.3688: [27] atisiimacaro {atisiima.m caro (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} ditto, gijjhovaatiitasaasano.
text.3693: [21] kaa nu kaa.lena va.n.nena, na caapi {na caasi (sii0)} piyadassanaa.
text.3694: [22] kaa vaa tva.m kassa vaa dhiitaa, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya.m..
text.3697: [27] aha.m kaa.lii alakkhikaa, kaa.laka.n.niiti ma.m viduu.
text.3698: [22] okaasa.m yaacito dehi, vasemu tava santike..
text.3701: [22] pu.t.thaa me kaa.li akkhaahi, katha.m {yathaa (sii0 pii0)} jaanemu ta.m maya.m..
text.3703: [21] makkhii pa.laasii saarambhii, issukii maccharii sa.tho.
text.3704: [22] so mayha.m puriso kanto, laddha.m yassa vinassati..
text.3706: [21] kodhano ^a^V1.0120^ea^ upanaahii ca, pisu.no ca vibhedako.
text.3707: [22] ka.n.dakavaaco {a.n.dakavaaco (ka0 sii0 pii0)} pharuso, so me kantataro tato..
text.3713: [22] so mayha.m puriso kanto, tasmi.m homi anaamayaa..
text.3715: [21] apehi etto tva.m kaa.li, neta.m amhesu vijjati.
text.3718: [21] ahampi kho ta.m {ceta.m (sii0)} jaanaami, neta.m tumhesu vijjati.
text.3719: [27] santi loke alakkhikaa, sa"ngharanti bahu.m dhana.m.
text.3720: [22] aha.m devo ca me bhaataa, ubho na.m vidhamaamase..
text.3722: [21] kaa nu dibbena va.n.nena, pathabyaa supati.t.thitaa.
text.3723: [22] kaa vaa tva.m kassa vaa dhiitaa, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya.m..
text.3726: [27] aha.m sirii ca lakkhii ca, bhuuripa~n~naati ma.m viduu.
text.3727: [22] okaasa.m yaacito dehi, vasemu tava santike..
text.3730: [22] pu.t.thaa me lakkhi akkhaahi, katha.m {yathaa (sii0 pii0)} jaanemu ta.m maya.m..
text.3732: [21] yo ^a^M1.0143^ea^ caapi siite athavaapi u.nhe,  vaataatape .da.msasariisape ca.
text.3733: [27] khudha.m {khudda.m (syaa0 ka0), khuda.m (pii0)} pipaasa.m abhibhuyya sabba.m, rattintiva.m yo satata.m  niyutto.
text.3734: [22] kaalaagata~nca ^a^T1.0195^ea^ na haapeti attha.m, so me manaapo nivise  ca tamhi..
text.3736: [21] akkodhano mittavaa caagavaa ca, siiluupapanno asa.thojubhuuto {asa.tho ujjubhuuto  (pii0)}.
text.3738: [22] tasmi.mha.m {tasmaaha.m (sii0 pii0)} pose vipulaa bhavaami, uumi samuddassa yathaapi  va.n.na.m..
text.3740: [21] yo caapi mitte athavaa amitte, se.t.the sarikkhe atha  vaapi hiine.
text.3741: [27] attha.m caranta.m athavaa anattha.m, aavii raho sa"ngahameva vatte {vatto (syaa0 ka0)}..
text.3742: [22] vaaca.m na vajjaa pharusa.m kadaaci, matassa jiivassa ca  tassa homi..
text.3744: [21] etesa.m yo a~n~natara.m labhitvaa, kantaa sirii {kantasiri.m (katthaci), kanta.m  siri.m (syaa0) a.t.thakathaaya.m dutiyatatiyapaa.thantaraani} majjati  appapa~n~no.
text.3745: [22] ta.m dittaruupa.m visama.m caranta.m, kariisa.thaana.mva {kariisajaata.m va (sii0 syaa0)} vivajjayaami..
text.3748: [22] na ^a^T1.0196^ea^ hi lakkhi.m alakkhi.m vaa, a~n~no a~n~nassa  kaarakoti..
text.3753: [22] oroha dumasaakhaaya, mudhaa bhariyaa bhavaami te..

text.3762: [22] na tva.m ariyena vedena, mama.m bhattaaramicchasi..
text.3764: [21] evampi caturaa {caaturaa (syaa0 ka0)} naarii, disvaana  sadhana.m {pavara.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} nara.m.
text.3765: [22] nenti sa.nhaahi vaacaahi, bi.laarii viya kukku.ta.m..
text.3767: [21] yo ca uppatita.m attha.m, na khippamanubujjhati.
text.3770: [21] yo ca uppatita.m attha.m, khippameva nibodhati.
text.3775: [21] dhamma.m caratha ~naatayo, dhamma.m caratha bhadda.m vo {bhadda vo (ka0)}.
text.3776: [22] dhammacaarii sukha.m seti, asmi.m loke paramhi ca..
text.3782: [22] bhutvaa a.n.da~nca pota~nca {chaape ca (sii0 pii0)}, dhammo dhammoti bhaasati..
text.3784: [21] a~n~na.m bha.nati vaacaaya, a~n~na.m kaayena kubbati.

text.3787: [21] vaacaaya ^a^V1.0122^ea^ ^a^M1.0145^ea^ sakhilo  manoviduggo, channo kuupasayova ka.nhasappo.
text.3788: [22] dhammadhajo gaamanigamaasusaadhu {gaamanigamaasu saadhusammato (sii0), gaamanigamasaadhu (pii0)},   dujjaano purisena baalisena..
text.3790: [21] ima.m ^a^T1.0198^ea^ tu.n.dehi pakkhehi, paadaa cima.m vihe.thatha {vipothatha (pii0)}.
text.3795: [21] sace braahma.na gacchesi, saakete {saaketa.m (sii0 syaa0)} ajjuna.m {a~njhana.m  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vana.m.
text.3797: [22] maataa pitaa ca te vuddhaa, te ta.m icchanti passitu.m..
text.3800: [22] ta.m raajapi.n.da.m avabhottu.m {avabhotta.m (ka0)}, naaha.m braahma.na mussahe..
text.3802: [21] odahissaamaha.m passa.m, khurappaanissa {khurappaa.nissa (sii0), khurapaa.nissa  (pii0), khurappapaa.nissa (?)} raajino.
text.3803: [22] tadaaha.m sukhito mutto, api passeyya maatara.m..
text.3805: [21] migaraajaa pure aasi.m, kosalassa niketane {niketave (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.3808: [21] ta.m ma.m vadhitumaagacchi, daayasmi.m ajjune vane.
text.3809: [22] dhanu.m aarajja.m {aarajju.m (niyya), adejjha.m (sii0 pii0) advedhaabhaava.m ekiibhaavanti attho} katvaana,  usu.m sannayha {sandhaaya (sii0 pii0)} kosalo..
text.3816: [21] atha kujjharathesabha ketuvaro, sadariimukha neru lataa ca  puna.
text.3817: [22] apananda sirii ca sucittavaro, atha dhammika  nandimigena dasaati..
text.3821: [21] sacca.m ^a^V1.0123^ea^ kirevamaaha.msu, vasta.m {bhasta.m (sii0 pii0), kalaka.m  (syaa0), gara.m (ka0)} baaloti pa.n.ditaa.
text.3822: [22] passa baalo rahokamma.m, aavikubba.m na bujjhati..
text.3824: [21] tva.m khopi {tva.m nu kho (sii0 syaa0), tva~nca kho (pii0)} samma  baalosi, kharaputta vijaanahi.
text.3827: [21] aparampi samma te baalya.m {ayampi samma te baalo (ka0)}, yo  mutto na palaayasi.
text.3828: [22] so ca baalataro samma, ya.m tva.m vahasi senaka.m..
text.3830: [21] ya.m nu samma aha.m baalo, ajaraaja vijaanahi.
text.3831: [22] atha ^a^T1.0200^ea^ kena senako baalo, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito..
text.3833: [21] uttamattha.m labhitvaana, bhariyaaya yo padassati {bhayiyaa yo padassati  (pii0), bhayiyaa na bhavissati (ka0)}.
text.3834: [22] tena jahissatattaana.m, saa cevassa na hessati..
text.3836: [21] na ^a^M1.0147^ea^ ve piyammeti {na piyameti (ka0), na piyamedanti  (katthaci)} janinda taadiso,  atta.m nira.mkatvaa piyaani sevati {sevaye (?)}.
text.3837: [22] attaava seyyo paramaa ca seyyo, labbhaa piyaa  ocitatthena pacchaati..
text.3847: [21] ito daani pataayanti, suuciyo ba.lisaani ca.
text.3850: [21] ito satthaani gacchanti, kammantaa vividhaa puthuu.
text.3851: [22] koya.m kammaaragaamasmi.m, suuci.m vikketumicchati {marahati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.3854: [22] aacariyaava jaananti {aacariyaa sa~njaananti (ka0), aacariyaa pajaananti (syaa0),  aacariyaava sa~njaananti (pii0)}, kamma.m sukatadukka.ta.m {dukkata.m (sii0 pii0)}..
text.3856: [21] ima.m ^a^V1.0124^ea^ ce {ima~nca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} te pitaa bhadde, suuci.m ja~n~naa mayaa  kata.m.
text.3857: [22] tayaa ca ma.m nimanteyya, ya~ncattha~n~na.m ghare dhananti..
text.3861: [21] navachannake {navachandake (sii0 pii0), navacchaddake (syaa0)} daani  {do.ni (ka0), daana.m, daane (katthaci)} diyyati, pu.n.naaya.m do.ni suvaaminii .thitaa.
text.3862: [22] bahuke jane paasapaa.nike, no ca kho me pa.tibhaati  bhu~njitu.m..
text.3864: [21] tasasi ^a^M1.0148^ea^ bhamasi le.namicchasi,  attaa.nosi kuhi.m gamissasi.
text.3865: [22] appossukko bhu~nja tu.n.dila, ma.msatthaaya hi positaamhase {posiyaamase (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.3867: [21] ogaha rahada.m akaddama.m, sabba.m sedamala.m pavaahaya.
text.3868: [22] ga.nhaahi nava.m vilepana.m, yassa ^a^T1.0202^ea^ gandho na kadaaci  chijjati..
text.3870: [21] katamo rahado akaddamo, ki.msu sedamalanti vuccati.
text.3871: [22] katama~nca nava.m vilepana.m, yassa gandho na kadaaci  chijjati..
text.3873: [21] dhammo rahado akaddamo, paapa.m sedamalanti vuccati.
text.3874: [22] siila~nca nava.m vilepana.m, tassa gandho na kadaaci  chijjati..
text.3876: [21] nandanti sariiraghaatino, na ca nandanti sariiradhaarino.
text.3877: [22] pu.n.naaya ca pu.n.namaasiyaa, ramamaanaava jahanti  jiivitanti..
text.3882: [22] tenaabhibhuuto kapa.na.m rudaami, hare sakhaa kissa nu ma.m  jahaasi..
text.3884: [21] so ^a^T1.0203^ea^ ^a^M1.0149^ea^ passasanto mahataa pha.nena,  bhuja"ngamo kakka.tamajjhapatto.
text.3885: [22] sakhaa sakhaara.m paritaayamaano, bhuja"ngama.m kakka.tako gahesi..
text.3887: [21] na vaayasa.m no pana ka.nhasappa.m, ghaasatthiko kakka.tako  adeyya.
text.3888: [22] pucchaami ta.m aayatacakkhunetta, atha kissa hetumha ubho  gahiitaa..
text.3890: [21] aya.m puriso mama atthakaamo, yo ma.m gahetvaana dakaaya  neti.
text.3891: [22] tasmi.m mate dukkhamanappaka.m me, aha~nca eso ca ubho na  homa..
text.3893: [21] mama~nca disvaana pavaddhakaaya.m, sabbo jano hi.msitumeva  micche.
text.3894: [22] saadu~nca thuula~nca mudu~nca ma.msa.m, kaakaapi ma.m disvaana  {disva (sii0 pii0)} vihe.thayeyyu.m..
text.3896: [21] sacetassa ^a^V1.0125^ea^ hetumha ubho gahiitaa, u.t.thaatu  poso visamaavamaami {visamaacamaami (sii0 pii0 ka0)}.
text.3897: [22] mama~nca kaaka~nca pamu~nca khippa.m, pure ^a^T1.0204^ea^ visa.m gaa.lhamupeti  macca.m..
text.3899: [21] sappa.m pamokkhaami na taava kaaka.m, pa.tibandhako {pa.tibaddhako (sii0 pii0)}   hohiti {hoti hi (syaa0)} taava kaako.
text.3900: [22] purisa~nca disvaana sukhi.m aroga.m, kaaka.m pamokkhaami  yatheva sappa.m..
text.3902: [21] kaako ^a^M1.0150^ea^ tadaa devadatto ahosi, maaro  pana ka.nhasappo ahosi.
text.3903: [22] aanandabhaddo kakka.tako ahosi, aha.m tadaa braahma.no homi  satthaati {tatthaati (sii0 pii0)}..
text.3911: [22] bhutvaana pipphali.m yanti, vilapatveva so dijo..
text.3916: [21] na so acchaadana.m bhatta.m, na maala.m na vilepana.m.
text.3917: [22] anubhoti ^a^T1.0205^ea^ {naanubhoti (syaa0 ka0)} saki.m ki~nci, na sa"nga.nhaati ~naatake..
text.3920: [27] raajaano atha vaa coraa, daayadaa ye va {ye ca (syaa0 ka0)} appiyaa.
text.3923: [21] dhiiro {dhiiro ca (sii0)} bhoge adhigamma, sa"nga.nhaati ca ~naatake.
text.3924: [22] tena so kitti.m pappoti, pecca sagge pamodatiiti {sagge ca modatiiti (sii0 pii0)}..
text.3928: [21] dubba.n.naruupa.m tuvamariyava.n.nii, purakkhatvaa {purakkhitvaa (syaa0 ka0)} pa~njaliko  namassasi.
text.3929: [22] seyyo nu te so udavaa {udaahu (syaa0 ka0)} sarikkho, naama.m parassattano  caapi bruuhi..
text.3931: [21] na ^a^M1.0151^ea^ naamagotta.m ga.nhanti raaja,  sammaggataanujjugataana {samaggataanujjugataana (syaa0), samuggataanujjugataana (ka0)} devaa.
text.3932: [22] aha~nca te naamadheyya.m vadaami, sakkohamasmii  tidasaanamindo..
text.3934: [21] yo ^a^V1.0126^ea^ disvaa bhikkhu.m cara.nuupapanna.m, purakkhatvaa  pa~njaliko namassati.
text.3935: [22] pucchaami ta.m devaraajetamattha.m, ito ^a^T1.0206^ea^ cuto ki.m labhate sukha.m  so..
text.3937: [21] yo disvaa bhikkhu.m cara.nuupapanna.m, purakkhatvaa pa~njaliko  namassati.
text.3938: [22] di.t.theva dhamme labhate pasa.msa.m, sagga~nca so yaati  sariirabhedaa..
text.3940: [21] lakkhii vata me udapaadi ajja, ya.m vaasava.m  bhuutapatiddasaama.

text.3954: [21] na haraami na bha~njaami, aaraa si"nghaami vaarija.m.

text.4010: [21] appicchassa ^a^V1.0128^ea^ hi posassa,  appacintasukhassa {appacintisukhassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ca.

text.4025: [22] tesaaha.m ^a^T1.0210^ea^ anusikkhaami, maa tva.m ma~n~ni davaa kata.m..

text.4030: [21] tva~n~neva ma.ninaa channo, sukataaya ca massuyaa.
text.4031: [22] aamanta kho ta.m gacchaami, piya.m me tava dassananti..
text.4035: [21] atha passa sasuuci ca tu.n.dilako, miga  mayhakapa~ncamapakkhivaro.
text.4036: [22] atha pa~njali vaarija mejjha puna, atha va.t.ta kapotavarena  dasaati..
text.4039: [22] avaariyaa ca kharo ca {senaka (sii0), suuci ca (syaa0 ka0)}, dve ca vuttaa subya~njanaati..

text.4046: [22] saa si.msapaa {sasi.msapaa (sii0 pii0), saa siisapaa (syaa0), yaa si.msapaa (ka0 sii0 niyya)}   saaramayaa apheggukaa, kuhi.m .thitaa upparito {uparito (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} na dha.msati..
text.4048: [21] yaa ti.msati saaramayaa anujjukaa, parikiriya {pakiriyaa (ka0)}  gopaa.nasiyo sama.m .thitaa {sama.t.thitaa (sii0 syaa0)}.
text.4049: [22] taahi susa"ngahitaa balasaa pii.litaa {taa sa"ngahitaa balasaa ca pii.litaa (sii0),   taahi susa"ngahitaa balasaa ca pii.litaa (syaa0),  taahi sa"ngahiitaa balasaa ca pii.litaa (pii0)}, sama.m .thitaa  upparito na dha.msati..

text.4054: [21] kharattaca.m bella.m yathaapi satthavaa, anaamasantopi karoti  tittaka.m.
text.4055: [22] samaahara.m saadu.m karoti patthiva, asaadu.m kayiraa  tanubandhamuddhara.m {tanuva.t.tamuddhara.m (sii0 pii0)}..
text.4057: [21] evampi ^a^T1.0212^ea^ gaamanigamesu pa.n.dito, asaahasa.m raajadhanaani  sa"nghara.m.

text.4060: [21] odaatamuula.m ^a^M1.0156^ea^ sucivaarisambhava.m, jaata.m  yathaa pokkhara.niisu ambuja.m.
text.4061: [22] paduma.m yathaa agginikaasiphaalima.m, na kaddamo na rajo  na vaari limpati..
text.4064: [22] na limpati kammakilesa taadiso, jaata.m yathaa  pokkhara.niisu ambujanti..
text.4068: [21] yathaa caapo ninnamati, jiyaa caapi nikuujati.

text.4072: [22] netaadisaa sakhaa honti, labbhaa me jiivato sakhaa..

text.4180: [22] yada~n~na.m dukkara.m .thaana.m, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito..

text.4206: [22] ma~n~naami te braahma.na sattubhasta.m, ajaanato ka.nhasappo  pavi.t.tho..
text.4208: [21] aadaaya ^a^M1.0161^ea^ da.n.da.m parisumbha bhasta.m,  passe.lamuuga.m uraga.m dujivha.m {dijivha.m (sii0 pii0)}.

text.4211: [21] sa.mviggaruupo ^a^T1.0219^ea^ parisaaya majjhe, so braahma.no sattubhasta.m  pamu~nci.

text.4214: [21] suladdhalaabhaa janakassa ra~n~no, yo passatii senaka.m  saadhupa~n~na.m.
text.4215: [22] viva.t.tachaddo {vivattacchaddo (sii0), viva.t.tacchado (syaa0), viva.t.tacchaddaa (pii0)} nusi sabbadassii, ~naa.na.m nu te braahma.na  bhi.msaruupa.m..
text.4217: [21] imaani me sattasataani atthi, ga.nhaahi sabbaani  dadaami tuyha.m.

text.4225: [21] yeme ^a^T1.0220^ea^ aha.m na jaanaami, a.t.thisena vanibbake.
text.4226: [22] te ma.m sa"ngamma yaacanti, kasmaa ma.m tva.m na yaacasi..

text.4231: [21] yo ^a^M1.0162^ea^ ve yaacanajiivaano, kaale yaaca.m  na yaacati.
text.4232: [22] para~nca pu~n~naa {pu~n~na.m (syaa0 ka0)} dha.mseti, attanaapi na jiivati..

text.4238: [22] brahmacaari piyo mesi, vada tva.m {vara ta.m (sii0), vara tva.m (pii0)} bha~n~namicchasi  {ya~n~namicchasi (?)}..

text.4241: [22] uddissa ariyaa ti.t.thanti, esaa ariyaana yaacanaa..
text.4243: [21] dadaami te braahma.na rohi.niina.m, gava.m sahassa.m saha pu"ngavena.
text.4244: [22] ariyo hi ariyassa katha.m na dajjaa, sutvaana gaathaa  tava dhammayuttaati..

text.4249: [22] ekaratta.m diratta.m vaa, dukkha.m vasati verisu..

text.4255: [22] sacittassa vasa.m gantvaa, sayethaaya.m {passethaaya.m (ka0)} yathaa kapi..
text.4257: [21] na saadhu balavaa baalo, yuuthassa parihaarako.
text.4263: [21] yo ca siila~nca pa~n~na~nca, suta~ncattani passati.
text.4264: [22] ubhinnamattha.m carati, attano ca parassa ca..
text.4266: [21] tasmaa tuleyya mattaana.m, siilapa~n~naasutaamiva {siila.m pa~n~na.m suta.mpiva  (syaa0)}.

text.4271: [21] dvaasattati ^a^V1.0135^ea^ gotama {bho gotama (ka0)} pu~n~nakammaa,   vasavattino ^a^T1.0222^ea^ jaatijara.m atiitaa.
text.4272: [22] ayamantimaa vedaguu brahmapatti {brahmupapatti (syaa0 ka0)}, asmaabhijappanti janaa  {pajaa (ka0)} anekaa..
text.4274: [21] appa~nhi eta.m {appa~nca heta.m (syaa0), appa.msi eta.m  (ka0)}   na hi diighamaayu, ya.m tva.m baka ma~n~nasi diighamaayu.m.
text.4275: [22] sata.m sahassaani {sahassaana.m (sii0 pii0 sa.m0 ni0  1.175),  sahassaana (syaa0 ka.m0)} nirabbudaana.m, aayu.m pajaanaami tavaaha  brahme..
text.4278: [22] ki.m me puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m {siilavanta.m (pii0 ka0)}, aacikkha me ta.m yamaha.m  vija~n~na.m..
text.4280: [21] ya.m tva.m apaayesi bahuu manusse, pipaasite ghammani  samparete.
text.4281: [22] ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m, suttappabuddhova anussaraami..
text.4283: [21] ya.m ^a^M1.0164^ea^ e.nikuulasmi jana.m gahiita.m,  amocayii gayhaka niyyamaana.m.
text.4284: [22] ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m, suttappabuddhova anussaraami..
text.4286: [21] ga"ngaaya sotasmi.m gahiitanaava.m, luddena ^a^T1.0223^ea^ naagena manussakappaa.
text.4287: [27] amocayi tva.m balasaa pasayha, ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m.
text.4290: [21] kappo ca te baddhacaro {patthacaro (syaa0), pa.t.thacaro (ka0)} ahosi,  sambuddhimanta.m {sambuddhivanta.m (syaa0 pii0), sambuddhavanta.m (ka0)} vatina.m {vatita.m (syaa0), vatida.m  (ka0)} ama~n~na.m.
text.4291: [22] ta.m te puraa.na.m vatasiilavatta.m, suttappabuddhova anussaraami..
text.4293: [21] addhaa pajaanaasi mametamaayu.m, a~n~nampi jaanaasi tathaa hi  buddho.
text.4294: [22] tathaa hi taaya.m {tyaaya.m (sa.m0 ni0  1.175)} jalitaanubhaavo, obhaasaya.m ti.t.thati  brahmalokanti..
text.4298: [21] varaka.n.nika caapavaro sutano, atha gijjha  sarohitamacchavaro.
text.4299: [22] puna pa.n.naka {dasa.n.naka (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} senaka yaacanako, atha veri sabrahmabakena  dasaati..
text.4306: [21] hitvaa gandhaaravisaya.m, pahuutadhanadhaariya.m {dhaaniya.m (sii0 pii0), dha~n~nanti  attho}.
text.4307: [22] pasaasanato {pasaasanito (sii0 syaa0), pasaasanaato (pii0)} nikkhanto, idha daani pasaasasi..
text.4309: [21] dhamma.m bha.naami vedeha, adhammo me na ruccati.

text.4856: [22] a"ngaare ^a^T1.0251^ea^ vaasa.m kappeyyu.m, atha nuuna tadaa siyaa..

text.4947: [21] akkocchi ma.m avadhi ma.m, ajini ma.m ahaasi me.

text.4950: [21] na hi verena veraani, sammantiidha kudaacana.m.

text.4971: [21] dumo yadaa hoti phaluupapanno, bhu~njanti na.m viha"ngamaa  {vihagaa (sii0 pii0)} sampatantaa.
text.4972: [22] khii.nanti ~natvaana duma.m phalaccaye {~natvaa dumapphalaccayena (ka0)}, disodisa.m  ^a^T1.0256^ea^ yanti tato viha"ngamaa..

text.4978: [22] khii.na.m akhii.nanti na ta.m jahanti, santo sata.m  dhammamanussarantaa..

text.4981: [22] ta.m nussahe jiivikattho pahaatu.m, khii.nanti ~natvaana na  hesa dhammo {na sosa (ka0), na esa (syaa0)}..
text.4983: [21] saadhu sakkhi kata.m hoti, metti sa.msati santhavo {mitta.m sa"ngati sandhavo  (ka0)}.
text.4986: [21] so te suva vara.m dammi, pattayaana viha"ngama.

text.4990: [22] so ^a^T1.0257^ea^ saakhavaa phalimaa sa.mviruu.lho, madhutthiko ti.t.thatu  sobhamaano..

text.4993: [22] so saakhavaa phalimaa sa.mviruu.lho, madhutthiko ti.t.thatu  sobhamaano..

text.5003: [21] santi rukkhaa haripattaa {haritapattaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, dumaa nekaphalaa bahuu.
text.5004: [22] kasmaa nu sukkhe {sukkha (ka0)} ko.laape, suvassa nirato mano..
text.5007: [22] aphalampi viditvaana, saava metti yathaa pure..
text.5010: [22] ohaaya saku.naa yanti, ki.m dosa.m passase dija..
text.5012: [21] ye ^a^T1.0258^ea^ phalatthaa sambhajanti, aphaloti jahanti na.m.
text.5015: [21] saadhu sakkhi kata.m hoti, metti sa.msati santhavo.
text.5018: [21] so ^a^V1.0156^ea^ te suva vara.m dammi, pattayaana viha"ngama.

text.5021: [21] api ^a^M1.0191^ea^ naama na.m passeyya.m {api naama na.m puna passe (sii0  syaa0)}, sapatta.m saphala.m  duma.m.
text.5027: [21] eva.m sakka sukhii hohi, saha sabbehi ~naatibhi.

text.5041: [21] adu {aadu (sii0 pii0)} pa~n~naa kimatthiyaa, nipu.naa saadhucintinii  {cintanii (sii0 pii0)}.

text.5057: [22] tesa.m muula.m gavesissa.m, checcha.m raaga.m sabandhana.m..
text.5064: [21] bahussuta.m cittakathi.m {cittakatha.m (syaa0 ka0)}, ga"ngaa vahati paa.tali.m {paa.tala.m  (sii0 pii0)}.
text.5065: [22] vuyhamaanaka ^a^T1.0260^ea^ bhaddante, eka.m me dehi gaathaka.m {giitaka.m (ka0 a.t.tha0)}..

text.5074: [22] so ma.m .dahati {dayhati (ka0)} gattaani, jaata.m sara.nato bhaya.m..
text.5076: [21] yena bhuttena {bhattena (syaa0 ka0)} yaapenti, puthuu braahma.nakhattiyaa.

text.5082: [21] ya.m nissitaa jagatiruha.m, svaaya.m aggi.m pamu~ncati.
text.5083: [22] disaa bhajatha vakka"ngaa, jaata.m sara.nato bhaya.m..
text.5086: [22] saa ma.m gharaa nicchubhati {niiharati (sii0 syaa0)}, jaata.m sara.nato bhaya.m..
text.5088: [21] yena jaatena nandissa.m, yassa ca bhavamicchisa.m.

text.5091: [21] su.nantu me jaanapadaa, negamaa ca samaagataa.
