text.5100: [22] sace tva.m ya~n~na.m yaajeyya, isi.m lomasakassapa.m..
text.5103: [22] na icche saha nindaaya, eva.m seyya {sayha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vijaanahi..
text.5109: [22] saayeva jiivikaa seyyo, yaa caadhammena esanaa..
text.5112: [22] a~n~na.m ahi.msaya.m loke, api rajjena ta.m vara.m..
text.5114: [21] bala.m cando bala.m suriyo, bala.m sama.nabraahma.naa.
text.5118: [22] pitu atthaa candavatii, vaajapeyya.m {vaacapeyya.m (pii0 ka0)} ayaajayi..
text.5121: [22] tassa ^a^T1.0262^ea^ muula.m gavesissa.m, checcha.m raaga.m sabandhana.m..
text.5123: [21] dhiratthu ^a^M1.0194^ea^ kaame subahuupi loke, tapova  seyyo kaamagu.nehi raaja.
text.5124: [22] tapo karissaami pahaaya kaame, taveva ra.t.tha.m candavatii ca  hotuuti..
text.5128: [21] kaasaayavatthe saku.ne vadaami, duve duve nandamane {nandimane (sii0 pii0)} carante.
text.5129: [22] ka.m a.n.daja.m a.n.dajaa maanusesu, jaati.m pasa.msanti tadi"ngha  bruutha..
text.5131: [21] amhe manussesu manussahi.msa, anubbate {anupubbake (ka0)} cakkavaake vadanti.
text.5132: [22] kalyaa.nabhaavamhe {bhaava'mha (sii0 pii0)} dijesu sammataa, abhiruupaa {abhiitaruupaa (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} vicaraama a.n.nave.. ( ) {(na ghaasahetuupi karoma paapa.m) (ka0)}
text.5134: [21] ki.m a.n.nave kaani phalaani bhu~nje, ma.msa.m kuto khaadatha  cakkavaakaa.
text.5135: [22] ki.m bhojana.m bhu~njatha vo anomaa {abhi.nha.m (ka0)}, bala~nca ^a^T1.0263^ea^ va.n.no ca  anapparuupaa {anapparuupo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.5137: [21] na ^a^V1.0159^ea^ a.n.nave santi phalaani dha"nka, ma.msa.m  kuto khaaditu.m cakkavaake.
text.5138: [22] sevaalabhakkhamha {bhakkhimha (ka0)} apaa.nabhojanaa {avaakabhojanaa (sii0 pii0)}, na  ghaasahetuupi karoma paapa.m..
text.5140: [21] na me ida.m ruccati cakkavaaka, asmi.m bhave  bhojanasannikaaso.
text.5141: [22] ahosi pubbe tato me a~n~nathaa, icceva me vimati ettha  jaataa..
text.5143: [21] ahampi ^a^M1.0195^ea^ ma.msaani phalaani bhu~nje,  annaani ca lo.niyateliyaani.
text.5144: [27] rasa.m manussesu labhaami bhottu.m, suurova sa"ngaamamukha.m  vijetvaa.
text.5145: [22] na ca me taadiso va.n.no, cakkavaaka yathaa tava..
text.5147: [21] asuddhabhakkhosi kha.naanupaatii, kicchena te labbhati  annapaana.m.
text.5148: [22] na tussasii rukkhaphalehi dha"nka, ma.msaani vaa yaani  susaanamajjhe..
text.5150: [21] yo saahasena adhigamma bhoge, paribhu~njati ^a^T1.0264^ea^ dha"nka  kha.naanupaatii.
text.5151: [22] tato upakkosati na.m sabhaavo, upakku.t.tho va.n.nabala.m jahaati..
text.5153: [21] appampi ce nibbuti.m bhu~njatii yadi, asaahasena  aparuupaghaatii {asaahasenaanupaghaatino (ka0)}.
text.5154: [22] bala~nca va.n.no ca tadassa hoti, na hi sabbo  aahaaramayena va.n.noti..
text.5159: [22] ye ca gaame titikkhanti, te u.laarataraa tayaa..
text.5162: [22] purisa.m taata seveyya.m, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito..
text.5164: [21] yo te {yo ta.m (syaa0 jaa0 1.4.190 ara~n~najaatakepi)} vissaasaye taata, vissaasa~nca khameyya te.
text.5165: [22] sussuusii ca titikkhii ca, ta.m bhajehi ito gato..
text.5167: [21] yassa ^a^M1.0196^ea^ kaayena vaacaaya, manasaa natthi  dukka.ta.m.
text.5168: [22] urasiiva pati.t.thaaya, ta.m bhajehi ito gato..
text.5170: [21] yo ca dhammena carati, carantopi na ma~n~nati.
text.5171: [22] visuddhakaari.m sappa~n~na.m, ta.m bhajehi ito gato..
text.5174: [22] taadisa.m taata maa sevi, nimmanussampi ce siyaa..
text.5182: [21] ta.m taaha.m taata yaacaami, karassu vacana.m mama.
text.5183: [22] maassu baalena sa.mgacchi {sa.mga~nchi (sii0 pii0)}, dukkho baalehi sa"ngamoti..
text.5187: [21] kuto nu aagacchatha bho tayo janaa, svaagataa etha {svaagata.m ettha (sii0  pii0)}  nisiidathaasane.
text.5188: [22] kaccittha bhonto kusala.m anaamaya.m, cirassamabbhaagamana.m  hi vo idha..
text.5190: [21] ahameva eko idha majja patto, na caapi me dutiyo  koci vijjati.
text.5191: [22] kimeva sandhaaya te bhaasita.m ise, ``kuto nu aagacchatha  bho tayo janaa''..
text.5193: [21] tuva~nca eko bhariyaa ca te piyaa,  samuggapakkhittaniki.n.namantare ^a^T1.0266^ea^.
text.5194: [22] saa rakkhitaa kucchigataava {kucchigataa ca (ka0)} te sadaa, vaayussa {harissa (ka0)} puttena  sahaa tahi.m rataa..
text.5196: [21] sa.mviggaruupo ^a^M1.0197^ea^ isinaa viyaakato {pabyaakato (ka0), byaakato  (syaa0 pii0)}, so  daanavo tattha samuggamuggili.
text.5197: [22] addakkhi bhariya.m suci maaladhaarini.m, vaayussa puttena  sahaa tahi.m rata.m..
text.5199: [21] sudi.t.tharuupamuggatapaanuvattinaa {sudi.t.tharuupuggatapaanuvattinaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)},   hiinaa naraa ye pamadaavasa.m  gataa.
text.5200: [22] yathaa have paa.narivettha rakkhitaa, du.t.thaa mayii  a~n~namabhippamodayi..
text.5202: [21] divaa ca ratto ca mayaa upa.t.thitaa, tapassinaa jotirivaa  vane vasa.m.
text.5203: [22] saa dhammamukkamma adhammamaacari, akiriyaruupo pamadaahi  santhavo..
text.5206: [22] saa dhammamukkamma adhammamaacari, akiriyaruupo pamadaahi  santhavo..
text.5208: [21] surakkhita.m ^a^T1.0267^ea^ meti katha.m nu vissase, anekacittaasu na  hatthi {anekacittaa puna hettha (ka0)} rakkha.naa.
text.5209: [22] etaa hi paataalapapaatasannibhaa, etthappamatto byasana.m  nigacchati..
text.5211: [21] tasmaa hi te sukhino viitasokaa, ye maatugaamehi  caranti nissa.taa.
text.5212: [22] eta.m siva.m uttamamaabhipatthaya.m, na maatugaamehi kareyya  santhavanti..
text.5216: [21] na ^a^M1.0198^ea^ kho me ruccati aa.li,  puutima.msassa pekkhanaa.
text.5219: [21] ummattikaa ^a^V1.0161^ea^ aya.m ve.nii, va.n.neti patino  sakhi.m.
text.5220: [22] pajjhaayi {pajjhaati (sii0 pii0), pajjhaayati (sii0 niyya)} pa.tigacchanti.m,  aagata.m me.n.da {me.la (sii0 pii0)} maatara.m..
text.5222: [21] tva.m khosi samma ummatto, dummedho avicakkha.no.
text.5223: [22] yo tva.m {so tva.m (syaa0)} mataalaya.m katvaa, akaalena vipekkhasi..
text.5225: [21] na akaale vipekkheyya, kaale pekkheyya pa.n.dito.
text.5226: [22] puutima.msova pajjhaayi {pajjhaati (sii0 pii0), pajjhaayati (sii0 niyya)}, yo  akaale vipekkhati..
text.5228: [21] piya.m kho aa.li me hotu, pu.n.napatta.m dadaahi me.
text.5229: [22] pati ^a^T1.0268^ea^ sa~njiivito mayha.m, eyyaasi piyapucchikaa {pucchitaa (syaa0 ka0)}..
text.5231: [21] piya.m kho aa.li te hotu, pu.n.napatta.m dadaami te.
text.5232: [22] mahataa parivaarena {parihaarena (syaa0)}, essa.m {esa.m (sii0 pii0)} kayiraahi {kayiraasi  (pii0)} bhojana.m..
text.5234: [21] kiidiso tuyha.m parivaaro, yesa.m kaahaami bhojana.m.
text.5235: [22] ki.mnaamakaa ca te sabbe, ta.m {te (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} me akkhaahi pucchitaa..
text.5237: [21] maaliyo caturakkho ca, pi"ngiyo atha jambuko.
text.5238: [22] ediso mayha.m parivaaro, tesa.m kayiraahi {kayiraasi (pii0)} bhojana.m..
text.5241: [22] aarogya.m aa.lino vajja.m {vaccha.m (?)}, idheva vasa maagamaati..
text.5245: [21] yo te puttake akhaadi, dinnabhatto aduusake.
text.5246: [22] tasmi.m daa.tha.m nipaatehi, maa te muccittha jiivato..
text.5249: [22] padesa.m ta.m na passaami, yattha daa.tha.m nipaataye..
text.5252: [22] sabba.m ce pathavi.m dajjaa, neva na.m abhiraadhaye..
text.5254: [21] kinnu subaahu taramaanaruupo, paccaagatosi saha maa.navena.
text.5255: [22] ki.m ^a^T1.0269^ea^ kiccamattha.m idhamatthi tuyha.m, akkhaahi me pucchito  etamattha.m..
text.5257: [21] yo te sakhaa daddaro saadhuruupo, tassa vadha.m parisa"nkaami  ajja.
text.5258: [22] purisassa kammaayatanaani sutvaa, naaha.m sukhi.m daddara.m  ajja ma~n~ne..
text.5261: [22] ka.m vaa pa.ti~n~na.m purisassa sutvaa, parisa"nkasi daddara.m  maa.navena..
text.5263: [21] ci.n.naa kali"ngaa caritaa va.nijjaa, vettaacaro sa"nkupathopi  ci.n.no.
text.5264: [22] na.tehi ci.n.na.m saha vaakurehi {vaakarehi (pii0 sii0 niyya), vaagurehi (?)}, da.n.dena yuddhampi  samajjamajjhe..
text.5266: [21] baddhaa kuliikaa {kuli"nkaa (sii0 pii0)} mitamaa.lhakena, akkhaa jitaa  {akkhaacitaa (sii0 a.t.tha0)} sa.myamo  abbhatiito.
text.5267: [22] abbaahita.m {appahita.m (sii0 syaa0), abbuuhita.m (pii0 sii0 niyya)} pubbaka.m {pupphaka.m (sii0  syaa0)} a.d.dharatta.m, hatthaa da.d.dhaa pi.n.dapa.tiggahena..
text.5270: [22] yathaa aya.m dissati lomapi.n.do, gaavo hataa ki.m pana  daddarassaati..
text.5274: [21] varagijjha samajjana ha.msavaro, nidhisavhaya haarita  paa.taliko.
text.5275: [22] ajaraamara dha"nka titikkha kuto, atha dvaadasa pekkhana  daddaribhiiti..
text.5282: [21] sabbe apihitaa dvaaraa, oruddhosmi yathaa dijo.
text.5295: [22] ye ca ta.m anugijjhanti, te honti cakkadhaarino..
text.5297: [21] bahubha.n.da.m {bahu.m bha.n.da.m (sii0 pii0)} avahaaya, magga.m appa.tivekkhiya.
text.5300: [21] kamma.m samekkhe vipula~nca bhoga.m, iccha.m ^a^T1.0272^ea^ na seveyya  anatthasa.mhita.m.
text.5301: [22] kareyya vaakya.m anukampakaana.m, ta.m taadisa.m naativatteyya  cakka.m..
text.5303: [21] kiivacira.m nu me yakkha, cakka.m sirasi .thassati.
text.5304: [22] kati vassasahassaani, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito..
text.5306: [21] atisaro paccasaro {accasaro (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, mittavinda su.nohi me.
text.5307: [22] cakka.m te sirasi {sirasmi (syaa0)} maaviddha.m, na ta.m jiiva.m pamokkhasiiti..
text.5311: [21] ka.nho ^a^V1.0164^ea^ ^a^M1.0202^ea^ vataaya.m puriso,  ka.nha.m bhu~njati bhojana.m.
text.5312: [22] ka.nhe bhuumipadesasmi.m, na mayha.m manaso piyo..
text.5314: [21] na ka.nho tacasaa hoti, antosaaro hi braahma.no.
text.5315: [22] yasmi.m paapaani kammaani, sa ve ka.nho sujampati..
text.5318: [22] vara.m braahma.na te dammi, ya.m ki~nci manasicchasi..
text.5324: [21] ki.m nu kodhe vaa {kodheva (sii0 pii0)} dose vaa, lobhe snehe ca braahma.na.
text.5325: [22] aadiinava.m ^a^T1.0273^ea^ tva.m passasi {sampassasi (sii0 pii0)}, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito..
text.5327: [21] appo hutvaa bahu hoti, va.d.dhate so akhantijo.
text.5328: [22] aasa"ngii bahupaayaaso, tasmaa kodha.m na rocaye..
text.5330: [21] du.t.thassa pharusaa {pa.thamaa (pii0 sii0 niyya)} vaacaa, paraamaaso anantaraa.
text.5331: [27] tato paa.ni tato da.n.do, satthassa paramaa gati {paraamasati (ka0)}.
text.5332: [22] doso kodhasamu.t.thaano, tasmaa dosa.m na rocaye..
text.5334: [21] aalopasaahasaakaaraa {sahasaakaaraa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, nikatii va~ncanaani ca.
text.5335: [22] dissanti lobhadhammesu, tasmaa lobha.m na rocaye..
text.5337: [21] snehasa"ngathitaa {sa"ngadhitaa (ka0), sa"ngantitaa (syaa0)} ganthaa, senti  manomayaa puthuu.
text.5338: [22] te bhusa.m upataapenti, tasmaa sneha.m na rocaye..
text.5341: [22] vara.m braahma.na te dammi, ya.m ki~nci manasicchasi..
text.5345: [22] aabaadhaa maa {na (syaa0 pii0)} uppajjeyyu.m, antaraayakaraa bhusaa..
text.5348: [22] vara.m braahma.na te dammi, ya.m ki~nci manasicchasi..
text.5351: [27] na mano vaa sariira.m vaa, ma.m-kate sakka kassaci.
text.5352: [22] kadaaci ^a^T1.0274^ea^ upaha~n~netha, eta.m sakka vara.m vareti..
text.5356: [21] yo kopaneyye na karoti kopa.m, na kujjhati sappuriso  kadaaci.
text.5357: [22] kuddhopi so naavikaroti kopa.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  {sama.na.m aahu (sii0)} loke..
text.5359: [21] uunuudaro yo sahate jighaccha.m, danto tapassii  mitapaanabhojano.
text.5360: [22] aahaarahetu na karoti paapa.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu loke..
text.5362: [21] khi.d.da.m rati.m vippajahitvaana sabba.m, na caalika.m bhaasasi  ki~nci loke.
text.5363: [22] vibhuusa.t.thaanaa virato methunasmaa, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke..
text.5365: [21] pariggaha.m lobhadhamma~nca sabba.m, yo ve pari~n~naaya  pariccajeti.
text.5366: [22] danta.m .thitatta.m amama.m niraasa.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke..
text.5368: [21] pucchaama ^a^T1.0275^ea^ kattaaramanomapa~n~na.m {manomapa~n~na (syaa0 ka0)}, kathaasu  no viggaho atthi jaato.
text.5369: [22] chindajja ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaani, tadajja {tayaajja (sii0)} ka"nkha.m  vitaremu sabbe..
text.5371: [21] ye ^a^M1.0204^ea^ pa.n.ditaa atthadasaa bhavanti,  bhaasanti te yoniso tattha kaale.
text.5372: [22] katha.m nu kathaana.m abhaasitaana.m, attha.m nayeyyu.m kusalaa  janindaa..
text.5374: [21] katha.m have bhaasati naagaraajaa, garu.lo pana venateyyo  kimaaha.
text.5375: [22] gandhabbaraajaa pana ki.m vadesi, katha.m pana kuruuna.m  raajase.t.tho..
text.5377: [21] khanti.m have bhaasati naagaraajaa, appaahaara.m garu.lo  venateyyo.
text.5380: [21] sabbaani etaani subhaasitaani, na hettha dubbhaasitamatthi  ki~nci.
text.5381: [27] yasmi~nca etaani pati.t.thitaani, araava ^a^T1.0276^ea^ naabhyaa  susamohitaani.
text.5382: [22] catubbhi dhammehi sama"ngibhuuta.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke..
text.5384: [21] tuva~nhi {tuva.m nu (sii0 pii0)} se.t.tho tvamanuttarosi, tva.m dhammaguu dhammaviduu  sumedho.
text.5385: [27] pa~n~naaya pa~nha.m samadhiggahetvaa, acchecchi dhiiro  vicikicchitaani.
text.5386: [22] acchecchi ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaani, cundo yathaa  naagadanta.m kharena..
text.5388: [21] niiluppalaabha.m vimala.m anaggha.m, vattha.m ida.m dhuumasamaanava.n.na.m.
text.5389: [22] pa~nhassa ^a^T1.0277^ea^ veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te dhammapuujaaya  dhiira..
text.5392: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te dhammapuujaaya  dhiira..
text.5394: [21] ma.ni.m anaggha.m rucira.m pabhassara.m, ka.n.thaavasatta.m {vasita.m (ka0)} ma.nibhuusita.m  me.
text.5395: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te dhammapuujaaya  dhiira..
text.5397: [21] gava.m sahassa.m usabha~nca naaga.m, aaja~n~nayutte ca rathe dasa  ime.
text.5398: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te gaamavaraani  so.lasa..
text.5400: [21] saariputto tadaa naago, supa.n.no pana kolito.
text.5402: [22] vidhuro bodhisatto ca, eva.m dhaaretha jaatakanti..
text.5406: [21] bahussuto sutadhammosi sa"nkha, di.t.thaa tayaa  sama.nabraahma.naa ca.
text.5407: [22] athakkha.ne dassayase vilaapa.m, a~n~no nu ko te  pa.timantako mayaa..
text.5409: [21] subbhuu {subbhaa (syaa0), sumbhaa, subhmaa (ka0)} subhaa  suppa.timukkakambu, paggayha sova.n.namayaaya paatiyaa.
text.5410: [22] ``bhu~njassu bhatta.m'' iti ma.m vadeti, saddhaavittaa {saddhaacittaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, tamaha.m  noti bruumi..
text.5412: [21] etaadisa.m ^a^T1.0278^ea^ ^a^M1.0206^ea^ braahma.na disvaana {disva (sii0 pii0)} yakkha.m,  puccheyya poso sukhamaasisaano {sukhamaasasaano (syaa0), sukhamaasisamaano (ka0)}.
text.5413: [22] u.t.thehi na.m pa~njalikaabhipuccha, devii nusi tva.m uda  maanusii nu..
text.5415: [21] ya.m tva.m sukhenaabhisamekkhase ma.m, bhu~njassu bhatta.m iti ma.m  vadesi.
text.5416: [22] pucchaami ta.m naari mahaanubhaave, devii nusi tva.m uda  maanusii nu..
text.5418: [21] devii aha.m sa"nkha mahaanubhaavaa, idhaagataa saagaravaarimajjhe.
text.5419: [22] anukampikaa no ca padu.t.thacittaa, taveva atthaaya  idhaagataasmi..
text.5422: [22] sabbassa tyaaha.m pa.tipaadayaami, ya.m ki~nci tuyha.m  manasaabhipatthita.m..
text.5424: [21] ya.m ki~nci yi.t.tha~nca huta~nca {yi.t.tha.mva huta.mva (sii0 pii0)} mayha.m,   sabbassa no issaraa tva.m sugatte.
text.5425: [22] suso.ni subbhamu {subbhu (sii0), subbhaa (syaa0)} suvilaggamajjhe {suvilaakamajjhe (syaa0  pii0 sii0 a.t.tha0), suvilaatamajjhe (ka0)}, kissa me kammassa  aya.m vipaako..
text.5427: [21] ghamme ^a^T1.0279^ea^ pathe braahma.na ekabhikkhu.m, uggha.t.tapaada.m tasita.m  kilanta.m.
text.5428: [22] pa.tipaadayii sa"nkha upaahanaani {upaahanaahi (sii0 pii0)}, saa dakkhi.naa kaamaduhaa  tavajja..
text.5430: [21] saa ^a^M1.0207^ea^ hotu naavaa phalakuupapannaa,  anavassutaa erakavaatayuttaa.
text.5431: [22] a~n~nassa yaanassa na hettha {na hatthi (pii0)} bhuumi, ajjeva ma.m mo.lini.m  paapayassu..
text.5433: [21] saa ^a^V1.0167^ea^ tattha vittaa sumanaa patiitaa, naava.m  sucitta.m abhinimminitvaa.
text.5434: [22] aadaaya sa"nkha.m purisena saddhi.m, upaanayii nagara.m  saadhurammanti..
text.5438: [21] yo te ima.m visaalakkhi.m, piya.m samhitabhaasini.m {sammillabhaasini.m (sii0  pii0), sammillahaasini.m (syaa0)}.
text.5439: [22] aadaaya balaa gaccheyya, ki.m nu kayiraasi braahma.na..

text.5444: [21] ya.m nu pubbe vikatthittho {vikatthito (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka0)}, balamhiva apassito.

text.5450: [21] ki.m te uppajji no mucci, ki.m te na mucci jiivato.
text.5451: [22] raja.mva vipulaa vu.t.thi, katama.m tva.m nivaarayi..

text.5457: [22] so me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro..
text.5460: [22] so me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro..
text.5462: [21] yenaabhibhuuto kusala.m jahaati, parakkare vipula~ncaapi attha.m.

text.5465: [21] ka.t.thasmi.m matthamaanasmi.m {manthamaanasmi.m (pii0), maddamaanasmi.m (ka0)}, paavako  naama jaayati.
text.5466: [22] tameva ka.t.tha.m .dahati, yasmaa so jaayate gini..
text.5474: [21] anedho ^a^V1.0168^ea^ {anindho (sii0 ka0), anindo (syaa0)} dhuumaketuuva,  kodho yassuupasammati.
text.5479: [21] sattaahamevaaha.m pasannacitto, pu~n~natthiko aacari.m {acari.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  brahmacariya.m.
text.5480: [27] athaapara.m ya.m carita.m mameda.m {mama yida.m (syaa0), mamaayida.m (pii0)}, vassaani pa~n~naasa  samaadhikaani.
text.5481: [27] akaamako vaapi {vaahi (pii0 ka0)} aha.m caraami, etena ^a^T1.0282^ea^ saccena suvatthi  hotu.
text.5484: [21] yasmaa ^a^M1.0209^ea^ daana.m naabhinandi.m kadaaci,  disvaanaha.m atithi.m vaasakaale.
text.5485: [22] na caapi me appiyata.m avedu.m, bahussutaa sama.nabraahma.naa  ca..
text.5486: [21] akaamako vaapi aha.m dadaami, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu.

text.5494: [22] diipaayana kissa jigucchamaano, akaamako carasi  brahmacariya.m..

text.5500: [21] sama.ne ^a^M1.0210^ea^ tuva.m braahma.ne addhike ca,  santappayaasi ^a^T1.0283^ea^ annapaanena bhikkha.m.

text.5512: [21] aaraa ^a^V1.0169^ea^ duure nayidha kadaaci atthi, paramparaa  naama kule imasmi.m.

text.5514: [22] etassa vaadassa jigucchamaanaa, akaamikaa paddhacaraamhi  {pa.t.thacaraamhi (syaa0 ka0)} tuyha.m..
text.5516: [21] ma.n.dabya ^a^M1.0211^ea^ bhaasi.m yamabhaasaneyya.m {bhaasissa.m abhaasaneyya.m (sii0  syaa0 pii0), bhaasissa'mabhaasaneyya.m (?)}, ta.m  khamyata.m puttakahetu majja.
text.5517: [22] puttapemaa na idha paratthi ki~nci, so no aya.m jiivati  ya~n~nadattoti..
text.5521: [21] na vaahameta.m {na caahameta.m (sii0)} jaanaami, ko vaaya.m  kassa vaati vaa {caati vaa (sii0)}.
text.5522: [22] yathaa saakho cari {vadii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} eva.m, nigrodha kinti ma~n~nasi..

text.5530: [21] na vaahameta.m jaanaami, napi me koci sa.msati.
text.5531: [22] ya.m me tva.m samma akkhaasi, saakhena kaara.na.m {ka.d.dhana.m (sii0 syaa0)} kata.m..

text.5541: [22] sukhette viya biijaani, kata.m tamhi na nassati..

text.5546: [21] khamatassa ^a^M1.0212^ea^ mahaaraaja, paa.naa na  pa.tiaanayaa {duppa.tiaanayaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.

text.5554: [21] na ^a^V1.0170^ea^ takkalaa santi na aaluvaani {aalupaani (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}, na  bi.laaliyo na ka.lambaani taata.
text.5555: [22] eko ara~n~namhi susaanamajjhe, kimatthiko taata  kha.naasi kaasu.m..
text.5557: [21] pitaamaho ^a^T1.0286^ea^ taata sudubbalo te, anekabyaadhiihi dukhena  phu.t.tho.

text.5560: [21] sa"nkappameta.m pa.tiladdha paapaka.m, accaahita.m kamma karosi  ludda.m.

text.5562: [22] ta.m kullavatta.m anuvattamaano, ahampi ta.m nikha.nissaami  sobbhe..
text.5564: [21] pharusaahi vaacaahi pakubbamaano, aasajja ma.m tva.m vadase  kumaara.

text.5568: [22] paapa~nca ta.m kamma pakubbamaana.m, arahaami no vaarayitu.m  tato..
text.5570: [21] yo maatara.m vaa pitara.m savi.t.tha {maatara.m pitara.m vaa vasi.t.tha (sii0 pii0)}, aduusake hi.msati  paapadhammo.
text.5571: [22] kaayassa ^a^T1.0287^ea^ bhedaa abhisamparaaya.m, asa.msaya.m so niraya.m  upeti {pareti (sii0 pii0)}..
text.5573: [21] yo maatara.m vaa pitara.m savi.t.tha, annena paanena upa.t.thahaati.
text.5574: [22] kaayassa bhedaa abhisamparaaya.m, asa.msaya.m so sugati.m  upeti..
text.5576: [21] na me tva.m putta ahitaanukampii, hitaanukampii me {mama (?)} tva.msi  putta.
text.5577: [22] aha~nca ta.m maataraa vuccamaano, etaadisa.m kamma karomi  ludda.m..
text.5579: [21] yaa te saa bhariyaa anariyaruupaa, maataa mamesaa sakiyaa  janetti.
text.5580: [22] niddhaapaye {niddhaamase (pii0)} ta~nca sakaa agaaraa, a~n~nampi te saa  dukhamaavaheyya..
text.5582: [21] yaa te saa bhariyaa anariyaruupaa, maataa mamesaa sakiyaa  janetti.
text.5583: [22] dantaa kare.nuuva vasuupaniitaa, saa paapadhammaa punaraavajaatuuti..
text.5587: [21] ki.m ^a^T1.0288^ea^ ^a^M1.0214^ea^ te vata.m ki.m pana brahmacariya.m,  kissa suci.n.nassa aya.m vipaako.
text.5588: [22] akkhaahi me braahma.na etamattha.m, kasmaa nu tumha.m daharaa  na miyyare {miiyare (sii0 pii0)}..
text.5590: [21] dhamma.m caraama na musaa bha.naama, paapaani kammaani  parivajjayaama {vivajjayaama (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.5591: [22] anariya.m parivajjemu sabba.m, tasmaa hi amha.m daharaa na  miyyare..
text.5593: [21] su.noma ^a^V1.0171^ea^ dhamma.m asata.m sata~nca, na caapi  dhamma.m asata.m rocayaama.
text.5594: [22] hitvaa asante na jahaama sante, tasmaa hi amha.m daharaa  na miyyare..

text.5599: [21] sama.ne maya.m braahma.ne addhike ca, vanibbake yaacanake  dalidde.
text.5600: [22] annena paanena abhitappayaama, tasmaa ^a^T1.0289^ea^ hi amha.m daharaa na  miyyare..
text.5602: [21] maya~nca bhariya.m naatikkamaama, amhe ca bhariyaa  naatikkamanti.
text.5603: [22] a~n~natra taahi brahmacariya.m caraama, tasmaa hi amha.m daharaa  na miyyare..
text.5605: [21] paa.naatipaataa ^a^M1.0215^ea^ viramaama sabbe, loke  adinna.m parivajjayaama.
text.5606: [22] amajjapaa nopi musaa bha.naama, tasmaa hi amha.m daharaa na  miyyare..
text.5608: [21] etaasu ve jaayare suttamaasu, medhaavino honti  pahuutapa~n~naa.
text.5609: [22] bahussutaa vedaguno {vedagu.naa (syaa0 ka0)} ca honti, tasmaa hi amha.m daharaa na  miyyare..
text.5611: [21] maataa pitaa ca {maataa ca pitaa (ka0), maataapitaraa (syaa0)} bhaginii bhaataro ca, puttaa ca daaraa ca  maya~nca sabbe.
text.5612: [22] dhamma.m caraama paralokahetu, tasmaa hi amha.m daharaa na  miyyare..
text.5614: [21] daasaa ca daasyo {daasso (sii0 pii0), daasii (syaa0)} anujiivino  ca, paricaarakaa kammakaraa ca sabbe.
text.5615: [22] dhamma.m caranti paralokahetu, tasmaa ^a^T1.0290^ea^ hi amha.m daharaa na  miyyare..
text.5617: [21] dhammo have rakkhati dhammacaari.m, dhammo suci.n.no  sukhamaavahaati.

text.5629: [22] ghasanti ma~n~ne mittaani, vaacaaya na ca kammunaa..
text.5634: [21] na ^a^V1.0172^ea^ hi a~n~na~n~nacittaana.m, itthiina.m purisaana  vaa.
text.5635: [22] naanaavikatvaa {naanaava katvaa (sii0 pii0)} sa.msagga.m, taadisampi ca naasmase {taadisampi na  vissase (syaa0)}..
text.5643: [21] aamisa.m vaa dhana.m vaapi, yattha passati taadiso.
text.5644: [22] dubbhi.m karoti dummedho, ta~nca hantvaana {jhaatvaana (sii0 pii0), hitvaana (syaa0)} gacchati..

text.5649: [21] yo ca {yodha (jaa0 1.8.25 sulasaajaatake)} uppatita.m attha.m, na khippamanubujjhati.
text.5652: [21] yo ca uppatita.m attha.m, khippameva nibodhati.
text.5655: [21] ta.m taadisa.m kuu.tamivo.d.dita.m vane, adhammika.m  niccavidha.msakaarina.m.

text.5660: [21] ala"nkato ^a^T1.0292^ea^ ^a^M1.0217^ea^ ma.t.thaku.n.dalii {ma.t.taku.n.dalii (sii0 pii0)},   maaladhaarii {maalabhaarii (sii0 pii0)} haricandanussado.

text.5669: [21] so {atha (syaa0)} maa.navo tassa paavadi, candimasuuriyaa  {candimasuuriyaa (syaa0)} ubhayettha bhaataro {dissare (vi0 va0 1210)}.
text.5670: [22] sova.n.namayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhati..

text.5673: [22] ma~n~naami tuva.m marissasi, na ^a^T1.0293^ea^ hi tva.m lacchasi  candasuuriye..
text.5676: [22] peto pana neva dissati, ko nu kho {ko nidha (vi0 va0 1212)} kandata.m baalyataro..

text.5679: [22] canda.m viya daarako ruda.m, peta.m kaalakataabhipatthaye..
text.5681: [21] aaditta.m vata ma.m santa.m, ghatasitta.mva paavaka.m.
text.5682: [22] vaarinaa viya osi~nca.m, sabba.m nibbaapaye dara.m..
text.5684: [21] abbahii {abbuhi (syaa0), abbhu.lha.m (ka0)} vata  me salla.m, yamaasi hadayassita.m {soka.m hadayanissita.m (vi0 va0 1215)}.
text.5688: [22] na socaami na rodaami, tava sutvaana maa.navaati..
text.5693: [22] kimeva tva.m pacamaano, ya.m na dajjaa na ta.m sama.m..

text.5708: [21] tasmaa sata~nca asata.m {asata~nca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, naanaa hoti ito gati.
text.5712: [22] appasmaa dakkhi.naa dinnaa, sahassena sama.m mitaa..
text.5714: [21] dhamma.m care yopi samu~nchaka.m care, daara~nca posa.m  dadamappakasmi.m {dada.m appakasmipi (pii0)}.
text.5715: [22] sata.m sahassaana.m sahassayaagina.m, kalampi ^a^T1.0295^ea^ naagghanti  tathaavidhassa te..
text.5717: [21] kenesa ^a^V1.0174^ea^ ya~n~no vipulo mahagghato {mahaggato (sa.m0 ni0   1.32)}, samena dinnassa na agghameti.
text.5718: [22] katha.m sata.m sahassaana.m {katha.m sahassaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sahassayaagina.m, kalampi naagghanti  tathaavidhassa te..
text.5720: [21] dadanti heke visame nivi.t.thaa, chetvaa {jhatvaa (sii0 pii0), ghatvaa  (syaa0)} vadhitvaa atha socayitvaa.
text.5721: [27] saa dakkhi.naa assumukhaa sada.n.daa, samena dinnassa na  agghameti.
text.5722: [22] eva.m sata.m sahassaana.m {eva.m sahassaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sahassayaagina.m, kalampi naagghanti  tathaavidhassa teti..
text.5729: [21] paa.thiina.m paavusa.m maccha.m, balaja.m {vaalaja.m (sii0 pii0), balajja.m (syaa0)}   mu~njarohita.m.
text.5730: [22] ga"ngaaya tiire nisinno {ga"ngaatiire nisinnosi (syaa0 ka0)}, eva.m bhu~njasi bhojana.m..
text.5732: [21] na vaahameta.m {sabbatthapi samaana.m} bhu~njaami, ja"ngalaanodakaani vaa.
text.5733: [22] a~n~natra sevaalapa.nakaa, eta.m {a~n~na.m (syaa0)} me samma bhojana.m..
text.5739: [22] na ^a^T1.0296^ea^ ca me taadiso va.n.no, cakkavaaka yathaa tuva.m..
text.5741: [21] sampassa.m attani vera.m, hi.msaya.m {hi.msaaya (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} maanusi.m paja.m.
text.5742: [22] utrasto ghasasii bhiito, tena va.n.no tavediso..
text.5745: [22] laddho pi.n.do na pii.neti, tena va.n.no tavediso..
text.5751: [22] ahi.msaaya cara loke, piyo hohisi ma.mmiva..
text.5753: [21] yo na hanti na ghaateti, na jinaati na jaapaye.
text.5754: [22] metta.mso sabbabhuutesu, vera.m tassa na kenaciiti..
text.5758: [21] sacca.m ^a^V1.0175^ea^ kira tva.m api {tvampi (sii0), tuvampi (syaa0), tva.m  asi (ka0)} bhuuripa~n~na, yaa  taadisii siiri dhitii matii ca.
text.5759: [22] na taayatebhaavavasuupanita.m, yo yavaka.m bhu~njasi appasuupa.m..
text.5761: [21] sukha.m dukkhena paripaacayanto, kaalaa kaala.m vicina.m  chandachanno.
text.5762: [22] atthassa ^a^T1.0297^ea^ dvaaraani avaapuranto, tenaaha.m tussaami  yavodanena..
text.5765: [22] vijambhissa.m siihavijambhitaani, taayiddhiyaa dakkhasi  ma.m punaapi..
text.5767: [21] sukhiipi heke {sukhii hi eke (sii0), sukhiiti heke (?)} na karonti paapa.m, ava.n.nasa.msaggabhayaa  puneke.
text.5768: [22] pahuu samaano vipulatthacintii, ki.mkaara.naa me na karosi  dukkha.m..
text.5770: [21] na pa.n.ditaa attasukhassa hetu, paapaani kammaani  samaacaranti.
text.5771: [22] dukkhena phu.t.thaa khalitaapi santaa, chandaa ca dosaa na  jahanti dhamma.m..
text.5773: [21] yena kenaci va.n.nena, mudunaa daaru.nena vaa.
text.5776: [21] yassa rukkhassa chaayaaya, nisiideyya sayeyya vaa.
text.5777: [22] na tassa saakha.m bha~njeyya, mittadubbho hi paapako..
text.5779: [21] yassaapi {yassa hi (sii0 ka0)} dhamma.m puriso {manujo (sii0)}   vija~n~naa, ye cassa ka"nkha.m vinayanti santo.
text.5780: [22] ta.m ^a^T1.0298^ea^ hissa diipa~nca paraayana~nca, na tena metti.m jarayetha  pa~n~no..
text.5782: [21] alaso gihii kaamabhogii na saadhu, asa~n~nato pabbajito  na saadhu.
text.5783: [22] raajaa na saadhu anisammakaarii, yo pa.n.dito kodhano ta.m  na saadhu..
text.5786: [22] nisammakaarino raaja, yaso kitti ca va.d.dhatiiti..
text.5790: [21] ki.msu ^a^M1.0222^ea^ naro jappamadhiccakaale, ka.m vaa  vijja.m katama.m vaa sutaana.m.
text.5791: [22] so macco asmi~nca {asmi.mva (pii0)} paramhi loke, katha.m karo  sotthaanena gutto..
text.5793: [21] yassa devaa pitaro ca sabbe, sariisapaa {siri.msapaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sabbabhuutaani  caapi.
text.5794: [22] mettaaya nicca.m apacitaani honti, bhuutesu ve sotthaana.m  tadaahu..
text.5799: [21] yo naavajaanaati sahaayamitte {sahaayamatte (sii0 pii0)}, sippena kulyaahi dhanena  jaccaa.
text.5800: [22] rucipa~n~no atthakaale matiimaa {mutiimaa (sii0 pii0)}, sahaayesu ve sotthaana.m  tadaahu..
text.5802: [21] mittaani ve yassa bhavanti santo, sa.mvissatthaa  avisa.mvaadakassa.
text.5803: [22] na mittadubbhii sa.mvibhaagii dhanena, mittesu ve sotthaana.m  tadaahu..
text.5805: [21] yassa bhariyaa tulyavayaa samaggaa, anubbataa dhammakaamaa  pajaataa {sajaataa (ka0)}.
text.5806: [22] koliniyaa siilavatii patibbataa, daaresu ve sotthaana.m  tadaahu..
text.5808: [21] yassa ^a^M1.0223^ea^ raajaa bhuutapati {bhuutapatii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} yasassii,  jaanaati soceyya.m parakkama~nca.
text.5809: [22] advejjhataa suhadaya.m mamanti, raajuusu ve sotthaana.m tadaahu..
text.5811: [21] anna~nca ^a^T1.0300^ea^ paana~nca dadaati saddho, maala~nca gandha~nca  vilepana~nca.
text.5812: [22] pasannacitto anumodamaano, saggesu ve sotthaana.m tadaahu..
text.5814: [21] yamariyadhammena punanti vuddhaa, aaraadhitaa samacariyaaya  santo.
text.5815: [22] bahussutaa isayo siilavanto, arahantamajjhe sotthaana.m  tadaahu..
text.5817: [21] etaani kho sotthaanaani loke, vi~n~nuppasatthaani  sukhudrayaani {sukhindriyaani (pii0)}.
text.5818: [22] taaniidha sevetha naro sapa~n~no, na hi ma"ngale  ki~ncanamatthi saccanti..
text.5822: [21] u.t.thehi ka.nha ki.m sesi, ko attho supanena te.
text.5823: [27] yopi tuyha.m {taaya.m (pii0)} sako bhaataa, hadaya.m cakkhu ca {cakkhu.mva (pii0)} dakkhi.na.m.
text.5824: [22] tassa vaataa baliiyanti, gha.to jappati {sasa.m jappati (?)} kesava..
text.5826: [21] tassa ta.m vacana.m sutvaa, rohi.neyyassa kesavo.
text.5829: [21] ki.m nu ^a^T1.0301^ea^ ummattaruupova, kevala.m dvaaraka.m ima.m.
text.5830: [22] saso sasoti lapasi, ko nu te sasamaahari..
text.5838: [21] na ^a^V1.0177^ea^ caahamete {na caahameta.m (sii0), na vaahamete (syaa0), na  vaahameta.m (pii0)} icchaami, ye sasaa pathavissitaa {pa.thavi.msitaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.5839: [22] candato sasamicchaami, ta.m me ohara kesava..
text.5845: [22] kasmaa pure mata.m putta.m, ajjaapi manusocasi..
text.5847: [21] ya.m na labbhaa manussena, amanussena vaa puna {pana  (pe0 va0 215)}.
text.5848: [22] jaato me maa marii putto, kuto labbhaa alabbhiya.m..
text.5850: [21] na mantaa muulabhesajjaa, osadhehi dhanena vaa.
text.5856: [21] aaditta.m vata ma.m santa.m, ghatasitta.mva paavaka.m.
text.5857: [22] vaarinaa viya osi~nca.m, sabba.m nibbaapaye dara.m..
text.5859: [21] abbahii ^a^T1.0302^ea^ vata me salla.m, yamaasi hadayassita.m.
text.5863: [22] na socaami na rodaami, tava sutvaana maa.nava {bhaatika (pe0 va0 224)}..
text.5865: [21] eva.m karonti sappa~n~naa, ye honti anukampakaa.
text.5870: [21] da.lha ^a^M1.0225^ea^ ka.nha dhana~njaya sa"nkhavaro,  raja sattaha kassa ca {sattaahasasaakha (syaa0)} takkalinaa.
text.5871: [22] dhamma.m kukku.ta ku.n.dali bhojanadaa, cakkavaaka subhuurisa  sotthi gha.toti..
text.5875: [21] tassa ^a^T1.0303^ea^ ^a^V1.0178^ea^ ^a^M1.0226^ea^ naagassa  vippavaasena, viruu.lhaa sallakii ca ku.tajaa ca.
text.5876: [22] kuruvindakaraviiraa {karavaraa (sii0 syaa0)} tisasaamaa ca, nivaate pupphitaa ca  ka.nikaaraa..
text.5879: [22] yattha raajaa raajakumaaro vaa, kavacamabhihessati  achambhito {asambhiito (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.5881: [21] ga.nhaahi naaga kaba.la.m, maa naaga kisako bhava.
text.5882: [22] bahuuni raajakiccaani, taani {yaani (sii0 pii0)} naaga karissasi..
text.5885: [22] khaa.nu.m paadena gha.t.teti, giri.m ca.n.dora.na.m pati..
text.5887: [21] kaa nu te saa mahaanaaga, andhaa apari.naayikaa.
text.5888: [22] khaa.nu.m paadena gha.t.teti, giri.m ca.n.dora.na.m pati..
text.5890: [21] maataa me saa mahaaraaja, andhaa apari.naayikaa.
text.5891: [22] khaa.nu.m paadena gha.t.teti, giri.m ca.n.dora.na.m pati..
text.5896: [21] mutto ca bandhanaa naago, muttamaadaaya ku~njaro {kaasiraajena pesito (sii0  syaa0), mutto daamaato ku~njaro (pii0 sii0 niyya)}.
text.5899: [21] tato so na.lini.m {nilina.m (syaa0)} gantvaa, siita.m ku~njarasevita.m.
text.5902: [21] koya ^a^M1.0227^ea^ anariyo devo, akaalenapi  vassati {akaalena pavassati (sii0 syaa0), akaalena'tivassati (pii0)}.
text.5903: [22] gato me atrajo putto, yo mayha.m paricaarako..
text.5905: [21] u.t.thehi amma ki.m sesi, aagato tyaahamatrajo.
text.5908: [21] cira.m ^a^V1.0179^ea^ jiivatu so raajaa, kaasiina.m  ra.t.thava.d.dhano.
text.5909: [22] yo me putta.m pamocesi, sadaa vuddhaapacaayikanti..
text.5913: [21] su.nohi mayha.m vacana.m janinda, atthena ju.nhamhi  idhaanupatto.
text.5914: [22] na braahma.ne addhike ti.t.thamaane, gantabba {gantabya (ka0)} maahu dvipadinda {dipadaana (sii0  pii0), dvipadaana (syaa0)} se.t.tha..
text.5916: [21] su.nomi ^a^T1.0305^ea^ ti.t.thaami vadehi brahme, yenaasi {yenaapi (syaa0 ka0)} atthena  idhaanupatto.
text.5917: [22] ka.m vaa tvamattha.m mayi patthayaano, idhaagamaa brahme tadi"ngha  bruuhi..
text.5919: [21] dadaahi me gaamavaraani pa~nca, daasiisata.m satta gava.msataani.
text.5920: [22] parosahassa~nca suva.n.nanikkhe, bhariyaa ca me saadisii  dve dadaahi..
text.5922: [21] tapo nu te braahma.na bhi.msaruupo, mantaa nu te braahma.na  cittaruupaa.
text.5923: [22] yakkhaa nu {yakkhaa va (sii0 pii0)} te assavaa santi keci, attha.m vaa me  abhijaanaasi katta.m..
text.5925: [21] na ^a^M1.0228^ea^ me tapo atthi na caapi mantaa,  yakkhaapi me assavaa natthi keci.
text.5926: [22] atthampi te naabhijaanaami katta.m, pubbe ca kho {pubbeva kho (syaa0 ka0)}  sa"ngatimattamaasi..
text.5928: [21] pa.thama.m ida.m dassana.m jaanato me, na taabhijaanaami ito  puratthaa.
text.5929: [22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, kadaa kuhi.m vaa ahu  sa"ngamo no..
text.5931: [21] gandhaararaajassa ^a^T1.0306^ea^ puramhi ramme, avasimhase takkasiilaaya.m  deva.
text.5932: [22] tatthandhakaaramhi timiisikaaya.m {timissikaaya.m (sii0 a.t.tha0), timissakaaya.m (syaa0)},   a.msena a.msa.m samagha.t.tayimha..
text.5934: [21] te tattha .thatvaana ubho janinda, saaraa.niya.m {saara.niiya.m (ka0)}  viitisaarayimha {viitisaarimha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} tattha.
text.5935: [22] saayeva no sa"ngatimattamaasi, tato na pacchaa na pure  ahosi..
text.5937: [21] yadaa kadaaci manujesu brahme, samaagamo sappurisena hoti.
text.5938: [22] na pa.n.ditaa sa"ngatisanthavaani, pubbe kata.m vaapi  vinaasayanti..
text.5940: [21] baalaava {baalaa ca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kho sa"ngatisanthavaani, pubbe kata.m vaapi  vinaasayanti.
text.5941: [22] bahumpi baalesu kata.m vinassati, tathaa hi baalaa  akata~n~nuruupaa..

text.5944: [22] appampi dhiiresu kata.m na nassati, tathaa hi dhiiraa  sukata~n~nuruupaa..
text.5946: [21] dadaami ^a^T1.0307^ea^ ^a^M1.0229^ea^ te gaamavaraani pa~nca,  daasiisata.m satta gava.msataani.
text.5947: [22] parosahassa~nca suva.n.nanikkhe, bhariyaa ca te saadisii  dve dadaami..
text.5949: [21] eva.m ^a^V1.0180^ea^ sata.m hoti samecca raaja,  nakkhattaraajaariva taarakaana.m.
text.5950: [22] aapuuratii kaasipatii tathaaha.m, tayaapi me sa"ngamo ajja  laddhoti..
text.5955: [22] maggaaraho devamanussapuujito, dhammo aha.m dehi adhamma  magga.m..
text.5958: [22] sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajja.m, magga.m aha.m dhamma  adinnapubba.m..
text.5960: [21] dhammo have paaturahosi pubbe, pacchaa ^a^T1.0308^ea^ adhammo udapaadi  loke.

text.5966: [21] sabbaa ^a^M1.0230^ea^ disaa anuvisa.tohamasmi,  mahabbalo amitayaso atulyo.
text.5967: [22] gu.nehi sabbehi upetaruupo, dhammo adhamma tva.m katha.m  vijessasi..
text.5969: [21] lohena ve ha~n~nati jaataruupa.m, na jaataruupena hananti  loha.m.

text.5972: [21] sace tuva.m yuddhabalo adhamma {yuddhabalo'si'dhamma (ka0 sii0),  yuddhabalo'sa'dhamma (pii0)}, na tuyha vu.d.dhaa {vaddhaa (sii0 pii0)} ca garuu ca  atthi.

text.5978: [21] khantiibalo yuddhabala.m vijetvaa, hantvaa adhamma.m  nihanitva {vihanitvaa (ka0)} bhuumyaa.

text.6024: [21] devaa na jiiranti yathaa manussaa, gattesu tesa.m valiyo  na honti.

text.6069: [21] pitara.m ^a^V1.0183^ea^ me mahaaraaja, coraa aga.nhu {aga.nhu.m (sii0 pii0),  aga.nhi (ka0)} kaanane.
text.6070: [22] tesaaha.m pucchito jaana.m, a~n~nathaa na.m viyaakari.m..
text.6072: [21] tena pacchaa vijigucchi.m, ta.m paapa.m pakata.m mayaa.

text.6078: [21] ta.m paapa.m pakata.m mayaa, maa puna akara.m paapa.m.
text.6081: [21] suraamerayamaadhukaa {madhukaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, ye janaa pa.thamaasu no.
text.6085: [27] ta.m paapa.m pakata.m mayaa, maa puna akara.m paapa.m.
text.6089: [22] ye aha.m pa.tisevanto, naalabhi.m taadisa.m sukha.m..

text.6164: [21] kiso viva.n.no bhavati, hi.msamattaanamattano {mattanaa (sii0 a.t.tha0  su0 ni0 590)}.

text.6188: [21] ti.t.thante no mahaaraaje, adu {aadu (sii0 pii0), aaduu (syaa0)} deve diva"ngate.
text.6194: [21] na ^a^V1.0186^ea^ raajaputta usuuyaami {raajaputta nussuyyaami (ka0)}, sama.naana.m mahesina.m.
text.6195: [22] sakkacca.m ^a^T1.0319^ea^ te namassaami, paade vandaami taadina.m..
text.6198: [22] sama.naa manusaasanti {samanusaasanti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, isii dhammagu.ne rataa..
text.6201: [22] na ki~nci atima~n~naami, dhamme me nirato mano..
text.6206: [21] mahaamattaa ca me atthi, mantino paricaarakaa.
text.6210: [22] tesu me vihitaa rakkhaa, eva.m jaanaahuposatha..
text.6213: [22] medhaavii pa.n.dito caasi {caapi (sii0 pii0)}, athopi ~naatina.m hito..
text.6221: [22] suppaaraka.m ^a^T1.0320^ea^ ta.m pucchaama, samuddo katamo aya.m..
text.6223: [21] kurukacchaa {bharukacchaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0 a.t.tha0)} payaataana.m, vaa.nijaana.m dhanesina.m.
text.6226: [21] yathaa aggiiva suriyova {aggi suriyo ca (syaa0), aggiiva suuriyo  (ka0)}, samuddo pa.tidissati.
text.6227: [22] suppaaraka.m ta.m pucchaama, samuddo katamo aya.m..
text.6232: [21] yathaa dadhiiva khiira.mva {dadhi ca khiira.m ca (syaa0), evamuparipi}, samuddo pa.tidissati.
text.6233: [22] suppaaraka.m ta.m pucchaama, samuddo katamo aya.m..
text.6239: [22] suppaaraka.m ta.m pucchaama, samuddo katamo aya.m..
text.6245: [22] suppaaraka.m ta.m pucchaama, samuddo katamo aya.m..
text.6250: [21] mahabbhayo bhi.msanako, saddo suyyatimaanuso {samuddo suyyata'maanuso (sii0  pii0 a.t.tha0)}.
text.6252: [22] suppaaraka.m ta.m pucchaama, samuddo katamo aya.m..
text.6255: [22] naavaaya vippana.t.thaaya, ba.lavaamukhiiti {va.labhaamukhiiti (sii0 syaa0), balavaamukhiiti (syaa0  ka0)} vuccati..
text.6257: [21] yato saraami attaana.m, yato pattosmi vi~n~nuta.m.
text.6264: [22] atha paani yudha~ncayako ca, dasaratha sa.mvara paaragatena  navaati..
text.6268: [21] luddhaana.m ^a^T1.0322^ea^ ^a^V1.0188^ea^ ^a^M1.0241^ea^ {khuddaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} lahucittaana.m,  akata~n~nuuna dubbhina.m.
text.6271: [21] na taa pajaananti kata.m na kicca.m, na maatara.m pitara.m  bhaatara.m vaa.
text.6272: [22] anariyaa samatikkantadhammaa, sasseva cittassa vasa.m  vajanti..
text.6274: [21] ciraanuvu.t.thampi {ciraanuvutthampi (sii0 pii0)} piya.m  manaapa.m, anukampaka.m paa.nasamampi bhattu.m {santa.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.6275: [22] aavaasu kiccesu ca na.m jahanti, tasmaahamitthiina.m na  vissasaami..
text.6277: [21] thiina~nhi citta.m yathaa vaanarassa, kannappakanna.m yathaa  rukkhachaayaa.
text.6278: [22] calaacala.m hadayamitthiyaana.m, cakkassa nemi viya  parivattati..
text.6280: [21] yadaa taa passanti samekkhamaanaa, aadeyyaruupa.m purisassa  vitta.m.
text.6281: [22] sa.nhaahi vaacaahi nayanti mena.m, kambojakaa ^a^T1.0323^ea^ jalajeneva  assa.m..
text.6283: [21] yadaa na passanti samekkhamaanaa, aadeyyaruupa.m purisassa  vitta.m.
text.6284: [22] samantato na.m parivajjayanti, ti.n.no nadiipaaragatova  kulla.m..
text.6286: [21] silesuupamaa ^a^M1.0242^ea^ sikhiriva sabbabhakkhaa,  tikkhamaayaa nadiiriva siighasotaa.
text.6287: [22] sevanti hetaa piyamappiya~nca, naavaa yathaa orakuula.m  para~nca..
text.6289: [21] na taa ekassa na dvinna.m, aapa.nova pasaarito.
text.6290: [22] yo taa mayhanti ma~n~neyya, vaata.m jaalena baadhaye {bandhaye (syaa0 ka0)}..
text.6292: [21] yathaa nadii ca pantho ca, paanaagaara.m sabhaa papaa.
text.6293: [22] eva.m lokitthiyo naama, velaa taasa.m na vijjati {imissaa gaathaaya pubbaddhaaparaddha.m vipariyaayena  dissati (ka0)}..
text.6298: [21] ghataasana.m ku~njara.m ka.nhasappa.m, muddhaabhisitta.m pamadaa ca  sabbaa.
text.6299: [22] ete naro niccayato {niccayatto (sii0 pii0)} bhajetha, tesa.m have dubbidu  sabbabhaavo {saccabhaavo (syaa0)}..
text.6301: [21] naccantava.n.naa ^a^T1.0324^ea^ ^a^V1.0189^ea^ na bahuuna.m kantaa, na  dakkhi.naa pamadaa sevitabbaa.
text.6302: [22] na parassa bhariyaa na dhanassa hetu, etitthiyo pa~nca na  sevitabbaati..
text.6306: [21] kaa tva.m suddhehi vatthehi, aghe vehaayasa.m {vehaasaya.m (sii0 pii0)} .thitaa.
text.6307: [22] kena tyaassuuni vattanti, kuto ta.m bhayamaagata.m..
text.6309: [21] taveva deva vijite, bhaddasaaloti ma.m viduu.
text.6310: [22] sa.t.thi {sa.t.thi.m (sii0 pii0)} vassasahassaani, ti.t.thato puujitassa me..
text.6313: [27] vividhe caapi paasaade, na ma.m te accama~n~nisu.m.
text.6314: [22] yatheva ma.m te puujesu.m, tatheva tvampi puujaya..
text.6316: [21] ta.m ivaaha.m {ta~nca aha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} na passaami, thuula.m kaayena te duma.m.
text.6320: [22] tattha ta.m upanessaami, cira.m te yakkha jiivita.m..
text.6325: [21] agge ^a^T1.0325^ea^ ca chetvaa majjhe ca, pacchaa muulamhi chindatha {muula~nca chindatha  (sii0), muula.m vichindatha (pii0)}.
text.6326: [22] eva.m me chijjamaanassa, na dukkha.m mara.na.m siyaa..
text.6329: [22] tato pacchaa siro chinde, ta.m dukkha.m mara.na.m siyaa..
text.6332: [22] ki.m hetu ki.m upaadaaya, kha.n.daso chinnamicchasi..
text.6345: [21] kasanti ^a^M1.0244^ea^ vapanti te janaa, manujaa  kammaphaluupajiivino.
text.6346: [22] nayimassa diipakassa bhaagino, jambudiipaa idameva no  vara.m..
text.6348: [21] tipa~ncarattuupagatamhi cande, vego ^a^T1.0326^ea^ mahaa hehiti saagarassa.
text.6349: [22] uplavissa.m diipamima.m u.laara.m, maa vo vadhii gacchatha  le.nama~n~na.m..
text.6351: [21] na jaatuya.m saagaravaarivego, uplavissa.m diipamima.m u.laara.m.
text.6352: [22] ta.m me nimittehi bahuuhi di.t.tha.m, maa bhetha ki.m socatha  modathavho {modatha vo (ka0) 6.38 moggallaanasutta.m passitabba.m}..
text.6355: [22] na vo bhaya.m pa.tipassaami ki~nci, aaputtaputtehi  pamodathavho..
text.6357: [21] yo devoya.m dakkhi.naaya.m {dakkhi.nassa.m (sii0)} disaaya.m, khemanti pakkosati  tassa sacca.m.
text.6358: [22] na uttaro vedi bhayaabhayassa, maa bhetha ki.m socatha  modathavho..
text.6360: [21] yathaa ime vippavadanti yakkhaa, eko bhaya.m sa.msati  khemameko.
text.6361: [22] tadi"ngha mayha.m vacana.m su.naatha, khippa.m ^a^T1.0327^ea^ lahu.m maa  vinassimha sabbe..
text.6363: [21] sabbe ^a^M1.0245^ea^ samaagamma karoma naava.m, do.ni.m  da.lha.m sabbayantuupapanna.m.
text.6364: [22] sace aya.m dakkhi.no saccamaaha, mogha.m pa.tikkosati  uttaroya.m.
text.6365: [22] saa ceva no hehiti aapadatthaa, ima~nca diipa.m na  pariccajema..
text.6367: [21] sace ca kho uttaro saccamaaha, mogha.m pa.tikkosati  dakkhi.noya.m.
text.6368: [22] tameva naava.m abhiruyha sabbe, eva.m maya.m sotthi taremu  paara.m..
text.6370: [21] na ve suga.nha.m pa.thamena se.t.tha.m, kani.t.thamaapaathagata.m gahetvaa.
text.6371: [22] yo ciidha taccha.m {majjha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} paviceyya ga.nhati {ga.nhi (ka0)}, sa ve naro  se.t.thamupeti .thaana.m..
text.6373: [21] yathaapi te saagaravaarimajjhe, sakammunaa sotthi vahi.msu  vaa.nijaa.
text.6374: [22] anaagatattha.m pa.tivijjhiyaana, appampi naacceti sa  bhuuripa~n~no..
text.6376: [21] baalaa ^a^T1.0328^ea^ ca mohena rasaanugiddhaa, anaagata.m  appa.tivijjhiyattha.m.
text.6377: [03] paccuppanne siidanti atthajaate, samuddamajjhe yathaa te manussaa..
text.6379: [21] anaagata.m ^a^V1.0191^ea^ pa.tikayiraatha kicca.m, ``maa ma.m  kicca.m kiccakaale byadhesi''.
text.6380: [22] ta.m taadisa.m pa.tikata {pa.tikata.m (ka0), pa.tigata (sii0 a.t.tha0), pa.tikacca (?)} kiccakaari.m, na ta.m kicca.m kiccakaale  byadhetiiti..
text.6384: [21] kaama.m ^a^M1.0246^ea^ kaamayamaanassa, tassa ce ta.m  samijjhati.
text.6385: [22] addhaa piitimano hoti, laddhaa macco yadicchati..
text.6387: [21] kaama.m kaamayamaanassa, tassa ce ta.m samijjhati.
text.6388: [22] tato na.m apara.m kaame, dhamme ta.nha.mva vindati..
text.6392: [22] bhiyyo ta.nhaa pipaasaa ca, va.d.dhamaanassa va.d.dhati..
text.6394: [21] pathabyaa saaliyavaka.m, gavassa.m {gavaasa.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} daasaporisa.m.
text.6395: [22] datvaa ca {datvaapi (sii0 syaa0), datvaa vaa (pii0)} naalamekassa, iti vidvaa {viddhaa  (syaa0)} sama.m care..
text.6397: [21] raajaa ^a^T1.0329^ea^ pasayha pathavi.m vijitvaa, sasaagaranta.m  mahimaavasanto.
text.6398: [22] ora.m samuddassa atittaruupo {atittiruupo (ka0)}, paara.m samuddassapi patthayetha..
text.6400: [21] yaava anussara.m kaame, manasaa titti naajjhagaa.
text.6401: [22] tato nivattaa pa.tikamma disvaa, te ve sutittaa ye {tittaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  pa~n~naaya tittaa..
text.6403: [21] pa~n~naaya tittina.m {tittiina.m (sii0 syaa0)} se.t.tha.m, na so kaamehi tappati.
text.6404: [22] pa~n~naaya titta.m purisa.m, ta.nhaa na kurute vasa.m..
text.6406: [21] apacinetheva kaamaana.m {kaamaani (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, appicchassa alolupo.
text.6407: [22] samuddamatto puriso, na so kaamehi tappati..
text.6410: [27] ya.m ya.m cajati {jahati (syaa0 ka0)} kaamaana.m, ta.m ta.m sampajjate sukha.m.
text.6411: [22] sabba.m ce sukhamiccheyya, sabbe kaame pariccaje..
text.6413: [21] a.t.tha ^a^M1.0247^ea^ te bhaasitaa gaathaa, sabbaa  honti sahassiyo {sahassiyaa (?) upari sutasomajaatake tathaa dissati}.
text.6416: [21] na me attho sahassehi, satehi nahutehi vaa.
text.6417: [22] pacchima.m bhaasato gaatha.m, kaame me na rato mano..
text.6420: [22] yo ^a^T1.0330^ea^ ima.m ta.nha.m {yo ta.nha.m (sii0 syaa0)} dukkhajanani.m, parijaanaati pa.n.ditoti..
text.6424: [21] dasa khalu imaani {khalumaani (syaa0)} .thaanaani, yaani pubbe akaritvaa.
text.6425: [22] sa pacchaa manutappati, iccevaaha {iccaaha raajaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} janasandho..
text.6430: [21] sakyaruupa.m pure santa.m, mayaa sippa.m na sikkhita.m.
text.6434: [22] ca.n.do ca pharuso caapi {caasi.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, iti pacchaanutappati..
text.6436: [21] paa.naatipaatii pure aasi.m, luddo caapi {caasi.m (sii0 pii0)} anaariyo.
text.6443: [22] na pubbe adada.m {adadi.m (sii0)} daana.m, iti pacchaanutappati..
text.6445: [21] maatara.m pitara~ncaapi, ji.n.naka.m gatayobbana.m {ji.n.nake gatayobbane (sii0  syaa0 pii0)}.
text.6446: [22] pahu ^a^T1.0331^ea^ santo na posissa.m, iti pacchaanutappati..
text.6454: [21] saadhu hoti tapo ci.n.no, santo ca payirupaasito.
text.6455: [22] na ca pubbe tapo ci.n.no, iti pacchaanutappati..
text.6462: [21] ka.nho ^a^V1.0193^ea^ ka.nho ca ghoro ca, sukkadaa.tho  pabhaasavaa {pataapavaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.6463: [22] baddho pa~ncahi rajjuuhi, ki.m ravi {dhiira (sii0 pii0), viira (syaa0)} sunakho tava..
text.6465: [21] naaya.m migaanamatthaaya, usiinaka {usiinara (sii0 pii0), usiinnara (syaa0)} bhavissati.
text.6466: [22] manussaana.m anayo hutvaa, tadaa ka.nho pamokkhati..
text.6471: [21] tapassiniyo {tapaniiyaa (ka0) dutiyantapadaani hetaani} pabbajitaa, mu.n.daa sa"nghaa.tipaarutaa.
text.6472: [22] yadaa loke gamissanti, tadaa ka.nho pamokkhati..
text.6475: [22] i.na.m codaaya {vodaaya (sii0 pii0), codaya (syaa0)} gacchanti, tadaa ka.nho pamokkhati..
text.6477: [21] adhicca vede {veda.m (ka0)} saavitti.m, ya~n~natanta~nca {tantra~nca (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} braahma.naa.
text.6481: [22] pahuu santo {santaa (sii0)} na bharanti, tadaa ka.nho pamokkhati..
text.6484: [22] baalaa tumheti vakkhanti, tadaa ka.nho pamokkhati..
text.6486: [21] aacariyabhariya.m sakhi.m {aacariyabhariya.m sakhaabhariya.m (sii0 pii0)}, maatulaani.m  pitucchaki.m {pitucchaya.m (sii0), pitucchasa.m (pii0)}.
text.6487: [22] yadaa loke gamissanti, tadaa ka.nho pamokkhati..
text.6496: [22] yadaa loke bhavissanti, tadaa ka.nho pamokkhatiiti..
text.6500: [21] neva ^a^V1.0194^ea^ ki.naami napi vikki.naami, na  ^a^T1.0333^ea^ caapi me sannicayo ca atthi {idhatthi (syaa0)}.
text.6501: [22] sukiccharuupa.m vatida.m paritta.m, patthodano naalamaya.m duvinna.m..
text.6504: [22] bahumhaa bahuka.m dajjaa, adaana.m nupapajjati {na upapajjati (sii0 pii0), nuupapajjati (syaa0)}..
text.6506: [21] ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca..
text.6507: [22] ariyamagga.m samaaruuha {ariya.m magga.m samaaruha (sii0 pii0)}, nekaasii labhate sukha.m..
text.6510: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, eko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.6512: [21] ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.6516: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, neko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.6518: [21] ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.6521: [21] sara~nca juhati poso, bahukaaya gayaaya ca.
text.6524: [21] atra cassa huta.m hoti, atra cassa samiihita.m.
text.6525: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, neko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.6527: [21] ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.6530: [21] ba.lisa~nhi so nigilati {niggilati (sii0 pii0)}, diighasutta.m sabandhana.m.
text.6531: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, eko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.6533: [21] ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.6536: [21] u.laarava.n.naa vata braahma.naa ime, aya~nca vo sunakho  kissa hetu.
text.6537: [22] uccaavaca.m va.n.nanibha.m vikubbati, akkhaatha no braahma.naa  ke nu tumhe..
text.6539: [21] cando ca suriyo ca {suuriyo ca (ka0)} ubho idhaagataa, aya.m pana maatali  devasaarathi.
text.6540: [22] sakkohamasmi tidasaanamindo, eso ca kho  pa~ncasikhoti vuccati..
text.6542: [21] paa.nissaraa ^a^V1.0195^ea^ mudi"ngaa ca {muti"ngaa ca (sii0 syaa0 pii0},   murajaalambaraani ca.
text.6545: [21] ye kecime maccharino kadariyaa, paribhaasakaa  sama.nabraahma.naana.m.
text.6546: [22] idheva nikkhippa sariiradeha.m, kaayassa bhedaa niraya.m  vajanti..
text.6548: [21] ye ^a^M1.0251^ea^ kecime suggatimaasamaanaa {suggatimaasasaanaa (sii0 pii0),  suggataasisamaanaa (ka0)}, dhamme ^a^T1.0335^ea^  .thitaa sa.myame sa.mvibhaage.
text.6549: [22] idheva nikkhippa sariiradeha.m, kaayassa bhedaa sugati.m  vajanti..
text.6551: [21] tva.m nosi ~naati purimaasu jaatisu, so maccharii  rosako {kosiyo (syaa0 ka0)} paapadhammo.
text.6552: [22] taveva atthaaya idhaagatamhaa, maa paapadhammo niraya.m  gamittha {appattha (ka0 sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.6554: [21] addhaa hi ma.m vo hitakaamaa, ya.m ma.m samanusaasatha.
text.6555: [22] soha.m tathaa karissaami, sabba.m vutta.m hitesibhi..
text.6557: [21] esaahamajjeva upaaramaami, na caapiha.m {na caapaha.m (sii0 pii0)} ki~nci kareyya  paapa.m.
text.6558: [22] na caapi me ki~nci adeyyamatthi, na caapidatvaa udaka.m  pivaami {udakampaha.m pibe (sii0)}..
text.6560: [21] eva~nca me dadato sabbakaala.m {kaale (ka0)}, bhogaa ime vaasava  khiiyissanti.
text.6561: [22] tato aha.m pabbajissaami sakka, hitvaana kaamaani  yathodhikaaniiti..
text.6565: [21] yesa.m ^a^T1.0336^ea^ na kadaaci bhuutapubba.m, sakhya.m {sakkhi.m (sii0 pii0), sakhi (syaa0)}   sattapadampimasmi loke.
text.6566: [22] jaataa amittaa duve sahaayaa, pa.tisandhaaya caranti kissa  hetu..
text.6568: [21] yadi ^a^M1.0252^ea^ me ajja paataraasakaale, pa~nha.m  na sakku.neyyaatha vattumeta.m.
text.6569: [22] ra.t.thaa pabbaajayissaami vo sabbe, na hi mattho  duppa~n~najaatikehi..
text.6572: [22] vikkhittamanaa anekacittaa, pa~nha.m na sakku.noma vattumeta.m..
text.6574: [21] ekaggacittaava ekamekaa, rahasi gataa attha.m  nicintayitvaa {atthaani cintayitvaa (syaa0 ka0)}.
text.6575: [22] paviveke sammasitvaana dhiiraa, atha vakkhanti janinda  etamattha.m..
text.6578: [22] na sunakhassa te adenti ma.msa.m, atha me.n.dassa su.nena  sakhyamassa..
text.6581: [22] na ca te sunakhassa attharanti, atha ^a^T1.0337^ea^ me.n.dassa su.nena  sakhyamassa..
text.6583: [21] aavellitasi"ngiko ^a^V1.0196^ea^ hi me.n.do, na ca  sunakhassa visaa.nakaani atthi.
text.6584: [22] ti.nabhakkho ma.msabhojano ca, atha me.n.dassa su.nena  sakhyamassa..
text.6586: [21] ti.namaasi palaasamaasi me.n.do, na ca sunakho  ti.namaasi no palaasa.m.
text.6587: [22] ga.nheyya su.no sasa.m bi.laara.m, atha me.n.dassa su.nena  sakhyamassa..
text.6590: [22] chaadiyamaaharatii aya.m imassa, ma.msa.m aaharatii aya.m  amussa..
text.6593: [22] addakkhi {addasa (syaa0 ka0)} kira sakkhika.m janindo, bubhukkassa  ^a^T1.0338^ea^ pu.n.na.m  mukhassa {bhobhukkhassa ca pu.n.namukhassa (sii0)} ceta.m..
text.6595: [21] laabhaa vata me anapparuupaa, yassa medisaa pa.n.ditaa  kulamhi.
text.6596: [22] pa~nhassa gambhiiragata.m nipu.namattha.m, pa.tivijjhanti  subhaasitena dhiiraa..
text.6599: [22] sabbesa.m vo dammi pa.n.ditaana.m, paramappatiitamano  subhaasitenaati..
text.6603: [21] naada.t.thaa {naadi.t.thaa (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka0)} parato dosa.m, a.nu.m thuulaani sabbaso.
text.6606: [21] yo ca appa.tivekkhitvaa, da.n.da.m kubbati khattiyo.
text.6609: [21] ada.n.diya.m da.n.dayati {da.n.diyati (syaa0 pii0)}, da.n.diya~nca  ada.n.diya.m {ada.n.diya (niyya), na da.n.daye (?)}.
text.6610: [22] andhova visama.m magga.m, na jaanaati samaasama.m..
text.6612: [21] yo ca etaani .thaanaani, a.nu.m thuulaani sabbaso.
text.6616: [22] atta.m mahante {mahatte (syaa0 ka0)} .thapetu.m {.thaapetu.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, tasmaa ubhayamaacare..
text.6618: [21] paribhuuto mudu hoti, atitikkho ca veravaa.
text.6621: [21] bahumpi ratto bhaaseyya, du.t.thopi bahu bhaasati.
text.6624: [21] sabbova ^a^V1.0197^ea^ {sabbo ca (ka0 sii0 pii0)} loko ekato  {ekanto (sii0 pii0)}, itthii ca  ayamekikaa.
text.6625: [22] tenaaha.m pa.tipajjissa.m, gacchatha pakkhipatheva {pakkhipetha (syaa0 a.t.tha0)} ta.m..
text.6627: [21] anekataale narake, gambhiire ca suduttare {gambhiire suduruttare (pii0 ka0)}.
text.6628: [22] paatito giriduggasmi.m, kena tva.m tattha naamari..
text.6631: [22] paccaggahi ma.m bhogehi, tenaaha.m tattha naamari.m..
text.6633: [21] ehi ta.m pa.tinessaami, raajaputta saka.m ghara.m.
text.6634: [22] rajja.m kaarehi {kaaresi (sii0)} bhaddante, ki.m ara~n~ne karissasi..
text.6637: [22] uddharitvaa sukhii assa, eva.m {sukha.m (pii0 ka0)} passaami attana.m {attani (pii0 ka0),  attanaa (syaa0), eva.m ahampi puna sotthibhaavappatta.m gilitaba.lisa.m purisamiva attaana.m passaamiiti  (a.t.tha0 sa.mva.n.nanaa)}..
text.6639: [21] ki.m nu tva.m ba.lisa.m bruusi, ki.m tva.m bruusi salohita.m.
text.6640: [22] ki.m nu tva.m ubbhata.m bruusi, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito..
text.6643: [22] cattaaha.m ubbhata.m bruumi, eva.m jaanaahi khattiya..
text.6645: [21] ci~ncaamaa.navikaa ^a^T1.0340^ea^ maataa, devadatto ca me pitaa.
text.6646: [27] aanando pa.n.dito naago, saariputto ca devataa.
text.6647: [22] raajaputto aha.m aasi.m {aha.m tadaa raajaputto (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, eva.m dhaaretha jaatakanti..
text.6651: [21] kaani ^a^M1.0255^ea^ kammaani kubbaana.m, katha.m vi~n~nuu  parakkame.
text.6652: [22] amitta.m jaaneyya medhaavii, disvaa sutvaa ca pa.n.dito..
text.6654: [21] na na.m umhayate disvaa, na ca na.m pa.tinandati.
text.6655: [22] cakkhuuni cassa {cakkhuunissa (syaa0 ka0)} na dadaati, pa.tiloma~nca vattati..
text.6657: [21] amitte tassa bhajati, mitte tassa na sevati.
text.6660: [21] guyha~nca tassa nakkhaati, tassa guyha.m na guuhati.
text.6661: [22] kamma.m tassa na va.n.neti, pa~n~nassa nappasa.msati..
text.6663: [21] abhave ^a^V1.0198^ea^ nandati tassa, bhave tassa na  nandati.
text.6664: [27] acchera.m {acchariya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhojana.m laddhaa, tassa nuppajjate sati.
text.6665: [22] tato na.m naanukampati, aho sopi {ahaasopi (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka0)} labheyyito..
text.6668: [22] yehi amitta.m jaaneyya, disvaa sutvaa ca pa.n.dito..
text.6670: [21] kaani kammaani kubbaana.m, katha.m vi~n~nuu parakkame.
text.6671: [22] mitta.m ^a^T1.0341^ea^ jaaneyya medhaavii, disvaa sutvaa ca pa.n.dito..
text.6676: [21] mitte tasseva bhajati, amitte tassa na sevati.
text.6679: [21] guyha~nca tassa akkhaati, tassa guyha~nca guuhati.
text.6680: [22] kamma~nca tassa va.n.neti, pa~n~na.m tassa {pa~n~namassa (syaa0 ka0)} pasa.msati..
text.6682: [21] bhave ca nandati tassa {bhave nandati tassa ca (ka0)}, abhave tassa na nandati.
text.6683: [27] acchera.m {acchariya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhojana.m laddhaa, tassa uppajjate sati.
text.6684: [22] tato na.m anukampati, aho sopi {pahaasopi (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka0)} labheyyito..
text.6687: [22] yehi mitta~nca jaaneyya {mitta.m sujaaneyya (pii0 ka0)}, disvaa sutvaa ca pa.n.ditoti..
text.6691: [21] lahucitta sasaala kasanti puna, atha kaama  dasakhalu.t.thaanavaro.
text.6692: [22] atha ka.nha sukosiya me.n.davaro, padumo puna mittavarena  dasaati..
text.6696: [21] ahaasi ^a^T1.0342^ea^ ^a^V1.0199^ea^ ^a^M1.0257^ea^ {aahaasi (?)} me ambaphalaani  pubbe, a.nuuni thuulaani ca brahmacaari.
text.6697: [22] teheva mantehi na daani tuyha.m, dumapphalaa paatubhavanti  brahme..
text.6699: [21] nakkhattayoga.m pa.timaanayaami, kha.na.m muhutta~nca mante na  passa.m {kha.na.m muhutta.m na ma.m tosayanti (sii0 pii0)}.
text.6700: [22] nakkhattayoga~nca kha.na~nca laddhaa, addhaaharissambaphala.m  {athaaharissambaphala.m (sii0 pii0)} pahuuta.m..
text.6702: [21] nakkhattayoga.m na pure abhaa.ni, kha.na.m muhutta.m na pure  asa.msi.
text.6703: [22] saya.m harii {athaaharii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ambaphala.m pahuuta.m, va.n.nena gandhena rasenupeta.m..
text.6705: [21] mantaabhijappena pure hi {pura'ssa (sii0 pii0), purepi (syaa0)} tuyha.m,  dumapphalaa paatubhavanti brahme.
text.6706: [22] svaajja na paaresi jappampi manta.m {japampi mante (sii0 pii0)}, aya.m so ko naama  tavajja dhammo..
text.6708: [21] ca.n.daalaputto ^a^T1.0343^ea^ mama sampadaasi, dhammena mante pakati~nca  sa.msi.
text.6709: [22] maa cassu me pucchito naamagotta.m, guyhittho attha.m {maa ta.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}  vijaheyya manto {vijaheyyumantaa (syaa0)}..
text.6711: [21] soha.m ^a^M1.0258^ea^ janindena janamhi pu.t.tho,  makkhaabhibhuuto alika.m abhaa.ni.m.
text.6712: [22] ``mantaa ime braahma.nassaa''ti micchaa, pahiinamanto  kapa.no rudaami..
text.6714: [21] era.n.daa pucimandaa vaa, atha vaa paalibhaddakaa.
text.6715: [22] madhu.m madhutthiko vinde, so hi tassa dumuttamo..
text.6718: [22] yamhaa dhamma.m vijaaneyya, so hi tassa naruttamo..
text.6720: [21] imassa da.n.da~nca vadha~nca datvaa, gale gahetvaa khalayaatha  {balayaatha (syaa0), galayaatha (ka0)} jamma.m.
text.6721: [22] yo uttamattha.m kasirena laddha.m, maanaatimaanena  vinaasayittha..
text.6723: [21] yathaa sama.m ma~n~namaano pateyya, sobbha.m guha.m naraka.m  puutipaada.m.
text.6724: [27] rajjuuti vaa akkame ka.nhasappa.m, andho ^a^T1.0344^ea^ yathaa  jotimadhi.t.thaheyya.
text.6725: [22] evampi ma.m tva.m khalita.m sapa~n~na {sapa~n~naa (pii0)}, pahiinamantassa  punappadaahi {puna sampadaahi (syaa0), punappasiida (sii0 pii0)}..
text.6727: [21] dhammena manta.m {mante (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} tava sampadaasi.m,  tuvampi dhammena {tvampi dhammeneva (ka0)} pariggahesi.
text.6728: [22] pakatimpi te attamano asa.msi.m, dhamme .thita.m ta.m {pati.t.tha.m (ka0)} na  jaheyya manto..
text.6730: [21] yo ^a^V1.0200^ea^ baala manta.m {balamanta.m (ka0)} kasirena laddha.m, ya.m dullabha.m  ajja manussaloke.
text.6731: [22] ki~ncaapi laddhaa jiivitu.m appapa~n~no {kicchaa laddha.m jiivika.m appapa~n~no (sii0 syaa0), kacchaapi  laddhaa jiivika.m appa~n~na (pii0)}, vinaasayii alika.m  bhaasamaano..
text.6733: [21] baalassa ^a^M1.0259^ea^ muu.lhassa akata~n~nuno ca,  musaa bha.nantassa asa~n~natassa.
text.6734: [22] mante maya.m taadisake na dema, kuto mantaa gaccha na  mayha ruccasiiti..
text.6739: [22] pu.t.tho me samma akkhaahi, ki.m daaru.m chetumicchasi..
text.6741: [21] isso {iso (sii0), iiso (syaa0 pii0)} vanaani carasi, samaani visamaani ca.
text.6742: [22] pu.t.tho me samma akkhaahi, ki.m daaru.m nemiyaa da.lha.m..
text.6744: [21] neva saalo na khadiro, naassaka.n.no kuto dhavo.
text.6745: [22] rukkho ca {rukkhova (sii0 pii0)} phandano naama, ta.m daaru.m nemiyaa da.lha.m..
text.6747: [21] kiidisaanissa pattaani, khandho vaa pana kiidiso.
text.6748: [22] pu.t.tho me samma akkhaahi, yathaa jaanemu phandana.m..
text.6750: [21] yassa saakhaa palambanti, namanti na ca bha~njare.
text.6751: [22] so rukkho phandano naama, yassa muule aha.m .thito..
text.6754: [22] sabbassa te kammaniyo, aya.m hessati phandano..
text.6757: [22] mayhampi vacana.m atthi, bhaaradvaaja su.nohi me..
text.6759: [21] issassa {imassa (ka0 sii0 ka0)} upakkhandhamhaa {upakhandhamhaa (ka0  sii0 pii0 ka0)}, ukkacca catura"ngula.m.
text.6760: [22] tena nemi.m pasaaresi {pariharesi (sii0 pii0)}, eva.m da.lhatara.m siyaa..
text.6765: [21] icceva.m ^a^M1.0260^ea^ {icceva (sii0 pii0)} phandano issa.m, isso ca pana  phandana.m.
text.6771: [21] ta.m ^a^V1.0201^ea^ vo vadaami bhadda.m vo {bhaddante (ka0)}, yaavantettha  samaagataa.
text.6772: [22] sammodatha maa vivadatha {maavivadittha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, maa hotha issaphandanaa..
text.6779: [21] idheva ha.msa nipata, piya.m me tava dassana.m.
text.6782: [21] savanena ekassa piyaa bhavanti, disvaa panekassa  viyeti {vineti (syaa0), viheti (pii0), vigeti (ka0 a.t.tha0)} chando.
text.6783: [22] disvaa ca sutvaa ca piyaa bhavanti, kaccinnu me piiyasi  {piyyasi (sii0 pii0)} dassanena..
text.6785: [21] savanena piyo mesi, bhiyyo caagamma dassana.m.
text.6786: [22] eva.m piyadassano me {eva.m piyadassano samaano (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, vasa  ha.msa mamantike {mama santike (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.6789: [22] matto ca ekadaa vajje {vajjaa (sii0 pii0)}, ``ha.msaraaja.m pacantu me''..
text.6791: [21] dhiratthu ^a^T1.0347^ea^ ta.m majjapaana.m, ya.m me piyatara.m tayaa.
text.6792: [22] na caapi majja.m pissaami {pivissaami (syaa0), paayaami (sii0 pii0)}, yaava me vacchasii ghare..
text.6794: [21] suvijaana.m ^a^M1.0261^ea^ si"ngaalaana.m, saku.naana~nca  {sakuntaana~nca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vassita.m.
text.6797: [21] api ce ma~n~natii poso, ~naati mitto sakhaati vaa.
text.6798: [22] yo pubbe sumano hutvaa, pacchaa sampajjate diso..
text.6800: [21] yasmi.m mano nivisati, aviduure sahaapi so.
text.6801: [22] santikepi hi so duure, yasmi.m naavisate {yasmaa vivasate (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} mano..
text.6803: [21] antopi so hoti pasannacitto, paara.m samuddassa  pasannacitto.
text.6804: [22] antopi so hoti padu.t.thacitto, paara.m samuddassa  padu.t.thacitto..
text.6806: [21] sa.mvasantaa vivasanti, ye disaa te rathesabha.
text.6810: [22] aamanta kho ta.m gacchaama {gacchaami (syaa0)}, puraa te homa appiyaa {homi appiyo  (syaa0)}..
text.6813: [27] paricaarakaana.m sata.m {santaana.m (sii0 syaa0), sattaana.m (pii0)}, vacana.m na karosi no.
text.6814: [22] eva.m ta.m abhiyaacaama, puna kayiraasi pariyaaya.m..
text.6816: [21] eva.m ce no viharata.m, antaraayo na hessati.
text.6817: [27] tuyha~ncaapi ^a^T1.0348^ea^ {vaapi (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} mahaaraaja, mayha~nca {vaa (bahuusu)} ra.t.thava.d.dhana.
text.6818: [22] appeva naama passemu {passema (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, ahorataanamaccayeti..
text.6822: [21] na te ka.t.thaani bhinnaani, na te udakamaabhata.m.
text.6823: [22] aggiipi te na haapito {haasito (sii0 syaa0)}, ki.m nu mandova jhaayasi..
text.6825: [21] na ^a^M1.0262^ea^ ussahe vane vatthu.m,  kassapaamantayaami ta.m.
text.6826: [22] dukkho vaaso ara~n~nasmi.m, ra.t.tha.m icchaami gantave..
text.6828: [21] yathaa aha.m ito gantvaa, yasmi.m janapade vasa.m.
text.6829: [22] aacaara.m brahme {brahma.m (ka0)} sikkheyya.m, ta.m dhamma.m anusaasa ma.m..
text.6832: [22] ra.t.the rocayase vaasa.m, ta.m dhamma.m nisaamehi me..
text.6834: [21] visa.m maa pa.tisevittho {pa.tisevittha (syaa0 ka0)}, papaata.m parivajjaya.
text.6835: [22] pa"nke ca maa visiidittho {pa"nko ca maa visiyittho (ka0)}, yatto caasiivise care..
text.6837: [21] ki.m nu visa.m papaato vaa, pa"nko vaa brahmacaarina.m.
text.6838: [22] ka.m tva.m aasiivisa.m bruusi, ta.m me akkhaahi pucchito.
text.6840: [21] aasavo taata lokasmi.m, suraa naama pavuccati.
text.6841: [27] manu~n~no {manu~n~naa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} surabhii vaggu, saadu {madhu (sii0 syaa0)}  khuddarasuupamo {rasuupamaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.6842: [22] visa.m tadaahu ariyaa se, brahmacariyassa naarada..
text.6844: [21] itthiyo ^a^T1.0349^ea^ taata lokasmi.m, pamatta.m pamathenti taa.
text.6845: [27] haranti yuvino citta.m, tuula.m bha.t.tha.mva maaluto.
text.6848: [21] laabho siloko sakkaaro, puujaa parakulesu ca.
text.6849: [22] pa"nko eso ca {esova (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} akkhaato, brahmacariyassa naarada..
text.6851: [21] sasatthaa ^a^V1.0203^ea^ {mahantaa (syaa0 ka0)} taata raajaano, aavasanti mahi.m  ima.m.
text.6852: [22] te taadise manussinde, mahante taata naarada..
text.6854: [21] issaraana.m adhipatiina.m, na tesa.m paadato care.
text.6855: [22] aasiivisoti {aasiiviso so (sii0 pii0)} akkhaato, brahmacariyassa naarada..
text.6857: [21] bhattattho bhattakaale ca {ya.m (sii0 pii0)}, ya.m gehamupasa"nkame.
text.6858: [22] yadettha kusala.m ja~n~naa, tattha ghaasesana.m care..
text.6860: [21] pavisitvaa ^a^M1.0263^ea^ parakula.m, paanattha.m {paanattho (syaa0 pii0)}  bhojanaaya vaa.
text.6861: [22] mita.m khaade mita.m bhu~nje, na ca ruupe mana.m kare..
text.6863: [21] go.t.tha.m majja.m kiraa.ta~nca {kiraasa~nca (sii0 syaa0), kiraasa.m vaa (pii0)},   sabhaa nikira.naani ca.
text.6868: [21] duute ^a^T1.0350^ea^ te brahme {duute braahma.na (ka0)} paahesi.m, ga"ngaatiirasmi jhaayato.
text.6869: [22] tesa.m pu.t.tho na byaakaasi, dukkha.m guyhamata.m {guyha.m mata.m (sii0), tuyha.m mata.m (syaa0 ka0)} nu te..
text.6872: [22] maa kho na.m tassa akkhaahi, yo ta.m dukkhaa na mocaye..
text.6874: [21] yo tassa {yo ca tathaa (pii0)} dukkhajaatassa,  eka"ngamapi bhaagaso {ekantamapi bhaasato (sii0 pii0)}.
text.6880: [21] api ce ma~n~natii poso, ~naati mitto sakhaati vaa.
text.6881: [22] yo pubbe sumano hutvaa, pacchaa sampajjate diso..
text.6883: [21] yo attano dukkhamanaanupu.t.tho, pavedaye jantu akaalaruupe.
text.6884: [22] aanandino tassa bhavantimittaa {bhavanta'mittaa (sii0 pii0)}, hitesino tassa dukhii  bhavanti..
text.6887: [22] akkheyya tibbaani {tippaani (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} parassa dhiiro, sa.nha.m gira.m atthavati.m  pamu~nce..
text.6889: [21] sace ^a^T1.0351^ea^ ^a^M1.0264^ea^ ca ja~n~naa avisayhamattano, na  te hi mayha.m {naaya.m niiti mayha (sii0 pii0)} sukhaagamaaya.
text.6890: [22] ekova tibbaani saheyya dhiiro, sacca.m  hirottappamapekkhamaano..
text.6897: [22] te me na.t.thaa mahaaraaja, tasmaa socaamaha.m bhusa.m..
text.6900: [22] naala.m dukkhaa pamocetu.m, tasmaa tesa.m na byaahari.m..
text.6903: [22] ala.m dukkhaa pamocetu.m, tasmaa tuyha.m pavedayi.m..
text.6910: [21] raajaa ^a^T1.0352^ea^ kaali"ngo cakkavatti, dhammena pathavimanusaasa.m {manusaasi (syaa0  ka0)}.
text.6913: [21] kaali"ngo bhaaradvaajo ca, raajaana.m kaali"nga.m sama.nakola~n~na.m.
text.6916: [21] paccoroha mahaaraaja, bhuumibhaago yathaa sama.nuggato {samanugiito (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}.
text.6920: [22] pathaviyaa naabhiya.m {puthuviyaa aya.m (sii0), pa.thaviyaa aya.m (syaa0), puthaviyaa'ya.m (pii0)} ma.n.do,  iti no suta.m mante mahaaraaja {suta.m mahaaraaja (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.6923: [22] pathaviyaa aya.m ma.n.do, orohitvaa namo karohi..
text.6925: [21] ye te bhavanti naagaa ca, abhijaataa ca ku~njaraa.
text.6926: [22] ettaavataa padesa.m te, naagaa neva mupayanti..
text.6928: [21] abhijaato naago {abhijaato te naago (sii0 pii0 a.t.tha0)} kaama.m,  pesehi ku~njara.m danti.m.
text.6929: [22] ettaavataa padeso {padeso ca (syaa0 ka0)}, sakkaa {na sakkaa (syaa0)} naagena mupagantu.m..
text.6931: [21] ta.m sutvaa raajaa kaali"ngo, veyya~njanikavaco nisaametvaa.
text.6932: [22] sampesesi naaga.m ~nassaama, maya.m yathimassida.m {yathaa ida.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vacana.m..
text.6934: [21] sampesito ^a^V1.0205^ea^ ca ra~n~naa, naago ko~ncova  abhinaditvaana.
text.6939: [22] a~n~na.m sa"nkama naaga.m, naago khii.naayuko mahaaraaja..
text.6941: [21] ta.m sutvaa kaali"ngo, taramaano sa"nkamii naaga.m.
text.6942: [27] sa"nkanteva ra~n~ne, naago tattheva pati {patito (ka0)} bhumyaa.
text.6948: [21] ta.m anadhivaasento kaali"nga.m {kaali"ngo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, braahma.no idamavoca.
text.6949: [22] veyya~njanikaa hi maya.m, buddhaa sabba~n~nuno mahaaraaja..
text.6951: [21] sabba~n~nuu sabbaviduu ca, buddhaa na lakkha.nena jaananti.
text.6952: [22] aagamabalasaa {aagamapurisaa (pii0)} hi maya.m, buddhaa sabba.m pajaananti..
text.6954: [21] mahayitvaa ^a^M1.0266^ea^ sambodhi.m {mahaayitvaana sambodhi.m (sii0 pii0),  paha.msitvaana sambodhi.m (syaa0), mamaayitvaana ta.m bodhi.m (ka0)}, naanaaturiyehi  vajjamaanehi.
text.6955: [22] maalaavilepana.m abhiharitvaa {maalaagandhavilepana.m aaharitvaa (sii0  pii0); paakaaraparikkhepa.m kaaresi. atha raajaa paayaasi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} atha  raajaa manupaayaasi {paakaaraparikkhepa.m kaaresi. atha raajaa paayaasi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..

text.7319: [21] vande ^a^M1.0280^ea^ te ayirabrahme {ayyire brahme (ka0)}, yo me icchita.m  pati.m varaakiyaa.

text.7331: [22] pajaa mama.m khaaditu.m patthayanti, luddaa cilaacaa {milaacaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhava me  sukhaaya..
text.7333: [21] mitta.m sahaaya~nca karonti pa.n.ditaa, kaale akaale  sukhamesamaanaa {maasayaanaa (pii0)}.
text.7334: [22] karomi te senaka etamattha.m, ariyo ^a^T1.0372^ea^ hi ariyassa  karoti kicca.m..

text.7339: [21] taveva ^a^M1.0281^ea^ {tameva (syaa0 ka0)} rakkhaavara.na.m karonto,  sariirabhedaapi na santasaami.
text.7340: [22] karonti heke {hete (ka0 sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sakhiina.m sakhaaro, paa.na.m cajantaa {cajanti  (sii0 pii0)} satamesa {sataanesa (pii0)} dhammo..
text.7345: [21] cutaapi heke {eke (sii0 pii0)} khalitaa sakammunaa, mittaanukampaaya  pati.t.thahanti.
text.7346: [22] puttaa mama.t.taa gatimaagatosmi, attha.m caretho {caretha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} mama  vaaricara {vaarichanna (sii0 pii0)}..

text.7351: [21] appossukko taata tuva.m nisiida, putto ^a^T1.0373^ea^ pitu carati  atthacariya.m.
text.7352: [22] aha.m carissaami tavetamattha.m, senassa putte paritaayamaano..
text.7354: [21] addhaa ^a^V1.0216^ea^ hi taata satamesa dhammo, putto pitu  ya.m care {pituna.m care (ka0), pitu ya~ncaretha (sii0 pii0)} atthacariya.m.

text.7363: [21] mitta~nca kayiraatha suhadaya~nca {suhaddaya~nca (sii0), sakhaaghara~nca (pii0)},   ayira~nca kayiraatha sukhaagamaaya.
text.7364: [22] nivatthakocova {kojova (sii0 pii0)} sarebhihantvaa, modaama puttehi  sama"ngibhuutaa..
text.7369: [21] mitta.m sahaaya.m adhigamma pa.n.dito, so bhu~njatii putta pasu.m  dhana.m vaa.

text.7373: [22] so mittavaa yasavaa uggatatto, asmi.mdhaloke {asmi~nca loke (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} modati  kaamakaamii..
text.7378: [21] suurena balavantena, yo mitte {mette (sii0), mitta.m (syaa0)} kurute dijo.
text.7379: [22] eva.m so sukhito hoti, yathaaha.m tva~nca senakaati..
text.7383: [21] kharaajinaa ^a^M1.0283^ea^ ja.tilaa pa"nkadantaa,  dummakkharuupaa {dummudharuupaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ye manta.m jappanti {yeme japanti (sii0 pii0), ye'me  jappanti mante (jaa0 1.6.10)}.
text.7384: [22] kaccinnu te maanusake payoge, ida.m viduu parimuttaa apaayaa..
text.7386: [21] paapaani ^a^T1.0375^ea^ kammaani karetha {kareyya (syaa0), katvaana  (jaa0 1.6.11)}  raaja, bahussuto ce na careyya dhamma.m.
text.7387: [22] sahassavedopi na ta.m pa.ticca, dukkhaa pamucce {pamu~nce (syaa0)} cara.na.m  apatvaa..
text.7389: [21] sahassavedopi na ta.m pa.ticca, dukkhaa pamucce cara.na.m  apatvaa.
text.7390: [22] ma~n~naami vedaa aphalaa bhavanti, sasa.myama.m cara.na~n~neva  sacca.m..
text.7392: [21] na heva vedaa aphalaa bhavanti, sasa.myama.m cara.na~n~neva sacca.m.
text.7393: [22] kitti~nhi {kitti~nca (syaa0)} pappoti adhicca vede, santi.m pu.naati {punoti (sii0 a.t.tha0),  pu.neti (syaa0 jaa0 1.6.13), puneti (pii0)} cara.nena danto..
text.7395: [21] bhaccaa ^a^V1.0217^ea^ maataa pitaa bandhuu, yena jaato  sayeva so.
text.7398: [21] katha.m bho braahma.no hoti, katha.m bhavati kevalii.
text.7401: [21] nira.mkatvaa ^a^M1.0284^ea^ aggimaadaaya braahma.no,  aapo si~nca.m yaja.m usseti yuupa.m.
text.7402: [22] eva.mkaro braahma.no hoti khemii, dhamme .thita.m tena  amaapayi.msu..

text.7407: [21] katha.m so {bho (syaa0 ka0)} braahma.no hoti, katha.m bhavati kevalii.
text.7411: [22] eva.mkaro braahma.no hoti khemii, dhamme .thita.m tena  amaapayi.msu..
text.7415: [22] sabbesa.m siitibhuutaana.m, atthi seyyotha {seyyova (sii0 pii0)} paapiyo..

text.7431: [22] te sajaati.m pamu~ncanti {na tesa.m jaati.m pucchanti (sii0 syaa0 pii0), na tesa.m jaati sujjhati  (ka0)}, dhammama~n~naaya subbataati..
text.7435: [21] assa.m ^a^V1.0218^ea^ gava.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m, bhariya~nca so  idha labhata.m manaapa.m.
text.7436: [22] puttehi daarehi sama"ngi hotu, bhisaani te braahma.na yo  ahaasi..
text.7438: [21] maala~nca so kaasikacandana~nca, dhaaretu puttassa bahuu  bhavantu.
text.7439: [22] kaamesu tibba.m kuruta.m apekkha.m, bhisaani te braahma.na yo  ahaasi..
text.7441: [21] pahuutadha~n~no kasimaa yasassii, putte gihii dhanimaa  sabbakaame.
text.7442: [22] vaya.m apassa.m gharamaavasaatu, bhisaani te braahma.na yo  ahaasi..
text.7444: [21] so khattiyo hotu pasayhakaarii, raajaabhiraajaa {raajaadhiraajaa (syaa0 ka0)} balavaa  yasassii.
text.7445: [22] sa ^a^T1.0378^ea^ caaturanta.m mahimaavasaatu, bhisaani te braahma.na yo  ahaasi..
text.7447: [21] so braahma.no hotu aviitaraago, muhuttanakkhattapathesu yutto.
text.7448: [22] puujetu na.m ra.t.thapatii yasassii, bhisaani te braahma.na yo  ahaasi..
text.7450: [21] ajjhaayaka.m ^a^M1.0286^ea^ sabbasamantaveda.m {sabbasamattaveda.m (sii0),  sabbasamattavedana.m (pii0)}, tapassiina.m  ma~n~natu sabbaloko.

text.7454: [22] aviitaraago mara.na.m upetu, bhisaani te braahma.na yo  ahaasi..
text.7456: [21] so gaama.nii hotu sahaayamajjhe, naccehi giitehi  pamodamaano.
text.7457: [22] so raajato byasana maalattha {maa raajato vyasana'malattha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ki~nci, bhisaani te  braahma.na yo ahaasi..
text.7459: [21] ya.m ekaraajaa pathavi.m vijetvaa, itthiisahassaana {itthiisahassassa (sii0  pii0)} .thapetu agga.m.
text.7460: [22] siimantiniina.m ^a^T1.0379^ea^ pavaraa bhavaatu, bhisaani te braahma.na yaa  ahaasi..
text.7462: [21] isiina~nhi saa sabbasamaagataana.m, bhu~njeyya saadu.m  avikampamaanaa.

text.7468: [21] so ^a^M1.0287^ea^ bajjhatuu paasasatehi chabbhi {chamhi (sii0 pii0), chassu  (?)}, rammaa vanaa niyyatu raajadhaani.m {raaja.thaani.m (ka0)}.
text.7469: [22] tuttehi so ha~n~natu paacanehi, bhisaani te braahma.na yo  ahaasi..

text.7474: [21] yo ve ana.t.tha.mva {ana.t.tha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} na.t.thanti caaha, kaameva  ^a^T1.0380^ea^ so labhata.m bhu~njata~nca {labhatu bhu~njatu ca (syaa0)}.
text.7475: [22] agaaramajjhe mara.na.m upetu, yo vaa bhonto sa"nkati  ka~ncideva {ki~ncideva (ka0)}..
text.7477: [21] yadesamaanaa ^a^V1.0219^ea^ vicaranti loke, i.t.tha~nca  kanta~nca bahuunameta.m.
text.7478: [22] piya.m manu~n~na.m cidha jiivaloke, kasmaa isayo  nappasa.msanti kaame..
text.7480: [21] kaamesu ve ha~n~nare bajjhare ca, kaamesu dukkha~nca bhaya~nca  jaata.m.

text.7489: [21] na ^a^M1.0288^ea^ te na.taa no pana kii.laneyyaa, na  ^a^T1.0381^ea^ bandhavaa no pana te sahaayaa.
text.7490: [22] kismi.m vupatthambha sahassanetta, isiihi tva.m kii.lasi  devaraaja..
text.7492: [21] aacariyo mesi pitaa ca mayha.m, esaa pati.t.thaa  khalitassa brahme.
text.7493: [22] ekaaparaadha.m khama bhuuripa~n~na, na pa.n.ditaa kodhabalaa  bhavanti..
text.7495: [21] suvaasita.m isina.m ekaratta.m, ya.m vaasava.m bhuutapatiddasaama.
text.7496: [22] sabbeva bhonto sumanaa bhavantu, ya.m braahma.no paccupaadii  bhisaani..
text.7498: [21] aha~nca saariputto ca, moggallaano ca kassapo.
text.7499: [22] anuruddho pu.n.no aanando, tadaasu.m satta bhaataro..
text.7501: [21] bhaginii uppalava.n.naa ca, daasii khujjuttaraa tadaa.
text.7502: [22] citto gahapati daaso, yakkho saataagiro tadaa..
text.7504: [21] paalileyyo {paarileyyo (sii0 pii0)} tadaa naago, madhudo {madhuvaa  (sii0 pii0)} se.t.thavaanaro.
text.7505: [22] kaa.ludaayii tadaa sakko, eva.m dhaaretha jaatakanti..
text.7509: [21] mahesii ^a^T1.0382^ea^ surucino {rucino (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhariyaa, aaniitaa pa.thama.m aha.m.

text.7517: [22] musaa me bha.namaanaaya, muddhaa phalatu sattadhaa..

text.7541: [22] musaa me bha.namaanaaya, muddhaa phalatu sattadhaa..
text.7543: [21] sama.ne braahma.ne caapi, a~n~ne caapi vanibbake.
text.7547: [22] musaa me bha.namaanaaya, muddhaa phalatu sattadhaa..
text.7549: [21] caatuddasi.m pa~ncaddasi.m {pannarasi.m (sii0 pii0)}, yaa ca pakkhassa a.t.thamii  {a.t.thami.m (sii0 pii0)}.
text.7550: [27] paa.tihaariyapakkha~nca, a.t.tha"ngasusamaagata.m {a.t.tha"ngasusamaahita.m (sabbattha) vi0  va0 129 paa.liyaa a.t.thakathaa passitabbaa}.
text.7554: [22] musaa me bha.namaanaaya, muddhaa phalatu sattadhaa..
text.7557: [22] sa.mvijjanti tayi bhadde, ye tva.m kittesi attani..

text.7563: [22] manu~n~na.m bhaasase vaaca.m, ya.m mayha.m hadaya"ngama.m..

text.7571: [21] itthiyo {itthiyaa (pii0)} jiivalokasmi.m, yaa hoti {honti (sii0  syaa0)} samacaarinii {samacaari.nii (sii0)}.
text.7577: [21] tva~nca bhadde suci.n.nena, pubbe sucaritena ca.
