text.7584: [22] esaaha.m tidiva.m yaami, piya.m me tava dassananti..
text.7588: [21] appossukko ^a^M1.0291^ea^ daani tuva.m kapota,  viha"ngama na tava bhojanattho.
text.7589: [22] khuda.m {khudda.m (syaa0 ka0), khudha.m (sakkata-paakataanuruupa.m)} pipaasa.m  adhivaasayanto, kasmaa bhava.mposathiko kapota {kapoto (sii0 pii0)}..
text.7591: [21] aha.m pure giddhigato kapotiyaa, asmi.m padesasmimubho  ramaama.
text.7592: [22] athaggahii saaku.niko kapoti.m, akaamako taaya vinaa  ahosi.m..
text.7594: [21] naanaabhavaa vippayogena tassaa, manomaya.m vedana vedayaami {vedana.m vediyaami  (sii0 pii0)}.
text.7595: [22] tasmaa aha.mposatha.m paalayaami, raago mama.m maa  punaraagamaasi..
text.7597: [21] anujjugaamii uragaa dujivha {uraga dvijivha (sii0)}, daa.thaavudho ghoravisosi  sappa.
text.7598: [22] khuda.m pipaasa.m adhivaasayanto, kasmaa ^a^T1.0385^ea^ bhava.mposathiko nu  diigha {diigho (sii0 pii0)}..
text.7600: [21] usabho ahuu balavaa gaamikassa, calakkakuu va.n.nabaluupapanno.
text.7601: [22] so ma.m akkami ta.m kupito a.da.msi, dukkhaabhitu.n.no  mara.na.m upaagaa {upaagami (sii0 pii0)}..
text.7603: [21] tato ^a^V1.0222^ea^ janaa nikkhamitvaana gaamaa,  kanditvaa roditvaa {kanditva roditva (sii0)} apakkami.msu.
text.7604: [22] tasmaa aha.mposatha.m paalayaami, kodho ^a^T1.0386^ea^ mama.m maa  punaraagamaasi..
text.7606: [21] mataana ^a^M1.0292^ea^ ma.msaani bahuu susaane,  manu~n~naruupa.m tava bhojane ta.m.
text.7607: [22] khuda.m pipaasa.m adhivaasayanto, kasmaa bhava.mposathiko  si"ngaala {sigaalo (sii0 pii0)}..
text.7609: [21] pavisi {pavissa.m (sii0 pii0), pavissa (syaa0)} kucchi.m  mahato gajassa, ku.nape rato hatthima.msesu giddho {hatthima.mse pagiddho (sii0 pii0)}.
text.7610: [22] u.nho ca vaato tikhi.naa ca rasmiyo, te sosayu.m  tassa kariisamagga.m..
text.7612: [21] kiso ca pa.n.duu ca aha.m bhadante, na me ahuu  nikkhamanaaya maggo.
text.7613: [22] mahaa ca megho sahasaa pavassi, so temayii tassa  kariisamagga.m..
text.7615: [21] tato aha.m nikkhamisa.m bhadante, cando yathaa raahumukhaa  pamutto.
text.7616: [22] tasmaa aha.mposatha.m paalayaami, lobho mama.m maa  punaraagamaasi..
text.7618: [21] vammiikathuupasmi.m kipillikaani, nippothayanto tuva.m pure  caraasi.
text.7619: [22] khuda.m pipaasa.m adhivaasayanto, kasmaa ^a^T1.0387^ea^ bhava.mposathiko nu  accha {accho (sii0 pii0)}..
text.7621: [21] saka.m niketa.m atihii.layaano {atihe.layaano (syaa0 ka0)}, atricchataa  {atricchataaya (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} mallagaama.m {malata.m (sii0 pii0), mallayata.m (ka0)} agacchi.m.
text.7622: [22] tato janaa nikkhamitvaana gaamaa, koda.n.dakena  paripothayi.msu ma.m..
text.7624: [21] so ^a^M1.0293^ea^ bhinnasiiso ruhiramakkhita"ngo,  paccaagamaasi.m saka.m {sa saka.m (syaa0 ka0),'tha saka.m (?)} niketa.m.
text.7625: [22] tasmaa aha.mposatha.m paalayaami, atricchataa maa  punaraagamaasi..
text.7627: [21] ya.m no apucchittha tuva.m bhadante, sabbeva byaakarimha yathaa  pajaana.m.
text.7628: [22] mayampi pucchaama tuva.m bhadante, kasmaa bhava.mposathiko nu  brahme..
text.7630: [21] anuupalitto mama assamamhi, paccekabuddho muhutta.m  nisiidi.
text.7631: [22] so ma.m avedii gatimaagati~nca, naama~nca gotta.m cara.na~nca  sabba.m..
text.7633: [21] evampaha.m vandi na {evampaha.m naggahe (sii0 pii0)} tassa  paade, na caapi na.m maanagatena pucchi.m.
text.7634: [22] tasmaa aha.mposatha.m paalayaami, maano ^a^T1.0388^ea^ mama.m maa  punaraagamaasiiti..
text.7638: [21] sace hi tyaaha.m dhanahetu gaahito, maa ma.m vadhii jiivagaaha.m  gahetvaa.
text.7639: [22] ra~n~no ca {ra~n~nova (sii0 pii0)} ma.m samma upantika.m {upanti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} nehi,  ma~n~ne dhana.m lacchasinapparuupa.m..
text.7641: [21] na me aya.m tuyha vadhaaya ajja, samaahito caapadhure  {caapavare (sii0 pii0), caapavaro (syaa0)} khurappo.
text.7642: [22] paasa~nca tyaaha.m adhipaatayissa.m, yathaasukha.m gacchatu moraraajaa..
text.7644: [21] ya.m ^a^V1.0223^ea^ ^a^M1.0294^ea^ satta vassaani  mamaanubandhi, rattindiva.m khuppipaasa.m sahanto.
text.7645: [22] atha kissa ma.m paasavasuupaniita.m, pamuttave ^a^T1.0389^ea^ icchasi  bandhanasmaa..
text.7647: [21] paa.naatipaataa virato nusajja, abhaya.m nu te sabbabhuutesu  dinna.m.
text.7648: [22] ya.m ma.m tuva.m paasavasuupaniita.m, pamuttave icchasi bandhanasmaa..
text.7650: [21] paa.naatipaataa viratassa bruuhi, abhaya~nca yo sabbabhuutesu  deti.
text.7651: [22] pucchaami ta.m moraraajetamattha.m, ito cuto ki.m labhate  sukha.m so..
text.7653: [21] paa.naatipaataa viratassa bruumi, abhaya~nca yo sabbabhuutesu  deti.
text.7654: [22] di.t.theva dhamme labhate pasa.msa.m, sagga~nca so yaati  sariirabhedaa..
text.7656: [21] na santi devaa iti aahu {iccaahu (sii0 pii0)} eke, idheva jiivo vibhava.m  upeti.
text.7657: [27] tathaa phala.m sukatadukka.taana.m, dattupa~n~natta~nca vadanti daana.m.
text.7658: [22] tesa.m vaco arahata.m saddahaano, tasmaa aha.m saku.ne  baadhayaami..
text.7660: [21] cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassanaa, gacchanti  obhaasayamantalikkhe.
text.7661: [22] imassa lokassa parassa vaa te, katha.m nu te aahu  manussaloke..
text.7663: [21] cando ^a^M1.0295^ea^ ca suriyo ca ubho  sudassanaa, gacchanti ^a^T1.0390^ea^ obhaasayamantalikkhe.
text.7664: [22] parassa lokassa na te imassa, devaati te aahu  manussaloke..
text.7666: [21] ettheva te niihataa hiinavaadaa, ahetukaa ye na vadanti  kamma.m.
text.7667: [22] tathaa phala.m sukatadukka.taana.m, dattupa~n~natta.m ye ca vadanti  daana.m..
text.7669: [21] addhaa hi sacca.m vacana.m taveda.m {taveta.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, katha~nhi daana.m aphala.m  bhaveyya {vadeyya (sii0 pii0)}.
text.7670: [22] tathaa phala.m sukatadukka.taana.m, dattupa~n~natta~nca katha.m bhaveyya..
text.7672: [21] katha.mkaro kintikaro kimaacara.m, ki.m sevamaano kena  tapogu.nena.
text.7673: [22] akkhaahi {akkhaahi ta.m daani (ka0)} me moraraajetamattha.m, yathaa aha.m no niraya.m  pateyya.m..
text.7675: [21] ye keci atthi sama.naa pathabyaa, kaasaayavatthaa  anagaariyaa te.
text.7676: [22] paatova pi.n.daaya caranti kaale, vikaalacariyaa virataa  hi santo..
text.7678: [21] te tattha kaalenupasa"nkamitvaa, pucchaahi ^a^T1.0391^ea^ ya.m te manaso  piya.m siyaa.
text.7679: [22] te te pavakkhanti yathaapajaana.m, imassa lokassa parassa  cattha.m..
text.7681: [21] taca.mva ji.n.na.m urago puraa.na.m, pa.n.duupalaasa.m harito dumova.
text.7684: [21] ye ^a^M1.0296^ea^ caapi me saku.naa atthi baddhaa,  sataaninekaani nivesanasmi.m.
text.7685: [22] tesampaha.m {tesa.m aha.m (syaa0 ka0)} jiivitamajja dammi, mokkha~nca te pattaa {patto (sii0),  accha (syaa0)} saka.m niketa.m..
text.7687: [21] luddo ^a^V1.0224^ea^ carii paasahattho ara~n~ne, baadhetu  moraadhipati.m yasassi.m.
text.7688: [22] bandhitvaa {bandhitva (sii0 pii0)} moraadhipati.m yasassi.m, dukkhaa sa pamucci {dukkhaa pamucci  (sii0), dukkhaa pamu~nci (syaa0 pii0)} yathaaha.m pamuttoti..
text.7693: [22] anvesa.m ^a^T1.0392^ea^ vicari.m {vipule (syaa0 ka0)} ~naatii, teme adhigataa mayaa..
text.7696: [22] rammaa cimaa giriinajjo {girinadiyo (sii0 pii0)}, phaasuvaaso bhavissati..
text.7701: [21] a~n~nampi {a~n~na.m hi (sii0 pii0)} le.na.m pariyesa, sattu no idha vijjati.
text.7702: [22] so taccha suukare hanti, idhaagantvaa vara.m vara.m..
text.7704: [21] ko numhaaka.m {ko namhaaka.m (sii0 pii0)} idha sattu, ko ~naatii susamaagate.
text.7705: [22] duppadha.mse {appadha.mse (sii0 pii0)} padha.mseti, ta.m me akkhaatha pucchitaa..
text.7708: [22] so taccha suukare hanti, idhaagantvaa vara.m vara.m..
text.7710: [21] na no daa.thaa na vijjanti {nu vijjanti (ka0)}, bala.m kaaye samohita.m.
text.7711: [22] sabbe samaggaa hutvaana, vasa.m kaahaama ekaka.m..
text.7714: [22] yopi yuddhe palaayeyya, tampi pacchaa hanaamase..
text.7716: [21] paa.naatipaataa virato nu ajja, abhaya.m nu te sabbabhuutesu  dinna.m.
text.7717: [22] daa.thaa nu te migavadhaaya {miga viriya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} na santi, yo sa"nghapatto  kapa.nova jhaayasi..
text.7719: [21] na ^a^T1.0393^ea^ me daa.thaa na vijjanti, bala.m kaaye samohita.m.
text.7720: [22] ~naatii ca disvaana saamaggii ekato, tasmaa ca jhaayaami  vanamhi ekako..
text.7722: [21] imassuda.m yanti disodisa.m pure, bhaya.t.titaa le.nagavesino  puthu.
text.7723: [22] te daani sa"ngamma vasanti ekato, yattha.t.thitaa duppasahajja  te mayaa..
text.7726: [22] te ma.m samaggaa hi.mseyyu.m, tasmaa nesa.m na patthaye {apatthave (pii0)}..
text.7728: [21] ekova ^a^V1.0225^ea^ indo asure jinaati, ekova  seno hanti dije pasayha.
text.7729: [22] ekova byaggho migasa"nghapatto, vara.m vara.m hanti bala~nhi  taadisa.m..
text.7731: [21] na heva indo na seno, napi byaggho migaadhipo.
text.7732: [22] samagge sahite ~naatii, na byagghe {byagghe ca (sii0 pii0), byaggho na (syaa0)} kurute vase..
text.7738: [22] ta~nca seno nitaa.leti, veyyagghiyeva saa gati..
text.7741: [22] daa.thii daa.thiisu pakkhandi, ma~n~namaano yathaa pure..
text.7760: [21] te ca tattha nisiiditvaa, tassa rukkhassa chaayayaa {chaadiyaa (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}.
text.7763: [21] allaayate {addaayate (sii0 pii0)} aya.m rukkho, api vaariiva {vaari ca  (sii0 pii0)} sandati.
text.7764: [22] i"nghassa purima.m saakha.m, maya.m chindaama vaa.nijaa..
text.7766: [21] saa ca chinnaava pagghari, accha.m vaari.m anaavila.m.
text.7767: [22] te ^a^T1.0395^ea^ tattha nhatvaa pivitvaa, yaavaticchi.msu vaa.nijaa..
text.7770: [22] i"nghassa dakkhi.na.m saakha.m, maya.m chindaama vaa.nijaa..
text.7772: [21] saa ca chinnaava pagghari, saalima.msodana.m bahu.m.
text.7773: [22] appodava.n.ne kummaase, si"ngi.m vidalasuupiyo {si"ngi.m bidalasuupiyo (sii0 pii0), si"ngiivera.m  lasuupiyo (ka0) si"ngiinti si"ngiiveraadika.m uttaribha"nga.m. vidalasuupiyoti muggasuupaadayo (a.t.tha0)  vidala.m kalaayaadimhi vattatiiti sakkataabhidhaane}..
text.7775: [21] te ^a^M1.0299^ea^ tattha bhutvaa khaaditvaa {bhutvaa ca pivitvaa ca (pii0)},  yaavaticchi.msu vaa.nijaa.
text.7777: [22] i"nghassa pacchima.m saakha.m, maya.m chindaama vaa.nijaa..
text.7779: [21] saa ca chinnaava pagghari, naariyo samala"nkataa.
text.7782: [21] api su vaa.nijaa ekaa, naariyo pa.n.naviisati.
text.7783: [22] samantaa parivaari.msu {parikari.msu (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, tassa rukkhassa chaayayaa {chaadiyaa  (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.7785: [21] te taahi paricaaretvaa {parivaaretvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, yaavaticchi.msu vaa.nijaa.
text.7787: [22] i"nghassa uttara.m saakha.m, maya.m chindaama vaa.nijaa..
text.7789: [21] saa ca chinnaava pagghari, muttaa ve.luriyaa bahuu.

text.7793: [22] te tattha bhaare bandhitvaa, yaavaticchi.msu vaa.nijaa..
text.7796: [22] i"nghassa ^a^T1.0396^ea^ muule {muula.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} chindaama, api bhiyyo labhaamase..
text.7799: [22] nigrodho ki.m parajjhati {aparajjhatha (sii0), aparajjhati (syaa0 pii0)}, vaa.nijaa bhaddamatthu te..
text.7802: [27] naaridaa pacchimaa saakhaa, sabbakaame ca uttaraa.
text.7803: [22] nigrodho ki.m parajjhati, vaa.nijaa bhaddamatthu te..
text.7805: [21] yassa rukkhassa chaayaaya, nisiideyya sayeyya vaa.

text.7808: [21] te ca tassaanaadiyitvaa {tassa anaaditvaa (sii0 syaa0)}, ekassa vacana.m bahuu.
text.7814: [21] ete hanatha bandhatha, maa vo mu~ncittha {muccittha (pii0)} jiivita.m.

text.7818: [22] lobhassa na vasa.m gacche, haneyyaarisaka.m {haneyya disata.m (sii0), haneyya disaka.m (syaa0)} mana.m..

text.7839: [21] svaagata.m te mahaaraaja, atho te aduraagata.m.
text.7840: [22] nisiida daani raajiisi {raajisi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, devaraajassa santike..
text.7843: [22] nimantayittha {nimantayii ca (sii0 pii0)} kaamehi, aasanena ca vaasavo..

text.7850: [27] so daani ajja na ramaami sagge, aayu.m nu khii.no {khii.na.m (syaa0)}  mara.na.m nu santike.
text.7853: [21] na taayu {na caayu (sii0 pii0 ka0)} khii.na.m mara.na~nca {mara.na.m te (sii0  pii0)} duure, na caapi muu.lho  naraviirase.t.tha.
text.7854: [22] tuyha~nca {tava~nca (sii0 pii0), tava ca (ka0)} pu~n~naani parittakaani, yesa.m vipaaka.m idha  vedayittho {vedayato (pii0 ka0)}..

text.7865: [21] soha.m gantvaa manussesu, kaahaami kusala.m bahu.m.
text.7867: [22] ya.m katvaa sukhito hoti, na ca pacchaanutappati..

text.7889: [22] ta.m magga.m pa.tipajjissa.m, yena gacchanti subbataati..

text.7996: [21] pasuupi tattha ha~n~nanti, mahi.msaa suukaraa ajaa.

text.8019: [21] virate methunaa dhammaa, ye me bhu~njeyyu bhojana.m.

text.8036: [21] a~n~ne dhanassa kaamaa hi, he.t.thaama~nce pasakkitaa {pasakkhitaa (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}.

text.8092: [22] dhuna.m saamaakaniivaara.m, sa"nghaariya.m pasaariya.m {sa.mhaariya.m pahaariya.m (syaa0), sa.msaariya.m pasaariya.m  (ka0)}..

text.8164: [21] katama.m disa.m agamaa bhuuripa~n~no, akkhaatha me maa.navaa  etamattha.m.

text.8170: [21] aavellita.m pi.t.thito uttama"nga.m, baahu.m pasaareti akammaneyya.m.

text.8191: [21] ja.taa ca kesaa ajinaa nivatthaa, jaruudapaana.mva mukha.m  paruu.lha.m.

text.8217: [21] aaha~n~nantu ^a^T1.0415^ea^ {aaha~n~nare (syaa0)} bherimudi"ngasa"nkhe {sa"nkhaa (syaa0)},   siighaani yaanaani ca yojayantu.
text.8218: [22] ajjevaha.m assama.m ta.m gamissa.m, yattheva dakkhissamisi.m  nisinna.m..

text.8226: [21] ramma~nca te aavasatha.m karontu, naariiga.nehi paricaarayassu.

text.8238: [21] soha.m eva.m pajaanaami {so aha.m suppajaanaami (sii0 pii0)},   maccu me nappamajjati.
text.8241: [21] jaati naraana.m adhamaa janinda, ca.n.daalayoni  dvipadaakani.t.thaa {dipadaakani.t.thaa (sii0 pii0)}.

text.8247: [21] upaniiyati ^a^V1.0238^ea^ jiivitamappamaayu, jaruupaniitassa  ^a^T1.0417^ea^ na santi taa.naa.

text.8327: [21] sakhaa ^a^T1.0421^ea^ ca mitto ca mamaasi siivika {siivaka (sii0 pii0)}, susikkhito  saadhu karohi me vaco.

text.8396: [21] na sippameta.m vidadhaati bhoga.m, na bandhuvaa {na bandhavaa (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} na  sariirava.n.no yo {na sariiraavakaaso (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.8397: [27] passe.lamuuga.m sukhamedhamaana.m, sirii hi na.m bhajate  goravinda.m {gorimanda.m (sii0 pii0)}.

text.8400: [21] laddhaa sukha.m majjati appapa~n~no, dukkhena phu.t.thopi  pamohameti.
text.8401: [27] aagantunaa dukkhasukhena phu.t.tho, pavedhati vaaricarova  ghamme.
text.8402: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~nova seyyo na  yasassi baalo..

text.8405: [27] evampi a.d.dha.m sadhana.m sabhoga.m, bahujjano bhajati atthahetu.
text.8406: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~no nihiino  siriimaava seyyo..

text.8412: [21] yaa ^a^V1.0242^ea^ ^a^M1.0321^ea^ kaaci najjo  ga"ngamabhissavanti, sabbaava taa naamagotta.m jahanti.
text.8413: [27] ga"ngaa samudda.m pa.tipajjamaanaa, na khaayate iddhi.m pa~n~nopi  loke {iddhiparo hi loke (ka0 sii0 syaa0), iddhiparo hi loko (sii0 pii0 a.t.tha0)}.

text.8420: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~nova seyyo na  yasassi baalo..
text.8422: [21] asa~n~nato cepi paresamattha.m, bha.naati sandhaanagato  {sa.n.thaanagato (syaa0 pii0), santhaanagato (sii0)} yasassii.

text.8427: [27] so nindito hoti sabhaaya majjhe, pacchaapi {peccampi (sii0 pii0), peccaapi (?)} so  duggatigaamii hoti.
text.8428: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~nova seyyo na  yasassi baalo..
text.8430: [21] atthampi ^a^M1.0322^ea^ ce bhaasati bhuuripa~n~no,  anaa.lhiyo {anaalayo (pii0)} appadhano daliddo.
text.8431: [27] na tassa ta.m ruuhati ~naatimajjhe, sirii ^a^T1.0427^ea^ ca pa~n~naa.navato  na hoti.
text.8432: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~no nihiino  siriimaava seyyo..
text.8434: [21] parassa vaa attano vaapi hetu, na bhaasati alika.m  bhuuripa~n~no.
text.8435: [27] so puujito hoti sabhaaya majjhe, pacchaapi so  suggatigaamii hoti.
text.8436: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~nova seyyo na  yasassi baalo..
text.8438: [21] hatthii gavassaa ma.niku.n.dalaa ca, thiyo ca iddhesu kulesu  jaataa.
text.8439: [27] sabbaava taa upabhogaa bhavanti, iddhassa posassa  aniddhimanto.
text.8440: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~no nihiino  siriimaava seyyo..
text.8443: [27] sirii jahati dummedha.m, ji.n.na.mva urago taca.m.
text.8444: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~nova seyyo na  yasassi baalo..
text.8446: [21] pa~nca pa.n.ditaa maya.m bhaddante, sabbe ^a^T1.0428^ea^ pa~njalikaa upa.t.thitaa.
text.8447: [27] tva.m no abhibhuyya issarosi, sakkova bhuutapati  devaraajaa.
text.8448: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~no nihiino  siriimaava seyyo..
text.8450: [21] daasova ^a^V1.0243^ea^ ^a^M1.0323^ea^ pa~n~nassa  yasassi baalo, atthesu jaatesu tathaavidhesu.
text.8451: [27] ya.m pa.n.dito nipu.na.m sa.mvidheti, sammohamaapajjati tattha  baalo.
text.8452: [22] etampi disvaana aha.m vadaami, pa~n~nova seyyo na  yasassi baalo..
text.8454: [21] addhaa hi pa~n~naava sata.m pasatthaa, kantaa sirii bhogarataa  manussaa.
text.8455: [22] ~naa.na~nca buddhaanamatulyaruupa.m, pa~n~na.m na acceti sirii  kadaaci..
text.8457: [21] ya.m ta.m apucchimha akittayii no, mahosadha  kevaladhammadassii.
text.8458: [27] gava.m sahassa.m usabha~nca naaga.m, aaja~n~nayutte ca rathe dasa  ime.
text.8459: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami ^a^T1.0429^ea^ te gaamavaraani  so.lasaati..
text.8463: [21] ete yuuthaa patiyanti, bhiitaa mara.nassa {mara.naa (syaa0 pii0), mara.na  (ka0)} cittaka.
text.8464: [22] gaccha tuvampi maaka"nkhi, jiivissanti tayaa saha..
text.8466: [21] naaha.m roha.na {rohanta (sii0 pii0), rohana (syaa0)} gacchaami, hadaya.m me avakassati.
text.8467: [22] na ta.m aha.m jahissaami, idha hissaami jiivita.m..
text.8469: [21] te hi nuuna marissanti, andhaa apari.naayakaa.
text.8470: [22] gaccha tuvampi maaka"nkhi, jiivissanti tayaa saha..
text.8472: [21] naaha.m roha.na gacchaami, hadaya.m me avakassati.
text.8473: [22] na ta.m baddha.m {bandha.m (ka0)} jahissaami, idha hissaami jiivita.m..
text.8475: [21] gaccha ^a^M1.0324^ea^ bhiiru palaayassu, kuu.te  baddhosmi aayase.
text.8476: [22] gaccha tuvampi maaka"nkhi, jiivissanti tayaa saha..
text.8478: [21] naaha.m roha.na gacchaami, hadaya.m me avakassati.
text.8479: [22] na ta.m aha.m jahissaami, idha hissaami jiivita.m..
text.8481: [21] te hi nuuna marissanti, andhaa apari.naayakaa.
text.8482: [22] gaccha tuvampi maaka"nkhi, jiivissanti tayaa saha..
text.8484: [21] naaha.m roha.na gacchaami, hadaya.m me avakassati.
text.8485: [22] na ^a^T1.0430^ea^ ta.m baddha.m jahissaami, idha hissaami jiivita.m..
text.8487: [21] aya.m so luddako eti, luddaruupo {ruddaruupo (sii0 pii0)} sahaavudho.
text.8488: [22] yo no vadhissati ajja, usunaa sattiyaa api {mapi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.8493: [21] kinnu teme migaa honti, muttaa baddha.m upaasare.
text.8496: [21] bhaataro honti me ludda, sodariyaa ekamaatukaa.
text.8499: [21] te hi nuuna marissanti, andhaa apari.naayakaa.
text.8500: [22] pa~ncanna.m jiivita.m dehi, bhaatara.m mu~nca luddaka..
text.8502: [21] so vo aha.m pamokkhaami, maataapettibhara.m miga.m.
text.8508: [21] katha.m tva.m pamokkho {katha.m pamokkho (sii0 pii0), katha.m te parokkho  (?)} aasi, upaniitasmi jiivite.
text.8520: [21] eva.m aanandito hotu, saha daarehi luddako.
text.8523: [21] nanu tva.m avaca {avacaa (sii0 pii0)} ludda, ``migacammaani aahari.m''.
text.8524: [22] atha kena nu va.n.nena, migacammaani naahari..
text.8526: [21] aagamaa ceva hatthattha.m, kuu.tapaasa~nca so migo.
text.8527: [22] abajjhi ta.m {abajjhi ta~nca (pii0)} migaraaja.m, ta~nca muttaa upaasare..
text.8529: [21] tassa me ahu sa.mvego, abbhuto lomaha.msano.
text.8530: [22] ima~ncaaha.m miga.m ha~n~ne, ajja hissaami jiivita.m..
text.8532: [21] kiidisaa te migaa ludda, kiidisaa dhammikaa migaa.
text.8533: [22] katha.mva.n.naa katha.msiilaa, baa.lha.m kho ne pasa.msasi..
text.8538: [21] edisaa te migaa deva, edisaa dhammikaa migaa.
text.8539: [22] maataapettibharaa deva, na te so abhihaaritu.m {abhihaarayu.m (ka0 sii0), abhihaarayi.m (syaa0),  abhihaaraya.m (pii0)}..
text.8542: [22] catussada~nca {caturassa~nca (syaa0 ka0)} palla"nka.m, umaapupphasarinnibha.m {ummaapupphasirinnibha.m  (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)}..
text.8544: [21] dve ^a^T1.0432^ea^ ca saadisiyo bhariyaa, usabha~nca gava.m sata.m.
text.8545: [22] dhammena rajja.m kaaressa.m, bahukaaro mesi luddaka..
text.8547: [21] kasivaa.nijjaa {kasii va.nijjaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} i.nadaana.m, u~nchaacariyaa ca luddaka.
text.8548: [22] etena daara.m posehi, maa paapa.m akarii punaati {akaraa punanti (ka0 sii0 pii0)}..
text.8558: [21] pateva patata.m se.t.tha, natthi baddhe sahaayataa {sahaayakaa (syaa0)}.
text.8559: [22] maa aniighaaya haapesi, kaama.m sumukha pakkama..
text.8562: [22] jiivita.m mara.na.m vaa me, tayaa saddhi.m bhavissati..
text.8564: [21] etadariyassa kalyaa.na.m, ya.m tva.m sumukha bhaasasi.
text.8567: [21] apadena pada.m yaati, antalikkhacaro {antalikkhe caro (sii0 pii0)} dijo.
text.8568: [22] aaraa paasa.m na bujjhi tva.m, ha.msaana.m pavaruttama {pavaruttamo (ka0 sii0 pii0)}..
text.8571: [22] atha ^a^T1.0433^ea^ jaala~nca paasa~nca, aasajjaapi na bujjhati..
text.8574: [22] harittaca hemava.n.na, tva~n~neva {tva~nca ta.m (sii0), tva~nca (pii0)} avahiyyasi..
text.8576: [21] ete ^a^V1.0246^ea^ bhutvaa ca pitvaa ca, pakkamanti  viha"ngamaa.
text.8579: [21] kinnu tyaaya.m {taaya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} dijo hoti, mutto baddha.m upaasasi.
text.8580: [22] ohaaya saku.naa yanti, ki.m eko avahiyyasi..
text.8582: [21] raajaa me so dijo mitto, sakhaa paa.nasamo ca me.
text.8583: [22] neva na.m vijahissaami, yaava kaalassa pariyaaya.m..
text.8585: [21] yo ca tva.m sakhino hetu, paa.na.m cajitumicchasi.
text.8586: [22] so te sahaaya.m mu~ncaami, hotu raajaa tavaanugo..
text.8591: [21] kaccinnu bhoto kusala.m, kacci bhoto anaamaya.m.
text.8594: [21] kusala~nceva me ha.msa, atho ha.msa anaamaya.m.
text.8597: [21] kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.
text.8598: [22] kacci aaraa amittaa te, chaayaa dakkhi.natoriva..
text.8600: [21] athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.
text.8601: [22] atho ^a^T1.0434^ea^ aaraa amittaa me, chaayaa dakkhi.natoriva..
text.8603: [21] kacci te saadisii bhariyaa, assavaa piyabhaa.ninii.
text.8606: [21] atho me saadisii bhariyaa, assavaa piyabhaa.ninii.
text.8609: [21] kacci te bahavo puttaa, sujaataa ra.t.thava.d.dhana.
text.8612: [21] satameko ca me puttaa, dhatara.t.tha mayaa sutaa.
text.8613: [22] tesa.m tva.m kiccamakkhaahi, naavarujjhanti {naavarajjhanti (ka0 sii0 pii0)} te vaco..
text.8615: [21] upapannopi ce hoti, jaatiyaa vinayena vaa.
text.8616: [22] atha pacchaa kurute yoga.m, kicche {kicce (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aapaasu {aavaasu (syaa0),  aapadaasu (ka0)} siidati..
text.8621: [21] asaare ^a^V1.0247^ea^ saarayoga~n~nuu, mati.m na tveva  vindati.
text.8624: [21] hiinajaccopi ce hoti, u.t.thaataa dhitimaa naro.
text.8627: [21] eta.m ^a^M1.0328^ea^ me upama.m katvaa, putte vijjaasu  vaacaya {.thaapasa (syaa0 ka0)}.
text.8628: [22] sa.mviruu.lhetha medhaavii, khette biija.mva {khettabiija.mva (sii0 pii0)} vu.t.thiyaati..
text.8636: [22] tassaa {tasmaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} ku.tiyaa nikkhamma, suvo luddaani bhaasati..
text.8642: [22] handassaabhara.na.m sabba.m, ga.nhaama saahasaa {sahasaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} maya.m..
text.8644: [21] nisiithepi raho daani, sutto raajaa sasaarathi.
text.8645: [22] aadaaya vattha.m ma.niku.n.dala~nca, hantvaana saakhaahi  avattharaama..
text.8648: [22] duraasadaa hi raajaano, aggi pajjalito yathaa..
text.8650: [21] atha tva.m patikolamba, matto thullaani gajjasi.
text.8651: [22] maatari mayha.m naggaaya, kinnu tva.m vijigucchase..
text.8653: [21] u.t.thehi samma taramaano, ratha.m yojehi saarathi.
text.8654: [22] saku.no me na ruccati, a~n~na.m gacchaama assama.m..
text.8656: [21] yutto ratho mahaaraaja, yutto ca balavaahano.
text.8659: [21] ko ^a^T1.0436^ea^ numeva gataa {kva nu'me'pagataa (?)} sabbe, ye asmi.m paricaarakaa.
text.8660: [22] esa gacchati pa~ncaalo, mutto tesa.m adassanaa..
text.8663: [22] esa gacchati pa~ncaalo, maa vo mu~ncittha jiivata.m {jiivita.m (bahuusu)}..
text.8666: [22] svaagata.m te mahaaraaja, atho te aduraagata.m.
text.8670: [22] phalaani khuddakappaani, bhu~nja raaja vara.m vara.m..
text.8673: [22] tato piva mahaaraaja, sace tva.m abhika"nkhasi..
text.8675: [21] ara~n~na.m u~nchaaya gataa, ye asmi.m paricaarakaa.
text.8676: [22] saya.m u.t.thaaya ga.nhavho, hatthaa me natthi daatave..
text.8679: [22] atheso itaro pakkhii, suvo luddaani bhaasati..
text.8681: [21] ``eta.m hanatha bandhatha, maa vo mu~ncittha jiivata.m''.
text.8687: [21] sattigumbo ca coraana.m, aha~nca isiina.m idha.
text.8688: [22] asata.m ^a^T1.0437^ea^ so, sata.m aha.m, tena dhammena no vinaa..
text.8690: [21] tattha vadho ca bandho ca, nikatii va~ncanaani ca.
text.8691: [22] aalopaa saahasaakaaraa, taani so tattha sikkhati..
text.8693: [21] idha sacca~nca dhammo ca, ahi.msaa sa.myamo damo.
text.8694: [22] aasanuudakadaayiina.m, a"nke vaddhosmi bhaaradha {bhaarata (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.8696: [21] ya.m ya~nhi raaja bhajati, santa.m vaa yadi vaa asa.m.
text.8697: [22] siilavanta.m visiila.m vaa, vasa.m tasseva gacchati..
text.8700: [22] sopi taadisako hoti, sahavaaso hi {sahavaasopi (syaa0 ka0)} taadiso..
text.8704: [22] upalepabhayaa {upalimpabhayaa (syaa0 ka0)} dhiiro, neva paapasakhaa siyaa..
text.8707: [22] kusaapi puuti {puutii (sii0 pii0)} vaayanti, eva.m baaluupasevanaa..
text.8710: [22] pattaapi surabhi {surabhii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vaayanti, eva.m dhiiruupasevanaa..
text.8712: [21] tasmaa pattapu.tasseva {phalapu.tasseva (sii0 pii0), palapu.tasseva (ka0 a.t.tha0),  palaasapu.tasseva (syaa0 ka0)}, ~natvaa sampaakamattano.
text.8714: [22] asanto niraya.m nenti, santo paapenti suggatinti..
text.8718: [21] bhallaatiyo ^a^T1.0438^ea^ {bhallaa.tiyo (sii0 pii0)} naama ahosi raajaa, ra.t.tha.m pahaaya migava.m  acaari so.
text.8719: [22] agamaa girivara.m gandhamaadana.m, supupphita.m  {sampupphita.m (sii0 pii0)} kimpurisaanuci.n.na.m..
text.8721: [21] saa.luurasa"ngha~nca nisedhayitvaa, dhanu.m {dhanu (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kalaapa~nca so  nikkhipitvaa.
text.8722: [22] upaagami vacana.m vattukaamo, yattha.t.thitaa kimpurisaa ahesu.m..
text.8724: [21] himaccaye hemavataaya tiire, kimidha.t.thitaa mantayavho  abhi.nha.m.
text.8725: [22] pucchaami vo maanusadehava.n.ne, katha.m nu {katha.m vo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} jaananti  manussaloke..
text.8727: [21] malla.m ^a^M1.0331^ea^ giri.m pa.n.daraka.m tikuu.ta.m,  siitodakaa {siitodiyaa (sii0 pii0), siitodikaa (?)} anuvicaraama najjo.
text.8728: [22] migaa manussaava nibhaasava.n.naa, jaananti no  kimpurisaati ludda..
text.8730: [21] sukiccharuupa.m paridevayavho {paridevathavho (?) moggallaanabyaakara.ne  6.38 sutta.m}, aali"ngito caasi piyo  piyaaya.
text.8731: [22] pucchaami vo maanusadehava.n.ne, kimidha vane rodatha  appatiitaa..
text.8733: [21] sukiccharuupa.m paridevayavho, aali"ngito caasi piyo  piyaaya.
text.8734: [22] pucchaami vo maanusadehava.n.ne, kimidha vane vilapatha  appatiitaa..
text.8736: [21] sukiccharuupa.m paridevayavho, aali"ngito caasi piyo  piyaaya.
text.8737: [22] pucchaami vo maanusadehava.n.ne, kimidha ^a^T1.0439^ea^ vane socatha  appatiitaa..
text.8739: [21] mayekaratta.m {ratti.m (pii0)} vippavasimha ludda, akaamakaa a~n~nama~n~na.m  sarantaa.
text.8740: [22] tamekaratta.m anutappamaanaa, socaama ``saa ratti puna.m na  hessati''..
text.8742: [21] yamekaratta.m anutappatheta.m, dhana.m va na.t.tha.m pitara.m va peta.m.
text.8743: [22] pucchaami vo maanusadehava.n.ne, katha.m vinaa  vaasamakappayittha..
text.8745: [21] yamima.m ^a^V1.0250^ea^ {yayima.m (ka0 sii0)} nadi.m passasi siighasota.m,  naanaadumacchaadana.m selakuula.m {dumacchadana.m selakuu.ta.m (sii0 pii0), dumasa~nchanna.m selakuula.m (ka0)}.
text.8746: [22] ta.m me piyo uttari vassakaale, mama~nca ^a^T1.0440^ea^ ma~n~na.m  anubandhatiiti..
text.8749: [22] ``piyo ca me hehiti maalabhaarii, aha~nca na.m maalinii  ajjhupessa.m''..
text.8751: [21] aha~ncida.m kuravakamocinaami, uddaalakaa  paa.talisindhuvaarakaa {sindhuvaaritaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}.
text.8752: [22] ``piyo ca me hehiti maalabhaarii, aha~nca na.m maalinii  ajjhupessa.m''..
text.8754: [21] aha~nca saalassa supupphitassa, oceyya pupphaani  karomi maala.m.
text.8755: [22] ``piyo ca me hehiti maalabhaarii, aha~nca na.m maalinii  ajjhupessa.m''..
text.8757: [21] aha~nca saalassa supupphitassa, oceyya pupphaani  karomi bhaara.m.
text.8758: [22] ida~nca no hehiti santharattha.m, yatthajjima.m {yatthajjama.m (sii0 pii0)} viharissaama {viharissaamu  (pii0)} ratti.m..
text.8760: [21] aha~nca kho aga.lu.m {aggalu (syaa0 ka0), akalu.m (pii0)} candana~nca,  silaaya pi.msaami pamattaruupaa.
text.8761: [22] ``piyo ca me hehiti rosita"ngo, aha~nca ^a^T1.0441^ea^ na.m rositaa  ajjhupessa.m''..
text.8763: [21] athaagamaa salila.m siighasota.m, nuda.m saale sala.le  ka.n.nikaare.
text.8764: [22] aapuuratha {apuuratha (sii0 pii0), aapuurathe (syaa0)} tena muhuttakena, saaya.m nadii aasi mayaa  suduttaraa..
text.8766: [21] ubhosu tiiresu maya.m tadaa .thitaa, sampassantaa ubhayo  a~n~nama~n~na.m.
text.8767: [22] sakimpi rodaama saki.m hasaama, kicchena no aagamaa  {agamaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sa.mvarii saa..
text.8769: [21] paatova ^a^M1.0333^ea^ {paato ca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kho uggate suuriyamhi, catukka.m  nadi.m uttariyaana ludda.
text.8770: [22] aali"ngiyaa a~n~nama~n~na.m maya.m ubho, sakimpi rodaama  saki.m hasaama..
text.8772: [21] tiihuunaka.m sattasataani ludda, yamidha maya.m vippavasimha  pubbe.
text.8773: [22] vassekima.m {vaasekima.m (sii0 pii0)} jiivita.m bhuumipaala, ko niidha kantaaya vinaa  vaseyya..
text.8775: [21] aayu~nca vo kiivatako nu samma, sacepi jaanaatha vadetha  aayu.m.
text.8776: [22] anussavaa vu.d.dhato aagamaa vaa, akkhaatha ^a^T1.0442^ea^ me ta.m  avikampamaanaa..
text.8778: [21] aayu~nca no vassasahassa.m ludda, na cantaraa paapako  atthi rogo.
text.8779: [22] appa~nca {appa.mva (syaa0 ka0)} dukkha.m sukhameva bhiyyo, aviitaraagaa vijahaama  jiivita.m..
text.8781: [21] ida~nca sutvaana amaanusaana.m, bhallaatiyo ittara  jiivitanti.
text.8782: [22] nivattatha na migava.m acari, adaasi daanaani abhu~nji  bhoge..
text.8784: [21] ida~nca sutvaana amaanusaana.m, sammodatha maa kalaha.m  akattha.
text.8785: [22] maa vo tapii attakammaaparaadho, yathaapi te  kimpurisekaratta.m..
text.8787: [21] ida~nca ^a^V1.0251^ea^ sutvaana amaanusaana.m, sammodatha maa  vivaada.m akattha.
text.8788: [22] maa vo tapii attakammaaparaadho, yathaapi te  kimpurisekaratta.m..
text.8790: [21] vividha.m ^a^M1.0334^ea^ {vividha (sii0 syaa0)} adhimanaa su.nomaha.m,  vacanapatha.m tava atthasa.mhita.m.
text.8791: [22] mu~nca.m {mu~nca (sii0 pii0)} gira.m nudaseva me dara.m, sama.na ^a^T1.0443^ea^ sukhaavaha jiiva me  ciranti..
text.8795: [21] ko ta.m hi.msati he.theti, ki.m {kinnu (pii0 ka0)} dummano socasi appatiito.
text.8796: [22] kassajja maataapitaro rudantu, kvajja setu {ko nvejja seti (ka0), ko ajja setu (?)} nihato  pathabyaa..
text.8798: [21] tu.t.thosmi deva tava dassanena, cirassa.m passaami ta.m  bhuumipaala.
text.8799: [22] ahi.msako re.numanuppavissa, puttena te he.thayitosmi {pothayitosmi (ka0)} deva..
text.8801: [21] aayantu dovaarikaa khaggabandhaa {khaggabaddhaa (sii0 pii0)}, kaasaaviyaa yantu  {hantu (ka0)} antepuranta.m.
text.8802: [22] hantvaana ta.m somanassa.m kumaara.m, chetvaana siisa.m  varamaaharantu..
text.8807: [21] sa raajaputto paridevayanto, dasa"nguli.m a~njali.m paggahetvaa.
text.8808: [22] ahampi ^a^T1.0444^ea^ icchaami janinda da.t.thu.m, jiiva.m ma.m netvaa  {jiiva.m panetvaa (sii0 pii0)} pa.tidassayetha..
text.8810: [21] tassa ta.m vacana.m sutvaa, ra~n~no putta.m adassayu.m.
text.8813: [21] aagacchu.m ^a^M1.0335^ea^ {aaga~nchu.m (sii0), aaga~nchu (pii0)} dovaarikaa  khaggabandhaa, kaasaaviyaa hantu mama.m janinda.
text.8814: [22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, aparaadho ko nidha  mamajja atthi..
text.8816: [21] saaya~nca paato udaka.m sajaati, aggi.m sadaa  paaricaratappamatto.
text.8817: [22] ta.m taadisa.m sa.myata.m brahmacaari.m, kasmaa tuva.m bruusi  gahappatiiti..
text.8819: [21] taalaa ca muulaa ca phalaa ca deva, pariggahaa vividhaa  santimassa.
text.8820: [22] te rakkhati gopayatappamatto, {braahma.no gahapati tena hoti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} tasmaa aha.m bruumi  gahappatiiti {braahma.no gahapati tena hoti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}..
text.8822: [21] sacca.m kho eta.m vadasi kumaara, pariggahaa vividhaa  santimassa.
text.8823: [22] te rakkhati gopayatappamatto, sa {natthi ida.m sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu} braahma.no  ^a^T1.0445^ea^ gahapati tena hoti..
text.8825: [21] su.nantu mayha.m parisaa samaagataa, sanegamaa jaanapadaa ca  sabbe.
text.8826: [22] baalaaya.m baalassa vaco nisamma, ahetunaa ghaatayate ma.m  {ghaatayate (sii0 pii0)} janindo..
text.8828: [21] da.lhasmi ^a^V1.0252^ea^ muule visa.te viruu.lhe,  dunnikkayo ve.lu pasaakhajaato.
text.8829: [22] vandaami paadaani tava {tava.m (sii0 pii0)} janinda, anujaana ma.m  pabbajissaami deva..
text.8831: [21] bhu~njassu bhoge vipule kumaara, sabba~nca te issariya.m  dadaami.
text.8832: [22] ajjeva tva.m kuruuna.m hohi raajaa, maa pabbajii pabbajjaa  hi dukkhaa..
text.8834: [21] kinnuudha ^a^M1.0336^ea^ deva tavamatthi bhogaa, pubbevaha.m {pubbe caha.m (ka0)}  devaloke ramissa.m.
text.8835: [22] ruupehi saddehi atho rasehi, gandhehi phassehi  manoramehi..
text.8837: [21] bhuttaa ca me {bhuttaa (sii0 pii0)} bhogaa tidivasmi.m deva, parivaaritaa  {paricaaritaa (ka0)} accharaana.m ga.nena {accharaasa.mga.nena (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}.
text.8838: [22] tuva~nca {tava~nca (sii0 pii0)} baala.m paraneyya.m viditvaa, na ^a^T1.0446^ea^ taadise raajakule  vaseyya.m..
text.8840: [21] sacaaha.m baalo paraneyyo asmi, ekaaparaadha.m {etaaparaadha.m (ka0)} khama putta  mayha.m.
text.8841: [22] punapi ce edisaka.m bhaveyya, yathaamati.m somanassa  karohi..
text.8846: [21] nisamma ca kata.m kamma.m, sammaavatthaaya cintita.m.
text.8849: [21] alaso gihii kaamabhogii na saadhu, asa~n~nato pabbajito  na saadhu.
text.8850: [22] raajaa na saadhu anisammakaarii, yo pa.n.dito kodhano ta.m  na saadhu..
text.8853: [22] nisammakaarino raaja, yaso kitti ca va.d.dhati..
text.8855: [21] nisamma da.n.da.m pa.nayeyya issaro, vegaa kata.m tappati  bhuumipaala.
text.8856: [22] sammaapa.niidhii ca narassa atthaa, anaanutappaa te bhavanti  pacchaa..
text.8858: [21] anaanutappaani ^a^M1.0337^ea^ hi ye karonti,  vibhajja ^a^T1.0447^ea^ kammaayatanaani loke.
text.8859: [22] vi~n~nuppasatthaani sukhudrayaani, bhavanti buddhaanumataani  {vaddhaanumataani (sii0 pii0)} taani..
text.8861: [21] aagacchu.m dovaarikaa khaggabandhaa, kaasaaviyaa hantu mama.m  janinda.
text.8862: [22] maatu~nca {maatucca (pii0)} a"nkasmimaha.m nisinno, aaka.d.dhito sahasaa tehi  deva..
text.8864: [21] ka.tuka~nhi sambaadha.m sukiccha.m {sukiccha (sii0 pii0)} patto, madhurampi ya.m jiivita.m  laddha raaja.
text.8867: [21] putto tavaaya.m taru.no sudhamme, anukampako somanasso  kumaaro.
text.8868: [22] ta.m yaacamaano na labhaami svajja {sajja (sii0 pii0)}, arahasi na.m yaacitave  {yaacituye (ka0)} tuvampi..
text.8870: [21] ramassu ^a^V1.0253^ea^ bhikkhaacariyaaya putta, nisamma  dhammesu paribbajassu.
text.8871: [22] sabbesu bhuutesu nidhaaya da.n.da.m, anindito brahmamupehi  .thaana.m..
text.8873: [21] acchera {acchariya (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ruupa.m  vata yaadisa~nca, dukkhita.m ^a^T1.0448^ea^ ma.m dukkhaapayase sudhamme.
text.8874: [22] yaacassu putta.m iti vuccamaanaa, bhiyyova ussaahayase  kumaara.m..
text.8876: [21] ye vippamuttaa anavajjabhogino {bhojino (sii0 syaa0 pii0)},  parinibbutaa lokamima.m caranti.
text.8877: [22] tamariyamagga.m pa.tipajjamaana.m, na ussahe vaarayitu.m kumaara.m..
text.8879: [21] addhaa ^a^M1.0338^ea^ have sevitabbaa sapa~n~naa,  bahussutaa ye bahu.thaanacintino.
text.8880: [22] yesaaya.m sutvaana subhaasitaani, appossukkaa viitasokaa  sudhammaati..
text.8884: [21] kaa nu vijjurivaabhaasi, osadhii viya taarakaa.
text.8885: [22] devataa nusi gandhabbii, na ta.m ma~n~naami maanusi.m {maanusii (syaa0 ka0)}..
text.8887: [21] namhi devii na gandhabbii, na mahaaraaja maanusii.
text.8890: [21] vibbhantacittaa kupitindriyaasi, nettehi te vaariga.naa  savanti.
text.8891: [22] ki.m ^a^T1.0449^ea^ te na.t.tha.m ki.m pana patthayaanaa, idhaagataa naari  tadi"ngha bruuhi..
text.8893: [21] yamuggatejo uragoti caahu, naagoti na.m aahu janaa  janinda.
text.8894: [22] tamaggahii puriso jiivikattho, ta.m bandhanaa mu~nca patii  mameso..
text.8896: [21] katha.m nvaya.m balaviriyuupapanno, hatthatta {hatthattha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} maagacchi  vanibbakassa.
text.8897: [22] akkhaahi me naagaka~n~ne tamattha.m, katha.m vijaanemu  gahiitanaaga.m..
text.8899: [21] nagarampi naago bhasma.m kareyya, tathaa hi so  balaviriyuupapanno.
text.8900: [22] dhamma~nca naago apacaayamaano, tasmaa parakkamma tapo  karoti..
text.8902: [21] caatuddasi.m ^a^M1.0339^ea^ pa~ncadasi.m {pannarasi.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ca raaja, catuppathe  sammati naagaraajaa.
text.8903: [22] tamaggahii puriso jiivikattho, ta.m bandhanaa mu~nca patii  mameso..
text.8906: [22] vaarigehasayaa naarii {naariyo (pii0)}, taapi ta.m sara.na.m gataa..
text.8908: [21] dhammena ^a^T1.0450^ea^ mocehi asaahasena, gaamena nikkhena gava.m satena.
text.8909: [22] ossa.t.thakaayo urago caraatu, pu~n~natthiko mu~ncatu  bandhanasmaa..
text.8911: [21] dhammena ^a^V1.0254^ea^ mocemi asaahasena, gaamena  nikkhena gava.m satena.
text.8912: [22] ossa.t.thakaayo urago caraatu, pu~n~natthiko mu~ncatu  bandhanasmaa..
text.8917: [21] dve ca saadisiyo bhariyaa, usabha~nca gava.m sata.m.
text.8918: [22] ossa.t.thakaayo urago caraatu, pu~n~natthiko mu~ncatu  bandhanasmaa..
text.8920: [21] vinaapi daanaa tava vacana.m janinda, mu~ncemu na.m uraga.m  bandhanasmaa.
text.8921: [22] ossa.t.thakaayo urago caraatu, pu~n~natthiko mu~ncatu  bandhanasmaa..
text.8924: [22] namo te kaasiraajatthu, namo te kaasiva.d.dhana.
text.8925: [22] a~njali.m te pagga.nhaami, passeyya.m me nivesana.m..
text.8927: [21] addhaa ^a^T1.0451^ea^ ^a^M1.0340^ea^ hi dubbissasametamaahu, ya.m  maanuso vissase amaanusamhi.
text.8928: [22] sace ca ma.m yaacasi etamattha.m, dakkhemu te naaga  nivesanaani..
text.8930: [21] sacepi {sace hi (sii0 pii0 a.t.tha0)} vaato girimaavaheyya, cando ca suriyo ca chamaa  pateyyu.m.
text.8931: [22] sabbaa ca najjo pa.tisota.m vajeyyu.m, na tvevaha.m raaja musaa  bha.neyya.m..
text.8933: [21] nabha.m phaleyya udadhiipi susse, sa.mva.t.taye {sa.mva.t.teya.m (sii0 pii0), sa.mva.t.teyya  (syaa0 ka0)} bhuutadharaa vasundharaa.
text.8934: [22] siluccayo meru samuulamuppate {mubbahe (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0 a.t.tha0), mu.t.thahe (ka0)}, na  tvevaha.m raaja musaa bha.neyya.m..
text.8936: [21] addhaa hi dubbissasametamaahu, ya.m maanuso vissase  amaanusamhi.
text.8937: [22] sace ca ma.m yaacasi etamattha.m, dakkhemu te naaga  nivesanaani..
text.8939: [21] tumhe khottha ghoravisaa u.laaraa, mahaatejaa khippakopii  ca hotha.
text.8940: [22] ma.mkaara.naa {mama kaara.naa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bandhanasmaa pamutto, arahasi no jaanituye  {jaanitaaye (sii0), jaanitave (syaa0), jaanitaye (pii0)} kataani..
text.8942: [21] so ^a^T1.0452^ea^ paccata.m niraye ghoraruupe, maa kaayika.m saatamalattha  ki~nci.
text.8943: [22] pe.laaya baddho mara.na.m upetu, yo taadisa.m kammakata.m na  jaane..
text.8945: [21] saccappa.ti~n~naa ^a^M1.0341^ea^ tavamesa hotu,  akkodhano hohi anupanaahii.
text.8946: [22] sabba~nca te naagakula.m supa.n.naa, aggi.mva gimhesu  {gimhaasu (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vivajjayantu..
text.8948: [21] anukampasii naagakula.m janinda, maataa yathaa suppiya.m  ekaputta.m.
text.8949: [22] aha~nca te naagakulena saddhi.m, kaahaami veyyaava.tika.m  u.laara.m..
text.8951: [21] yojentu ve raajarathe sucitte, kambojake assatare  sudante.
text.8952: [22] naage ca yojentu suva.n.nakappane, dakkhemu naagassa  nivesanaani..
text.8954: [21] bherii ^a^V1.0255^ea^ mudi"ngaa {muti"ngaa (sii0 pii0)} pa.navaa ca sa"nkhaa,  avajjayi.msu uggasenassa ra~n~no.
text.8955: [22] paayaasi raajaa bahusobhamaano, purakkhato naariga.nassa  majjhe..
text.8960: [21] sa raajaa paavisi byamha.m, campeyyassa nivesana.m.
text.8967: [22] dibbaa tuuriyaa pavajji.msu, naagaka~n~naa ca naccisu.m {naccayu.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}..
text.8969: [21] ta.m naagaka~n~naa carita.m ga.nena, anvaaruhii kaasiraajaa  pasanno.
text.8972: [21] so ^a^M1.0342^ea^ tattha bhutvaa ca atho ramitvaa,  campeyyaka.m kaasiraajaa avoca.
text.8974: [22] netaadisa.m atthi manussaloke, ki.m patthaya.m {kimatthiya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} naaga tapo  karosi..
text.8977: [27] paggayha ^a^T1.0454^ea^ paayenti anomava.n.naa, netaadisa.m atthi  manussaloke.
text.8980: [21] najjo ca temaa puthulomamacchaa, aa.taa {aadaa (syaa0), adaa (pii0)}   sakuntaabhirudaa sutitthaa.
text.8981: [22] netaadisa.m atthi manussaloke, ki.m patthaya.m naaga tapo  karosi..
text.8983: [21] ko~ncaa mayuuraa diviyaa ca ha.msaa, vaggussaraa kokilaa  sampatanti.
text.8984: [22] netaadisa.m atthi manussaloke, ki.m patthaya.m naaga tapo  karosi..
text.8986: [21] ambaa ca saalaa tilakaa ca jambuyo, uddaalakaa  paa.taliyo ca phullaa.
text.8987: [22] netaadisa.m atthi manussaloke, ki.m patthaya.m naaga tapo  karosi..
text.8989: [21] imaa ca te pokkhara~n~no samantato, dibbaa {dibyaa (syaa0), diviyaa  (pii0)} ca gandhaa satata.m pavaayanti.
text.8990: [22] netaadisa.m atthi manussaloke, ki.m patthaya.m naaga tapo  karosi..
text.8992: [21] na ^a^M1.0343^ea^ puttahetu na dhanassa hetu, na  ^a^T1.0455^ea^ aayuno caapi {vaapi (sii0 pii0)} janinda hetu.
text.8993: [22] manussayoni.m abhipatthayaano, tasmaa parakkamma tapo  karomi..
text.8999: [22] pucchaami ta.m naagaraajetamattha.m, seyyo ito kena  manussaloko..
text.9001: [21] janinda naa~n~natra manussalokaa, suddhii va sa.mvijjati  sa.myamo vaa.
text.9002: [22] aha~nca laddhaana manussayoni.m, kaahaami jaatimara.nassa  anta.m..
text.9004: [21] addhaa have sevitabbaa sapa~n~naa, bahussutaa ye  bahu.thaanacintino.
text.9005: [22] naariyo ca disvaana tuva~nca naaga, kaahaami pu~n~naani  anappakaani..
text.9007: [21] addhaa have sevitabbaa sapa~n~naa, bahussutaa ^a^T1.0456^ea^ ye  bahu.thaanacintino.
text.9008: [22] naariyo ca disvaana mama~nca raaja, karohi pu~n~naani  anappakaani..
text.9010: [21] ida~nca me jaataruupa.m pahuuta.m, raasii suva.n.nassa ca  taalamattaa.
text.9011: [22] {ito haritvaa sova.n.nagharaani kaaraya, ruupiyassa ca paakaara.m karontu (sii0 syaa0) ito  haritvaa sova.n.nagharaani, [kaaraya] ruupiyassa ca paakaara.m karontu (pii0)} ito  haritvaana suva.n.nagharaani, karassu ruupiyapaakaara.m karontu {ito haritvaa sova.n.nagharaani kaaraya,  ruupiyassa ca paakaara.m karontu (sii0 syaa0) ito haritvaa sova.n.nagharaani, [kaaraya] ruupiyassa  ca paakaara.m karontu (pii0)}..
text.9013: [21] muttaa ^a^M1.0344^ea^ ca {muttaana~nca (sii0 syaa0)} vaahasahassaani pa~nca,  ve.luriyamissaani ito haritvaa.
text.9014: [22] antepure bhuumiya.m santharantu, nikkaddamaa hehiti niirajaa ca..
text.9016: [21] etaadisa.m aavasa raajase.t.tha, vimaanase.t.tha.m bahu sobhamaana.m.
text.9017: [22] baaraa.nasi.m nagara.m iddha.m phiita.m, rajja~nca kaarehi  anomapa~n~naati..
text.9024: [21] kaamaa ^a^T1.0457^ea^ vaa kaamasa~n~naa vaa, brahmaloke na vijjati.
text.9028: [22] so tattha pa.tisalliino {pa.tisallaano (ka0)}, eko rahasi jhaayatha..
text.9031: [22] ekaputto caya.m mayha.m, na ca kaamaani bhu~njati..
text.9033: [21] ko nu khvettha {khettha (sii0 pii0)} upaayo so, ko vaa jaanaati ki~ncana.m.
text.9034: [22] yo {ko (sii0 pii0)} me putta.m palobheyya, yathaa kaamaani patthaye..
text.9040: [22] aha.m kho na.m palobheyya.m, sace bhattaa bhavissati..
text.9043: [22] tva~n~neva na.m palobhehi, tava bhattaa bhavissati..
text.9045: [21] saa ^a^M1.0345^ea^ ca antepura.m gantvaa, bahu.m  kaamupasa.mhita.m.
text.9048: [21] tassaa ca gaayamaanaaya, sadda.m sutvaana naariyaa.
text.9051: [21] kasseso saddo ko vaa so, bha.nati uccaavaca.m bahu.m.
text.9052: [22] hadaya"ngama.m pemaniiya.m, aho {atho (sii0 pii0)} ka.n.nasukha.m mama..
text.9054: [21] esaa ^a^T1.0458^ea^ kho pamadaa deva, khi.d.daa esaa anappikaa {anappakaa (ka0)}.
text.9055: [22] sace tva.m kaame bhu~njeyya, bhiyyo bhiyyo chaadeyyu ta.m..
text.9057: [21] i"ngha aagacchatorena {aagacchatorena.m (ka0) aagacchatu + orena}, aviduuramhi gaayatu.
text.9061: [22] bandhi na.m {bhandhitu.m (syaa0 ka0)} anupubbena, aara~n~namiva ku~njara.m..
text.9064: [22] ``ahameva kaame bhu~njeyya.m, maa a~n~no puriso ahu''..
text.9066: [21] tato asi.m gahetvaana, purise hantu.m upakkami.
text.9067: [22] ahameveko bhu~njissa.m, maa a~n~no puriso siyaa..
text.9072: [21] ta~nca raajaa vivaahesi {nivaahesi (syaa0), vihaahesi (pii0)}, samhaa  ra.t.thaa ca {ra.t.thaato (sii0 pii0), ra.t.thato (ka0)} khattiyo.
text.9073: [22] yaavataa vijita.m mayha.m, na te vatthabba {vattabba (sii0 pii0)} taavade..
text.9079: [22] so tassa geha.m paavekkhi, bhattakaale upa.t.thite..
text.9081: [21] ta~nca ^a^M1.0346^ea^ bhariyaa palobhesi, passa yaava  sudaaru.na.m.
text.9087: [21] isii ca khattiya.m disvaa, samudda.m upasa"nkami.
text.9090: [21] khattiyo ca isi.m disvaa, siidamaana.m maha.n.nave.
text.9102: [21] ya.m etaa upasevanti, chandasaa vaa dhanena vaa.
text.9105: [21] khattiyassa vaco sutvaa, isissa nibbidaa ahu.
text.9106: [22] laddhaa poraa.naka.m magga.m, gacchate so vihaayasa.m..
text.9108: [21] khattiyo ca isi.m disvaa, gacchamaana.m vihaayasa.m.
text.9116: [21] pa~nca ^a^M1.0347^ea^ pa.n.ditaa samaagataattha, pa~nhaa me  pa.tibhaati ta.m su.naatha.
text.9117: [22] nindiyamattha.m pasa.msiya.m vaa, kassevaavikareyya {kassa vaaviikareyya (ka0)} guyhamattha.m..
text.9119: [21] tva.m ^a^V1.0259^ea^ aavikarohi bhuumipaala, bhattaa bhaarasaho  tuva.m vade ta.m.
text.9120: [22] tava chandaruciini {chanda~nca ruci~nca (sii0 pii0)} sammasitvaa, atha vakkhanti janinda  pa~nca dhiiraa..
text.9122: [21] yaa siilavatii ana~n~natheyyaa {ana~n~nadheyyaa (sii0 pii0)}, bhattucchandavasaanugaa  (piyaa) {( ) natthi sii0 pii0 potthakesu} manaapaa.
text.9123: [22] nindiyamattha.m pasa.msiya.m vaa, bhariyaayaavikareyya {bhariyaaya vaaviikareyya (ka0)} guyhamattha.m..
text.9125: [21] yo kicchagatassa aaturassa, sara.na.m hoti gatii  paraayana~nca.
text.9126: [22] nindiyamattha.m pasa.msiya.m vaa, sakhino vaavikareyya  guyhamattha.m..
text.9128: [21] je.t.tho ^a^T1.0461^ea^ {yo je.t.tho (syaa0)} atha majjhimo kani.t.tho, yo {so (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} ce siilasamaahito  .thitatto.
text.9129: [22] nindiyamattha.m pasa.msiya.m vaa, bhaatu vaaviikareyya guyhamattha.m..
text.9131: [21] yo ve pituhadayassa paddhaguu {patthaguu (syaa0), pattaguu (ka0)}, anujaato pitara.m  anomapa~n~no.
text.9132: [22] nindiyamattha.m pasa.msiya.m vaa, puttassaavikareyya {puttassa vaaviikareyya (ka0)} guyhamattha.m..
text.9134: [21] maataa ^a^M1.0348^ea^ dvipadaajanindase.t.tha, yaa na.m {yo ta.m (sii0 pii0)}  poseti chandasaa piyena.
text.9135: [22] nindiyamattha.m pasa.msiya.m vaa, maatuyaaviikareyya {maatuyaa vaaviikareyya (ka0)} guyhamattha.m..
text.9137: [21] guyhassa hi guyhameva saadhu, na hi guyhassa  pasatthamaavikamma.m.
text.9138: [22] anipphannataa {anipphaadaaya (sii0 pii0), anipphannataaya (syaa0), aa nipphaadaa (?)}   saheyya dhiiro, nipphannova {nipphannattho (sii0 pii0), nipphannatthova (syaa0)} yathaasukha.m bha.neyya..

text.9188: [21] cirassa.m vata passaama, isi.m dhammagu.ne rata.m.
text.9191: [21] aasana.m udaka.m pajja.m, pa.tiga.nhaatu no bhava.m.
text.9192: [22] agghe bhavanta.m pucchaama, aggha.m kurutu no bhava.m..
text.9194: [21] adhicca vede pariyesa vitta.m, putte gahe {gehe (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} taata  pati.t.thapetvaa.
text.9195: [22] gandhe rase paccanubhuyya {paccanubhotva (syaa0), paccanubhutva (pii0)} sabba.m, ara~n~na.m saadhu muni so  pasattho..
text.9197: [21] vedaa na saccaa na ca vittalaabho, na puttalaabhena jara.m  vihanti.
text.9198: [22] gandhe ^a^T1.0465^ea^ rase muccana {mu~ncana (sii0 ka0)} maahu santo, sakammunaa {sakammanaa (sii0 pii0)} hoti  phaluupapatti..
text.9200: [21] addhaa hi sacca.m vacana.m taveta.m, sakammunaa hoti  phaluupapatti.
text.9201: [22] ji.n.naa ca maataapitaro taviime {taveme (sii0), tava yime (syaa0 pii0)}, passeyyu.m ta.m vassasata.m  aroga.m {arogya.m (syaa0 ka0)}..
text.9203: [21] yassassa ^a^V1.0261^ea^ ^a^M1.0351^ea^ sakkhii  mara.nena raaja, jaraaya mettii naraviirase.t.tha.

text.9224: [21] yuvaa ^a^M1.0352^ea^ sujaato sumukho sudassano,  saamo kusumbhapariki.n.namassu.

text.9228: [22] pahiinaputtassa mamajja bhoti, vaase.t.thi ^a^T1.0467^ea^ bhikkhaacariyaaya  kaalo..

text.9399: [22] asa.msaya.m tepi {te (sii0 pii0)} jaananti, pa.t.thabhuutaa {vaddhabhuutaa (sii0 pii0)} yasassino..

text.9402: [22] na ciiyatii tassa narassa paapa.m, sace na ceteti vadhaaya  tassa..
text.9404: [21] isipuugasama~n~naate, eva.m lokyaa viditaa sati {pati (ka0 syaa0 ka0)}.
text.9407: [21] sace aha.m marissaami, tiire te puthususso.ni.

text.9410: [21] tasmaa ^a^M1.0360^ea^ hi paapaka.m kamma.m, rakkhasseva  {rakkhassu ca (syaa0)} sumajjhime.
text.9411: [22] maa ta.m sabbo jano pacchaa, paku.t.thaayi {pakatthaasi (sii0 pii0), patvakkhaasi (syaa0)} mayi mate..
text.9413: [21] a~n~naatameta.m avisayhasaahi, attaanamamba~nca dadaami te ta.m.

text.9426: [21] ambettha vippasaakhaggaa {vippasuunaggaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0), vippaonaggaa  (ka0)}, palaalakhalasannibhaa.

text.9438: [21] ajjhenaani pa.tiggayha, kaamesu gadhito {gathito (sii0 pii0), giddhito  (syaa0 ka0), giddhiko (ka0 a.t.tha0)} aha.m.

text.9447: [22] gattehi ^a^T1.0478^ea^ te rasmiyo niccharanti, saterataa  {sateritaa (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} vijjurivantalikkhe..

text.9458: [21] ga.leyya ^a^V1.0268^ea^ ya.m pitvaa {piitvaa (sii0 pii0)} pate papaata.m, sobbha.m guha.m  candaniyo.ligalla.m.

text.9462: [22] anaathamaano ^a^T1.0479^ea^ upagaayati naccati ca, tassaa pu.n.na.m  kumbhamima.m ki.naatha..
text.9464: [21] ya.m ^a^M1.0362^ea^ ve pivitvaa acelova naggo,  careyya gaame visikhantaraani.
text.9465: [22] sammuu.lhacitto ativelasaayii, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9467: [21] ya.m pitvaa u.t.thaaya pavedhamaano, siisa~nca baahu~nca {baaha~nca (pii0)}  pacaalayanto.
text.9468: [22] so naccatii daaruka.tallakova, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9470: [21] ya.m ve pivitvaa aggida.d.dhaa sayanti, atho sigaalehipi  khaaditaase.
text.9471: [22] bandha.m vadha.m bhogajaani~ncupenti, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9473: [21] ya.m pitvaa bhaaseyya aabhaasaneyya.m, sabhaayamaasiino  apetavattho.
text.9474: [22] sammakkhito {samakkhito (sii0)} vantagato byasanno, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9476: [21] ya.m ve pivitvaa ukka.t.tho aavilakkho, mameva sabbaa  pathaviiti ma~n~ne {ma~n~nati (sii0)}.
text.9477: [22] na ^a^T1.0480^ea^ me samo caaturantopi raajaa, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9479: [21] maanaatimaanaa kalahaani pesu.nii, dubba.n.ninii naggayinii  palaayinii.
text.9480: [22] coraana dhuttaana gatii niketo, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9482: [21] iddhaani phiitaani kulaani assu, anekasaahassadhanaani  loke.
text.9485: [21] dha~n~na.m ^a^M1.0363^ea^ dhana.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m, khetta.m  gava.m yattha vinaasayanti.
text.9486: [22] ucchedanii vittavata.m {ucchedanii vittagata.m (syaa0), ucchedanivittagata.m (ka0)} kulaana.m, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9488: [21] ya.m ve pitvaa dittaruupova {du.t.tharuupova (sii0)} poso, akkosati maatara.m  pitara~nca.
text.9489: [22] sassumpi ga.nheyya athopi su.nha.m, tassaa pu.n.na.m  kumbhamima.m ki.naatha..
text.9491: [21] ya.m ve pitvaa dittaruupaava naarii, akkosati sasura.m  saamika~nca.
text.9492: [22] daasampi ^a^T1.0481^ea^ ga.nhe paricaarakampi, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9494: [21] ya.m ve pivitvaana {ya~nce piitvaana (pii0)} haneyya poso, dhamme .thita.m sama.na.m  braahma.na.m vaa.
text.9495: [22] gacche apaayampi tatonidaana.m, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9497: [21] ya.m ve pivitvaa duccarita.m caranti, kaayena vaacaaya ca  cetasaa ca.
text.9498: [22] niraya.m vajanti duccarita.m caritvaa, tassaa pu.n.na.m  kumbhamima.m ki.naatha..
text.9500: [21] ya.m ^a^V1.0269^ea^ yaacamaanaa na labhanti pubbe, bahu.m  hira~n~nampi pariccajantaa.
text.9501: [22] so ta.m pivitvaa alika.m bha.naati, tassaa pu.n.na.m  kumbhamima.m ki.naatha..
text.9503: [21] ya.m ve pitvaa pesane pesiyanto, accaayike kara.niiyamhi  jaate.
text.9504: [22] atthampi so nappajaanaati vutto, tassaa pu.n.na.m  kumbhamima.m ki.naatha..
text.9506: [21] hiriimanaapi ^a^M1.0364^ea^ ahiriikabhaava.m, paatu.m  karonti madanaaya {madiraaya (pii0)} mattaa.
text.9507: [22] dhiiraapi ^a^T1.0482^ea^ santaa bahuka.m bha.nanti, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9509: [21] ya.m ve pitvaa ekathuupaa sayanti, anaasakaa  tha.n.diladukkhaseyya.m.
text.9510: [22] dubba.n.niya.m aayasakya~ncupenti, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9512: [21] ya.m ve pitvaa pattakhandhaa sayanti, gaavo ku.tahataava na  hi vaaru.niyaa.
text.9513: [22] {ya.m ve pitvaa pattakkhandhaa, sayanti gaavo kuu.tahataariva. na hi vaaru.niyaa vego, narena  sussahoriva. (sii0)} vego narena susahoriva {ya.m ve pitvaa  pattakkhandhaa, sayanti gaavo kuu.tahataariva. na hi  vaaru.niyaa vego, narena sussahoriva. (sii0)}, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m ki.naatha..
text.9515: [21] ya.m manussaa vivajjenti, sappa.m ghoravisa.m miva {visamiva (syaa0), visa.m  iva (ka0), visaamiva (?)}.
text.9516: [22] ta.m loke visasamaana.m, ko naro paatumarahati..
text.9518: [21] ya.m ve pitvaa andhakave.n.daputtaa, samuddatiire paricaarayantaa {andhakave.nhuputtaa  (sii0 pii0), a.n.dakave.n.daputtaa (ka0)}.
text.9519: [22] upakkamu.m musaleha~n~nama~n~na.m, tassaa pu.n.na.m kumbhamima.m  ki.naatha..
text.9521: [21] ya.m ve pitvaa pubbadevaa pamattaa, tidivaa cutaa sassatiyaa  samaaya.
text.9522: [22] ta.m ^a^T1.0483^ea^ taadisa.m majjamima.m niratthaka.m, jaana.m mahaaraaja katha.m  piveyya..
text.9524: [21] nayimasmi.m kumbhasmi.m dadhi vaa madhu vaa, eva.m abhi~n~naaya  ki.naahi raaja.
text.9525: [22] eva~nhima.m kumbhagataa mayaa te, akkhaataruupa.m tava  sabbamitta..
text.9527: [21] na ^a^M1.0365^ea^ me pitaa vaa athavaapi maataa,  etaadisaa yaadisako tuva.msi.
text.9528: [22] hitaanukampii paramatthakaamo, soha.m karissa.m vacana.m tavajja..
text.9530: [21] dadaami te gaamavaraani pa~nca, daasiisata.m satta gava.m  sataani.
text.9531: [22] aaja~n~nayutte ca rathe dasa ime, aacariyo hosi  mamatthakaamo..
text.9533: [21] taveva daasiisatamatthu raaja, gaamaa ca gaavo ca taveva  hontu.
text.9534: [22] aaja~n~nayuttaa ca rathaa taveva, sakkohamasmii  tidasaanamindo..
text.9536: [21] ma.msodana.m sappipaayaasa.m {sappipaaya~nca (sii0)} bhu~nja, khaadassu ca tva.m  madhumaasapuuve.
text.9537: [22] eva.m ^a^T1.0484^ea^ tuva.m dhammarato janinda, anindito saggamupehi  .thaananti..
text.9541: [21] cirassa.m ^a^V1.0270^ea^ vata me udapaadi ajja, bhakkho  mahaa sattamibhattakaale.
text.9542: [22] kutosi ko vaasi tadi"ngha bruuhi, aacikkha jaati.m  vidito yathaasi..
text.9544: [21] pa~ncaalaraajaa migava.m pavi.t.tho, jayaddiso naama yadissuto  te.
text.9545: [22] caraami kacchaani vanaani caaha.m, pasada.m ima.m khaada  mamajja mu~nca..
text.9547: [21] seneva ^a^M1.0366^ea^ tva.m pa.nasi sassamaano {sayhamaano (syaa0 ka0)}, mamesa  bhakkho pasado ya.m vadesi.
text.9548: [22] ta.m khaadiyaana pasada.m jigha~n~na.m {jighaccha.m (?)}, khaadissa.m pacchaa na  vilaapakaalo..
text.9550: [21] na catthi mokkho mama nikkayena {vikkayena (sii0)}, gantvaana paccaagamanaaya  pa.nhe.
text.9551: [22] ta.m ^a^T1.0485^ea^ sa"nkara.m {sa"ngara.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} braahma.nassappadaaya, saccaanurakkhii  punaraavajissa.m..
text.9553: [21] ki.m kammajaata.m anutappate tva.m {anutappatii ta.m (sii0 pii0)}, patta.m samiipa.m mara.nassa  raaja.
text.9554: [22] aacikkha me ta.m api sakku.nemu, anujaanitu.m aagamanaaya  pa.nhe..
text.9556: [21] kataa mayaa braahma.nassa dhanaasaa, ta.m sa"nkara.m pa.timukka.m na  mutta.m.
text.9559: [21] yaa te kataa braahma.nassa dhanaasaa, ta.m sa"nkara.m pa.timukka.m na  mutta.m.
text.9562: [21] mutto ca so porisaadassa {purisaadassa (pii0)} hatthaa, gantvaa saka.m mandira.m  kaamakaamii.
text.9563: [22] ta.m sa"nkara.m braahma.nassappadaaya, aamantayii puttamaliinasatta.m {sattu.m (syaa0 pii0  ka0)}..
text.9565: [21] ajjeva ^a^M1.0367^ea^ rajja.m abhisi~ncayassu, dhamma.m  cara sesu paresu caapi.
text.9566: [22] adhammakaaro ^a^T1.0486^ea^ ca te maahu ra.t.the, gacchaamaha.m porisaadassa  ~natte {~nante (syaa0)}..
text.9568: [21] ki.m kamma kubba.m tava deva paava {devapaade (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, naaraadhayii ta.m  tadicchaami sotu.m.
text.9569: [22] yamajja rajjamhi udassaye tuva.m, rajjampi niccheyya.m tayaa  vinaaha.m..
text.9571: [21] na kammunaa vaa vacasaa va taata, aparaadhitoha.m tuviya.m  saraami.
text.9572: [22] sandhi~nca {saddhi.m ca (ka0)} katvaa purisaadakena, saccaanurakkhii punaaha.m  gamissa.m..
text.9574: [21] aha.m gamissaami idheva hohi, natthi tato jiivato  vippamokkho.
text.9575: [22] sace tuva.m gacchasiyeva raaja, ahampi gacchaami ubho na  homa..
text.9577: [21] addhaa hi taata sataanesa dhammo, mara.naa ca me dukkhatara.m  tadassa.
text.9578: [22] kammaasapaado ta.m yadaa pacitvaa, pasayha khaade bhidaa  rukkhasuule..
text.9580: [21] paa.nena te paa.namaha.m nimissa.m, maa tva.m agaa porisaadassa  ~natte.
text.9581: [22] eta~nca ^a^T1.0487^ea^ te paa.namaha.m nimissa.m, tasmaa mata.m jiivitassa  va.n.nemi {varemi (sii0)}..
text.9583: [21] tato ^a^V1.0271^ea^ have dhitimaa raajaputto, vanditvaa  maatu ca pitu ca {vandittha maatucca pitucca (sii0 pii0)} paade.
text.9584: [22] dukhinissa maataa nipataa {nipatii (sii0 pii0)} pathabyaa, pitaassa paggayha  bhujaani kandati..
text.9586: [21] ta.m ^a^M1.0368^ea^ gacchanta.m taava pitaa viditvaa,  parammukho vandati pa~njaliiko.
text.9587: [27] somo ca raajaa varu.no ca raajaa, pajaapatii candimaa  suuriyo ca.
text.9588: [22] etehi gutto purisaadakamhaa, anu~n~naato sotthi paccehi  taata..
text.9590: [21] ya.m da.n.dakira~n~no gatassa {ya.m da.n.dakaara~n~nagatassa (pii0)} maataa, raamassakaasi sotthaana.m  suguttaa.
text.9591: [27] ta.m te aha.m sotthaana.m karomi, etena saccena sarantu  devaa.
text.9594: [21] aavii raho vaapii manopadosa.m, naaha.m sare jaatu  maliinasatte.
text.9595: [22] etena saccena sarantu devaa, anu~n~naato sotthi paccehi  bhaatika {bhaata (sii0), bhaataa (syaa0 pii0)}..
text.9597: [21] yasmaa ca me anadhimanosi saami, na caapi me manasaa  appiyosi.
text.9598: [22] etena saccena sarantu devaa, anu~n~naato ^a^T1.0488^ea^ sotthi paccehi  saami..
text.9600: [21] brahaa ujuu caarumukho kutosi, na ma.m pajaanaasi vane  vasanta.m.
text.9603: [21] jaanaami ludda purisaadako tva.m, na ta.m na jaanaami vane  vasanta.m.
text.9604: [22] aha~nca puttosmi jayaddisassa, mamajja khaada pituno  pamokkhaa..
text.9606: [21] jaanaami ^a^M1.0369^ea^ puttoti {puttosi (syaa0 ka0)} jayaddisassa, tathaa  hi vo mukhava.n.no ubhinna.m.
text.9607: [22] sudukkara~n~neva {sudukkara~nceva (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} kata.m taveda.m, yo mattumicche pituno  pamokkhaa..
text.9609: [21] na dukkara.m ki~nci mahettha ma~n~ne, yo mattumicche pituno  pamokkhaa.
text.9610: [22] maatu ca {maatucca (sii0)} hetu paraloka gantvaa {gamyaa (sii0 syaa0), gamya (pii0)},   sukhena ^a^T1.0489^ea^ saggena ca sampayutto..
text.9612: [21] aha~nca kho attano paapakiriya.m, aavii raho vaapi sare  na jaatu.
text.9613: [22] sa"nkhaatajaatiimara.nohamasmi, yatheva me idha tathaa parattha..
text.9615: [21] khaadajja ma.m daani mahaanubhaava, karassu kiccaani ima.m  sariira.m.
text.9616: [22] rukkhassa vaa te papataami aggaa, chaadayamaano mayha.m  tvamadesi ma.msa.m..
text.9618: [21] ida~nca te ruccati raajaputta, cajesi {cajaasi (sii0 pii0)} paa.na.m pituno  pamokkhaa.
text.9619: [22] tasmaa hi so {tasmaatiha (sii0 syaa0)} tva.m taramaanaruupo, sambha~nja ka.t.thaani  jalehi aggi.m..
text.9621: [21] tato have dhitimaa raajaputto, daaru.m samaahatvaa  mahantamaggi.m.
text.9622: [22] sandiipayitvaa pa.tivedayittha, aadiipito daani  mahaayamaggi {mayaa yakkhamaggi (ka0)}..
text.9624: [21] khaadajja ^a^V1.0272^ea^ ^a^M1.0370^ea^ ma.m daani  pasayhakaarii, ki.m ma.m muhu.m pekkhasi ha.t.thalomo.
text.9625: [22] tathaa tathaa tuyhamaha.m karomi, yathaa ^a^T1.0490^ea^ yathaa ma.m chaadayamaano  adesi..
text.9627: [21] ko taadisa.m arahati khaaditaaye, dhamme .thita.m saccavaadi.m  vada~n~nu.m.
text.9628: [22] muddhaapi tassa viphaleyya sattadhaa, yo taadisa.m saccavaadi.m  adeyya..
text.9630: [21] ida~nhi so braahma.na.m ma~n~namaano, saso avaasesi sake  sariire.
text.9631: [22] teneva so candimaa devaputto, sasatthuto {sasa.t.thako (syaa0)} kaamaduhajja {kaamaruhajja (ka0)}  yakkha..
text.9633: [21] cando yathaa raahumukhaa pamutto, virocate pannaraseva  bhaa.numaa {bhaanumaa (sii0 pii0)}.
text.9634: [27] eva.m tuva.m porisaadaa pamutto, viroca kapile {kampilla (sii0 pii0), kapille (syaa0)} mahaanubhaava.
text.9635: [22] aamodaya.m pitara.m maatara~nca, sabbo ca te nandatu  ~naatipakkho..
text.9637: [21] tato have dhitimaa raajaputto, kata~njalii pariyaaya  {pariyagaa (sii0), paggayha (syaa0 pii0)} porisaada.m.
text.9638: [22] anu~n~naato sotthi sukhii arogo, paccaagamaa {paccaaga (pii0)}  kapilamaliinasattaa {kampilla'maliinasatto (sii0 pii0), kapila'maliinasattaa (ka0)}..
text.9640: [21] ta.m ^a^T1.0491^ea^ negamaa jaanapadaa ca sabbe, hatthaarohaa rathikaa  pattikaa ca.
text.9641: [22] namassamaanaa pa~njalikaa upaagamu.m, namatthu te  dukkarakaarakosiiti..
text.9648: [21] doha.lo me mahaaraaja, supinantenupajjhagaa {nu'paccagaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
text.9649: [22] na so sulabharuupova, yaadiso mama doha.lo..
text.9651: [21] ye keci maanusaa kaamaa, idha lokasmi nandane.
text.9652: [22] sabbe te pacuraa mayha.m, aha.m te dammi doha.la.m..
text.9654: [21] luddaa deva samaayantu, ye keci vijite tava.
text.9657: [21] ime te luddakaa devi, katahatthaa visaaradaa.
text.9658: [22] vana~n~nuu ca miga~n~nuu ca, mamatthe {mama te (pii0)} cattajiivitaa..
text.9661: [27] chabbisaa.na.m gaja.m seta.m, addasa.m supine aha.m.
text.9662: [22] tassa dantehi me attho, alaabhe natthi jiivita.m..
text.9664: [21] na ^a^T1.0492^ea^ ^a^V1.0273^ea^ no pituuna.m na pitaamahaana.m, di.t.tho suto  ku~njaro chabbisaa.no.
text.9665: [22] yamaddasaa supine raajaputtii, akkhaahi no yaadiso  hatthinaago..
text.9667: [21] disaa catasso vidisaa catasso, uddha.m adho dasa disaa  imaayo.
text.9668: [22] katama.m disa.m ti.t.thati naagaraajaa, yamaddasaa supine  chabbisaa.na.m..
text.9670: [21] ito uju.m uttariya.m disaaya.m, atikkamma so sattagirii  brahante.
text.9671: [22] suva.n.napasso naama girii u.laaro, supupphito {sampupphito (syaa0)}  kimpurisaanuci.n.no..
text.9673: [21] aaruyha ^a^M1.0372^ea^ sela.m bhavana.m kinnaraana.m,  olokaya pabbatapaadamuula.m.
text.9674: [22] atha dakkhasii meghasamaanava.n.na.m, nigrodharaaja.m atha  sahassapaada.m {pora.m (ka0)}..
text.9676: [21] tatthacchatii ku~njaro chabbisaa.no, sabbaseto duppasaho  parebhi.
text.9679: [21] ti.t.thanti ^a^T1.0493^ea^ te tumuula.m {tumuula (syaa0), bhimuula (pii0 ka0)} passasantaa, kuppanti vaatassapi  eritassa.
text.9680: [22] manussabhuuta.m pana tattha disvaa, bhasma.m kareyyu.m naassa  rajopi tassa..
text.9682: [21] bahuu hime raajakulamhi santi, pi.landhanaa jaataruupassa  devii.
text.9684: [22] maaretukaamaa ku~njara.m chabbisaa.na.m, udaahu ghaatessasi  luddaputte..
text.9686: [21] saa issitaa dukkhitaa casmi ludda, uddha~nca sussaami  anussarantii.
text.9687: [22] karohi me luddaka etamattha.m, dassaami te gaamavaraani  pa~nca..
text.9689: [21] katthacchatii katthamupeti .thaana.m, viithissa kaa nhaana {nahaana (sii0 pii0)}  gatassa hoti.
text.9690: [22] katha~nhi so nhaayati {nahaayati (sii0 pii0)} naagaraajaa, katha.m vijaanemu gati.m  gajassa..
text.9692: [21] tattheva ^a^M1.0373^ea^ saa pokkhara.nii aduure {aviduure (syaa0 ka0)}, rammaa  sutitthaa ca mahodikaa {mahodakaa (syaa0 ka0)} ca.
text.9693: [22] sampupphitaa ^a^T1.0494^ea^ bhamaraga.naanuci.n.naa {ki.n.naa (katthaci)}, ettha hi so nhaayati  naagaraajaa..
text.9695: [21] siisa.m nahaatuppala {nahaato uppala (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} maalabhaarii, sabbaseto pu.n.dariikattaca"ngii.
text.9696: [22] aamodamaano gacchati sanniketa.m, purakkhatvaa mahesi.m  sabbabhadda.m..
text.9698: [21] tattheva so uggahetvaana vaakya.m, aadaaya tuu.ni~nca dhanu~nca  luddo.
text.9699: [22] vituriyati {vituriya so (sii0 a.t.tha0)} sattagirii brahante, suva.n.napassa.m naama giri.m  u.laara.m..
text.9701: [21] aaruyha sela.m bhavana.m kinnaraana.m, olokayii pabbatapaadamuula.m.
text.9704: [21] tatthaddasaa ku~njara.m chabbisaa.na.m, sabbaseta.m duppasaha.m parebhi.
text.9707: [21] tatthaddasaa ^a^V1.0274^ea^ pokkhara.ni.m aduure, ramma.m  sutittha~nca mahodika~nca.
text.9708: [22] sampupphita.m ^a^T1.0495^ea^ bhamaraga.naanuci.n.na.m, yattha hi so nhaayati  naagaraajaa..
text.9710: [21] disvaana naagassa gati.m .thiti~nca, viithissa yaa  nhaanagatassa hoti.
text.9713: [21] kha.nitvaana ^a^M1.0374^ea^ kaasu.m phalakehi chaadayi,  attaanamodhaaya dhanu~nca luddo.
text.9716: [21] viddho ca naago ko~ncamanaadi ghora.m, sabbe ca {sabbeva (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} naagaa ninnadu.m {ninnaadu (syaa0), ninnaada.m (ka0)} ghoraruupa.m.
text.9717: [22] ti.na~nca ka.t.tha~nca ra.na.m {cu.n.na.m (ka0 sii0 pii0)} karontaa, dhaavi.msu te a.t.thadisaa  samantato..
text.9720: [22] dukkhena phu.t.thassudapaadi sa~n~naa, arahaddhajo sabbhi  avajjharuupo..
text.9722: [21] anikkasaavo kaasaava.m, yo vattha.m paridahissati {paridahessati (sii0  pii0), paridhassati (katthaci)}.
text.9729: [22] kimatthaya.m kissa vaa samma hetu, mama.m vadhii kassa vaaya.m  payogo..
text.9731: [21] kaasissa ra~n~no mahesii bhadante, saa puujitaa raajakule  subhaddaa.
text.9732: [22] ta.m addasaa saa ca mama.m asa.msi, dantehi atthoti ca ma.m  {atthoti mama.m (syaa0 ka0)} avoca..
text.9734: [21] bahuu ^a^M1.0375^ea^ hi me dantayugaa u.laaraa, ye me  pituuna~nca {pitunnampi (pii0)} pitaamahaana.m.
text.9735: [22] jaanaati saa kodhanaa raajaputtii, vadhatthikaa veramakaasi  baalaa..

text.10186: [21] na catthi satto amaro pathabyaa, pa~n~naavidhaa natthi na  ninditabbaa.
text.10187: [03] saccena dhammena dhitiyaa {dhiyaa (sii0 pii0)} damena, alabbhamabyaaharatii naro idha..
text.10189: [21] maataapitaa paramaa bandhavaana.m, naassa tatiyo  anukampakatthi.
text.10190: [22] tesampi guyha.m parama.m na sa.mse, mantassa bheda.m  parisa"nkamaano..
text.10192: [21] maataapitaa bhaginii bhaataro ca, sahaayaa vaa yassa honti  sapakkhaa.
text.10193: [22] tesampi guyha.m parama.m na sa.mse, mantassa bheda.m  parisa"nkamaano..
text.10195: [21] bhariyaa ce purisa.m vajjaa, komaarii piyabhaa.ninii.
text.10196: [27] puttaruupayasuupetaa ^a^T1.0515^ea^, ~naatisa"nghapurakkhataa, tassaapi guyha.m  parama.m na sa.mse.
text.10199: [21] na guyhamattha.m {guyhattha.m (ka0)} vivareyya, rakkheyya na.m yathaa nidhi.m.
text.10200: [22] na hi paatukato saadhu, guyho attho pajaanataa..
text.10202: [21] thiyaa guyha.m na sa.mseyya, amittassa ca pa.n.dito.
text.10203: [22] yo caamisena sa.mhiiro, hadayattheno ca yo naro..
text.10209: [22] taavanto tassa ubbegaa, tasmaa guyha.m na vissaje..
text.10211: [21] vivicca bhaaseyya divaa rahassa.m, ratti.m gira.m naativela.m  pamu~nce.
text.10212: [22] upassutikaa hi su.nanti manta.m, tasmaa manto  khippamupeti bheda.m..
text.10214: [21] yathaapi assa {ayo (syaa0), aya (ka0)} nagara.m mahanta.m, advaaraka.m  {aa.laaraka.m (pii0)} aayasa.m bhaddasaala.m.
text.10215: [22] samantakhaataaparikhaaupeta.m, evampi me te idha guyhamantaa..
text.10217: [21] ye guyhamantaa aviki.n.navaacaa, da.lhaa ^a^T1.0516^ea^ sadatthesu naraa  dujivha {dujivhaa (syaa0 pii0)}.
text.10218: [22] aaraa amittaa byavajanti tehi, aasiivisaa vaa riva  sattusa"nghaa {sattasa"nghaa (sii0 syaa0)}..
text.10220: [21] hitvaa ghara.m pabbajito acelo, naggo mu.n.do carati  ghaasahetu.
text.10221: [22] tamhi {tamhii (pii0)} nu kho vivari.m guyhamattha.m, atthaa ca dhammaa ca  apaggatamhaa {apaagatamhaa (sii0), apagatamhaa (syaa0), avaagatamhaa (pii0)}..
text.10223: [21] katha.mkaro hoti supa.n.naraaja, ki.msiilo kena vatena vatta.m.
text.10224: [22] sama.no cara.m hitvaa mamaayitaani, katha.mkaro saggamupeti  .thaana.m..
text.10226: [21] hiriyaa titikkhaaya damenupeto {damena khantiyaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)},   akkodhano pesu.niya.m pahaaya.
text.10227: [22] sama.no cara.m hitvaa mamaayitaani, eva.mkaro saggamupeti  .thaana.m..
text.10229: [21] maataava ^a^M1.0391^ea^ putta.m taru.na.m tanujja.m {tanuuja.m (sii0)},  samphassataa {sampassa ta.m (sii0 pii0)} sabbagatta.m phareti.
text.10230: [22] evampi me tva.m paaturahu dijinda, maataava putta.m  anukampamaano..
text.10232: [21] handajja ^a^T1.0517^ea^ tva.m mu~nca {mucca (sii0)} vadhaa dujivha, tayo hi puttaa na hi  a~n~no atthi.
text.10233: [22] antevaasii dinnako atrajo ca, rajjassu {rajassu (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} putta~n~nataro me  ahosi..
text.10235: [21] icceva vaakya.m visajjii supa.n.no, bhumya.m pati.t.thaaya dijo  dujivha.m.
text.10236: [22] muttajja tva.m sabbabhayaativatto, thaluudake hohi  mayaabhigutto..
text.10238: [21] aata"nkina.m yathaa kusalo bhisakko, pipaasitaana.m rahadova  siito.
text.10239: [22] vesma.m yathaa himasiita.t.titaana.m {himasisira.t.titaana.m (pii0)}, evampi te sara.namaha.m  bhavaami..
text.10242: [22] vivariya daa.tha.m sesi, kuto ta.m bhayamaagata.m..
text.10247: [21] katha.m nu vissase tyamhi, yenaasi kalaho kato.
text.10248: [22] niccayattena .thaatabba.m, so disabbhi {so disamhi (pii0)} na rajjati..
text.10250: [21] vissaasaye ^a^V1.0287^ea^ na ca ta.m {na.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vissayeyya,  asa"nkito sa"nkito ca {asa"nkito ca sa"nkito (sii0 pii0)} bhaveyya.
text.10251: [22] tathaa ^a^T1.0518^ea^ tathaa vi~n~nuu parakkameyya, yathaa yathaa bhaava.m paro na  ja~n~naa..
text.10253: [21] te ^a^M1.0392^ea^ devava.n.naa {devava.n.nii (pii0)} sukhumaalaruupaa, ubho  samaa sujayaa {sujayo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pu~n~nakhandhaa {pu~n~nagandhaa (pii0)}.
text.10254: [22] upaagamu.m karampiya.m {kaadambiya.m (sii0), kaarambiya.m (pii0)} acela.m, missiibhuutaa assavaahaava  naagaa..
text.10256: [21] tato have pa.n.darako acela.m, sayamevupaagamma ida.m avoca.
text.10257: [22] muttajjaha.m sabbabhayaativatto, na hi {ha (pii0)} nuuna tuyha.m manaso  piyamhaa..
text.10259: [21] piyo hi me aasi supa.n.naraajaa, asa.msaya.m pa.n.darakena  sacca.m.
text.10260: [22] so raagarattova akaasimeta.m, paapakamma.m {paapa.m kamma.m (sii0 pii0)} sampajaano na  mohaa..
text.10262: [21] na me piya.m appiya.m vaapi hoti, sampassato lokamima.m  para~nca.
text.10265: [21] ariyaavakaasosi anariyovaasi {anariyo caasi (sii0 pii0)}, asa~n~nato  sa~n~natasannikaaso.
text.10266: [22] ka.nhaabhijaatikosi ^a^T1.0519^ea^ anariyaruupo, paapa.m bahu.m duccarita.m  acaari..
text.10268: [21] adu.t.thassa tuva.m dubbhi, dubbhii {duubhi, duubhii (pii0)} ca pisu.no casi.
text.10269: [22] etena saccavajjena, muddhaa te phalatu sattadhaa..
text.10271: [21] tasmaa hi mittaana.m na dubbhitabba.m, mittadubbhaa {mittadubbhaa hi (syaa0)} paapiyo  natthi a~n~no.
text.10272: [22] aasittasatto nihato pathabyaa, indassa vaakyena hi  sa.mvaro hatoti..
text.10276: [21] kaa ^a^M1.0393^ea^ vedhamaanaa girikandaraaya.m, ekaa  tuva.m ti.t.thasi sa.mhituuru {sa~n~natuura (sii0 pii0), sa~ncituuru (syaa0)}.
text.10277: [22] pu.t.thaasi me paa.nipameyyamajjhe, akkhaahi me naama~nca  bandhave ca..
text.10280: [27] kaa vaa tvamasi kalyaa.ni, kassa vaa tva.m sumajjhime.
text.10281: [22] abhivaademi ta.m bhadde, daanavaaha.m namatthu te..
text.10283: [21] yo putto kaasiraajassa, sotthisenoti ta.m viduu.
text.10284: [27] tassaaha.m sambulaa bhariyaa, eva.m jaanaahi daanava.
text.10285: [22] abhivaademi ^a^T1.0520^ea^ ta.m bhante {bhaddante (sii0 syaa0)}, sambulaaha.m namatthu te..
text.10291: [22] yadaa haraami ta.m bhakkho, tassa nuunajja naadhati {naathati (ka0)}..
text.10294: [22] sambule parici.n.nena, aha.m bhattaa bhavaami te..
text.10296: [21] soka.t.taaya durattaaya, ki.m ruupa.m vijjate mama.
text.10299: [21] ehima.m girimaaruyha, bhariyaa me {mayha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} catussataa.
text.10302: [21] nuuna {nanu (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)} taarakava.n.naabhe {haa.takava.n.naabhe  (pii0)}, ya.m ki~nci manasicchasi.
text.10303: [22] sabba.m ta.m pacura.m mayha.m, ramassvajja {ramasujja (sii0 syaa0)} mayaa saha..
text.10305: [21] no ce tuva.m maheseyya.m, sambule kaarayissasi.
text.10306: [22] ala.m tva.m paataraasaaya, pa.nhe {ma~n~ne (sii0 pii0)} bhakkhaa bhavissasi..
text.10309: [22] vane naatha.m apassanti.m, sambula.m aggahii bhuje..
text.10314: [21] na me ida.m tathaa dukkha.m, ya.m ma.m khaadeyya rakkhaso.
text.10315: [22] ya~nca ^a^T1.0521^ea^ me ayyaputtassa, mano hessati a~n~nathaa..
text.10317: [21] na santi devaa pavasanti nuuna, na hi nuuna santi idha  lokapaalaa.
text.10318: [22] sahasaa karontaanamasa~n~nataana.m, na hi nuuna santi  pa.tisedhitaaro..
text.10320: [21] itthiinamesaa pavaraa yasassinii, santaa samaa  aggirivuggatejaa.
text.10321: [27] ta~nce tuva.m rakkhasaadesi ka~n~na.m, muddhaa ca hi sattadhaa te  phaleyya.
text.10322: [22] maa tva.m dahii {jahii (pii0)} mu~nca patibbataaya {patibbataa saa (sii0), patibbataa yaa  (pii0)}..
text.10325: [22] nii.la.m {ni.d.da.m (syaa0 ka0)} pa.lina.m saku.niiva {phalinasaku.niiva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, gatasi"nga.mva  aalaya.m..
text.10331: [22] raajaputta.m apassantii, tumha.mmhi {tumha.m hi (pii0)} sara.na.m gataa..
text.10333: [21] vande siihe ca byagghe ca, ye ca a~n~ne vane migaa.
text.10336: [21] ti.naa {ti.na (pii0)} lataani osadhyo, pabbataani vanaani ca.
text.10349: [22] kena nujja samaagacchi {samaagacchi (sii0 pii0)}, ko te piyataro mayaa..
text.10351: [21] ida.m khoha.m tadaavoca.m {tadavoca.m (sii0 syaa0)}, gahitaa tena sattunaa.
text.10352: [27] na me ida.m tathaa dukkha.m, ya.m ma.m khaadeyya rakkhaso.
text.10353: [22] ya~nca me ayyaputtassa, mano hessati a~n~nathaa..
text.10358: [21] tathaa ma.m sacca.m paaletu, paalayissati ce mama.m.
text.10362: [21] ye ku~njaraa sattasataa u.laaraa, rakkhanti  rattindivamuyyutaavudhaa.
text.10363: [22] dhanuggahaana~nca sataani so.lasa, katha.mvidhe passasi bhadde  sattavo..
text.10366: [22] taasa.m su.nitvaa mitagiitavaadita.m {mitagiitavaadina.m (pii0)}, na daani me taata tathaa  yathaa pure..
text.10369: [22] senopiyaa {senuupiyaa (pii0)} taata anindita"ngiyo, khattiyaka~n~naa  pa.tilobhayanti {pa.tilaabhayanti (pii0)} na.m..
text.10371: [21] sace aha.m taata tathaa yathaa pure, pati.m tamu~nchaaya punaa  vane bhare.
text.10372: [22] sammaanaye ma.m na ca ma.m vimaanaye, itopi me taata tato  vara.m siyaa..
text.10374: [21] yamannapaane ^a^V1.0290^ea^ vipulasmi ohite, naarii  vima.t.thaabhara.naa ala"nkataa.
text.10375: [22] sabba"ngupetaa {pa~nca"ngupetaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} patino ca appiyaa, abajjha  {avajjha (syaa0), aabajjha (pii0)} tassaa mara.na.m tato vara.m..
text.10377: [21] api ce daliddaa kapa.naa anaa.lhiyaa, ka.taadutiiyaa  patino ca saa piyaa.
text.10378: [22] sabba"ngupetaayapi appiyaaya, ayameva ^a^T1.0524^ea^ seyyaa {seyyo (syaa0 ka0)} kapa.naapi yaa  piyaa {kapa.naapi yaa (ka0)}..
text.10380: [21] sudullabhitthii purisassa yaa hitaa, bhattitthiyaa dullabho  yo hito ca.
text.10381: [22] hitaa ca te siilavatii ca bhariyaa, janinda dhamma.m cara  sambulaaya..
text.10383: [21] sace tuva.m vipule laddhabhoge, issaavati.n.naa mara.na.m upesi.
text.10384: [22] aha~nca te bhadde imaa raajaka~n~naa {imaa ca ka~n~naa (pii0)}, sabbe {sabbeva (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} te vacanakaraa  bhavaamaati..
text.10388: [21] appamaado ^a^M1.0397^ea^ amata.m pada.m {amatapada.m (sii0 pii0)}, pamaado  maccuno pada.m.
text.10389: [22] appamattaa na miiyanti, ye pamattaa yathaa mataa..
text.10391: [21] madaa pamaado jaayetha, pamaadaa jaayate khayo.
text.10392: [22] khayaa padosaa {khayaa ca dosaa (sii0)} jaayanti, maa pamaado {maa mado (sii0 syaa0  pii0)} bharatuusabha {bhaaradhuusabha (ka0)}..
text.10394: [21] bahuu hi khattiyaa jiinaa, attha.m ra.t.tha.m pamaadino.
text.10398: [22] sabbe bhogaa vinassanti, ra~n~no ta.m vuccate agha.m..
text.10401: [22] iddha.m phiita.m janapada.m, coraa viddha.msayanti na.m..
text.10403: [21] na te puttaa bhavissanti, na hira~n~na.m na dhaaniya.m {na hira~n~nanidhaaniyaa  (ka0)}.
text.10407: [22] ~naatimittaa suhajjaa ca, na ta.m ma~n~nanti maaniya.m {mantiya.m (syaa0)}..
text.10413: [22] sirii jahati dummedha.m, ji.n.na.mva urago taca.m..
text.10419: [22] tattha disvaa ca sutvaa ca, tato ta.m {tva.m (ka0)} pa.tipajjasi..
text.10421: [21] eva.m vedetu pa~ncaalo, sa"ngaame saramappito {samappito (sii0 pii0)}.
text.10424: [21] ji.n.no ^a^M1.0398^ea^ dubbalacakkhuusi, na ruupa.m  saadhu passasi.
text.10425: [22] ki.m tattha brahmadattassa, ya.m ta.m maggeyya {maggheyya (pii0)} ka.n.tako {ka.n.dako (sii0 syaa0  pii0)}..
text.10427: [21] bahvettha brahmadattassa, soha.m {yoha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} maggasmi  {maggosmi (pii0)} braahma.na.
text.10430: [21] ratti~nhi {ratti~nca (sii0)} coraa khaadanti, divaa khaadanti tu.n.diyaa.
text.10433: [21] etaadise bhaye jaate {taata (sii0 pii0)}, bhaya.t.taa taata {taava (sii0  pii0)} maa.navaa.
text.10442: [21] na me dubbhaasita.m brahme, kovidatthapadaa aha.m.
text.10445: [21] ratti~nhi ^a^T1.0527^ea^ coraa khaadanti, divaa khaadanti tu.n.diyaa.
text.10447: [22] dujjiive dubbhare daare, kuto bhattaa kumaariyo..
text.10449: [21] eva.m sayatu pa~ncaalo, sa"ngaame sattiyaa hato.
text.10450: [22] yathaaya.m kapa.no seti, hato phaalena saaliyo..
text.10453: [22] yo tva.m sapasi raajaana.m, aparajjhitvaana attano {attanaa (pii0)}..
text.10458: [21] ratti~nhi ^a^V1.0292^ea^ coraa khaadanti, divaa khaadanti  tu.n.diyaa.
text.10461: [21] saa ^a^M1.0399^ea^ nuuna puna re pakkaa, vikaale  bhattamaahari.
text.10464: [21] eva.m ha~n~natu pa~ncaalo, sa"ngaame asinaa hato {da.lha.m (pii0)}.
text.10467: [21] ya.m pasu khiira.m cha.d.deti, pasupaala.m vihi.msati {pasupaala~nca hi.msati (sii0),  pasu phaala~nca hi.msati (pii0)}.
text.10468: [22] ki.m tattha brahmadattassa, ya.m no garahate {garahato (pii0)} bhava.m..
text.10473: [21] ratti~nhi ^a^T1.0528^ea^ coraa khaadanti, divaa khaadanti tu.n.diyaa.
text.10476: [21] ca.n.daa a.tanakaa {a.tanaka (pii0), aka.tanaa (ka0)} gaavii, ya.m pure na duhaamase.
text.10482: [21] ya.m pasu pasupaalassa, sambhameyya {pabbhameyya (sii0 pii0)} raveyya vaa.
text.10488: [21] ratti~nhi coraa khaadanti, divaa khaadanti tu.n.diyaa.
text.10490: [22] katha.m no asikosatthaa, khiirapaa ha~n~nate pajaa..
text.10492: [21] eva.m khajjatu pa~ncaalo, hato yuddhe saputtako.
text.10495: [21] na ^a^M1.0400^ea^ sabbabhuutesu vidhenti {vidhanti (ka0)} rakkha.m,  raajaano ma.n.duuka manussaloke.
text.10496: [22] nettaavataa raajaa adhammacaarii, ya.m taadisa.m jiivamadeyyu  dha"nkaa..
text.10498: [21] adhammaruupo vata brahmacaarii, anuppiya.m bhaasasi  khattiyassa.
text.10499: [22] viluppamaanaaya puthuppajaaya, puujesi raaja.m paramappamaada.m {raaja.m paramappavaada.m (sii0), raajaa  paramappavaadi.m (syaa0)}..
text.10501: [21] sace ^a^V1.0293^ea^ ima.m brahme surajjaka.m siyaa, phiita.m ra.t.tha.m  mudita.m {puurita.m (ka0)} vippasanna.m.
text.10502: [22] bhutvaa bali.m aggapi.n.da~nca kaakaa, na maadisa.m  jiivamadeyyu dha"nkaati..
text.10505: [21] ki.mchanda ^a^T1.0529^ea^ kumbha jayaddisa chaddanta, atha pa.n.ditasambhava  sirakapi.
